
1a1(mdo 'grel): slob dpon legs ldan byed kyi mdzad pa'i dbu ma snying po dang/ dbu ma'i 'grel brtog ge 'bar ba bam po nyer bdun ba bzhugs so?//
1b1(mdo 'grel): #/ /rgya gar skad du/ ma d+hya ma ka h+ri da ya kA ri ka /bod skad du/ dbu ma'i snying po'i tshig le'ur byas pa/
1b2(mdo 'grel): 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang gis de nyid rab brtag min/ /rnam shes bya
1b3(mdo 'grel): min gzhim yin/ /mtshon min brtag min rig bya min/ /skye 'jig med cing bde ba dang/ /rnam brtag ma yin snang ba dang/
1b4(mdo 'grel): mtshan ma med cing gsal byed med/ /gnyis min gnyis med ma yin dang/ /zhi dang blo 'jug spangs pa dang/ /yi ge med pa
2a1(mdo 'grel): yi ge yis/ /thugs rje nyid kyis bstan mdzad pa/ /ston pa ma nor nyid gsung ba/ /de la gus par phyag 'tshal
2a2(mdo 'grel): lo/ /gzhan don bsgrub phyir brtul zhugs kyis/ /byang chub chen por blos byas rnams/ /de nyid bdud rtsir bzung ba'i phyir/ /nus
2a3(mdo 'grel): pas cung zhig brjod par bya/ /byang chub sems ni mi gtong dang/ /thub pa'i brtul zhugs yang dag brten/ /de nyid shes pa 'tshol?
2a4(mdo 'grel): ba ni/ /don kun bsgrub pa'i spyod pa yin/ /byams pa dang ni snying rje dang/ /shes pa chen pos brgyan pa yi/ /sangs rgyas sa bon byang
2b1(mdo 'grel): chub sems/ /de phyir mkhas pas de mi btang/ /blo ldan snying stobs che ba dang/ /gzhan gyi sdug bsngal mi bzod cing/ /yang dag brtson 'grus
2b2(mdo 'grel): brtsams pa dang/ /mthu dang ldan zhing mkhas pas ni/ /shes rab snang ba med pa yi/ /'jig rten kun la blta byas nas/ /'khor ba mi
2b3(mdo 'grel): gtsang sa 'og nas/ /bdag nyid brgal bas bsgral bar rigs/ /gang zhig shes rab mtshon rnon gyis/ /'ching ba kun bcad grol gyur
2b4(mdo 'grel): pa/ /snying rje'i bdag nyid ldan pa yis/ /gang phyir mgon med sdug bsngal ba/ /'khor ba'i brtson ra mi bzad par/ /'dod chags la sogs
2b5(mdo 'grel): sgrog gis bcings/ /bag med pa yi chang 'thung nas/ /gti mug gnyid kyis log pa dang/ /rnam par rtog pa'i chom rkun gyis/ /dge tshogS
3a1(mdo 'grel): ma lus brkus pa dag /gal te grol bar mi byed na/ /mthu ldan mthu ni ci la phan/ /gang zhig lag pa'i mthus bsgrubs pa/ /'dod pas
3a2(mdo 'grel): bskyed pa'i bde chung yang/ /gcig pu gdu bas za byed pa/ /de yang mkhas pas smad gyur na/ /'khor los sgyur dang dbang po dang/ /tshangs pa la yang rab
3a3(mdo 'grel): dkon pa/ /sred pa rnam par gcod pa dang/ /thabs kyi sgo nas thun mong ba/ /len dang zad dang mthar thug dang/ /sdug la sogs pas mi 'gyur zhing/ /
3a4(mdo 'grel): sdug bsngal ma lus zhi byed pa'i/ /de nyid don sogs bdud rtsi ci/ /gzhan yang sngon chad nyon mongs pa'i/ /gdon gyis brlams pa dag gis ni/ /rma la 'gyur
3a5(mdo 'grel): byed 'debs pa bzhin/ /sdug bsngal nad pa gang sdug byas/ /skye ba gzhan du gang dag gis/ /byams dang bsnyen bkur phan pa byas/ /de la lan du phan
3b1(mdo 'grel): gdags pa/ /mya ngan bzla las gzhan ci yod/ /gzhan don byed las byung ba yi/ /dga' bas sems dga' mkhas pa dag /ral gri rab tu 'bar 'dra ba'i/ /srid pa dag gis don mi 'gyur/ /tshul khrims 'chal pa mi
3b2(mdo 'grel): byed pas/ /ngan 'gro'i sgo kun bcad pa'i phyir/ /stong nyid lta ba goms byas pas/ /nyon mongs 'jug pa bcom phyir ro/ /mkhas pa bsod nams byas pa yis/ /'gro drug skyed tshal dus ston ltar/ /mthong ba
3b3(mdo 'grel): srid pa'i btson ra yis/ /skrag par 'gyur ba yod ma yin/ /skyon mthong phyir ni srid par min/ /brtse phyir mya ngan 'das mi gnas/ /gzhan don bsgrub phyir brtul zhugs can/ /srid pa na yang gnas par byed/ /
3b4(mdo 'grel): 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das/ /gnyis dang gnyis min mi dmigs pa'i/ /mkhas pa gar yang mi gnas shing/ /srid pa na yang gnas par byed/ /byang lag rin chen bdun phyug cing/ /yon tan dpag med 'byung
3b5(mdo 'grel): pa'i gnas/ /lha dang lha min phyag byas pa/ /dam chos 'khor lo bskor brnyes shing/ /mu tig 'pho 'dra'i grags pa dang/ /ston zla nya ba'i dri med pa'i/ /'od zer lta bu'i gsung dag gis/ /phyogs bcu dag ni
3b6(mdo 'grel): rgyas mdzad la/ /dkon mchog gsum gdung gnas bya'i phyir/ /yon tan 'byung gnas dam pa'i sras/ /lha klu la sogs spyi gtsug gis/ /bstan pas mchod pa gzhag mdzad de/ /rang dang gzhan don
4a1(mdo 'grel): mdzad pa'i phyir/ /de dag mya ngan 'das legs 'das/ /de las gzhan gang lus bcud chad/ /de yang mya ngan 'das pa yin/ /wa ni glang chen dregs pa yi/ /klad pa 'gems shing dbye mi sems//
4a2(mdo 'grel): gdol pa rgya mtsho'i mthas klas pa'i/ /sa yi dkyil 'khor bskyang mi sems/ /de bzhin sems can dman pa yang/ /zab cing bla med rgya che ba/ /yon tan bgrangs 'das 'byung ba'i gnas/ /sangs rgyas nyid
4a3(mdo 'grel): la re ba'ang med/ /gzhal yas rmad byung bsam mi khyab/ /snang ba thams cad zil gnon pa/ /rdzogs sangs yon tan rin chen la/ /su zhig yid kyis sems mi bskyed/ /gzhan don
4a4(mdo 'grel): byed pa dpa' ba dang/ /skyes bu chen po'i tshul ldan pa/ /su zhig 'khor mdza' med par yang/ /nyin cig lta bur gnas mi byed/ /mkhas pa gang zhig 'das gyur kyang/ /gang gis gtam
4a5(mdo 'grel): gzhi 'phel 'gyur ba/ /'phags pa gzhan don mdzad rnams kyi/ /lam gyi rjes su 'jug mi byed/ /su zhig chu shing dbu pa ltar/ /snying po med pa'i lus 'di dag /gzhan phan rkyen du
4a6(mdo 'grel): sgrub byed pas/ /lhun po snying por sgrub mi byed/ /ya rab snying rje ldan pas ni/ /skad cig re rer rga shi dang/ /nad kyi gzhir gyur lus dag ni/ /gzhan la bde
4b1(mdo 'grel): bskyed gzhir byed do/ /dam chos sgron dang bcas pa la/ /mi khom brgyad spangs khom pa 'di/ /skyes bu chen po'i spyod pa yis/ /'bras bu yod par bya ba'i rigs/ /dbu ma'i snying po las byang chub sems mi btang ba'i le'u ste dang po'o// //de ltar 'gro
4b2(mdo 'grel): la phan ba'i phyir/ /byang chub chen por brtan blangs pa/ /tshul dang mthun pa'i lam nyid du/ /rab tu zhugs ba rnam par mdzes/ /de ni byams pa gnod med dang/ /snying rje phan pa bsgrub pa yis/ /dam chos rtogs pas ngoms med dang/ /chos sbyin pa la ser sna mer/
4b3(mdo 'grel): dngar? dang rgyal bcom pa dang/ /yid kyis de nyid blta ba dang/ /gzhan skyon rtol la long ba dang/ /rang skyon 'byung bas 'jigs pa yin/ /rtsong dang 'jig rten 'du 'ji dang/ /'jig rten rgyad pan rgyab kyis phyogs/ /yon tan med la'ang yon tan gyi/ /rgyan rnams skye
4b4(mdo 'grel): bar rtag tu gus/ /snying rjes bskyed ba'i sbyin pa dag /skye bo'i tshogs rnams thams cad kyi/ /sdug bsngal chu bo kun zhi'i phyir/ /thams cad mkhyen nyid 'dod pa bskyed/ /tshul khrims dri med chu khrus dang/ /bzod pa'i ser la phreng dkar dang/ /brtson 'grus ral
4b5(mdo 'grel): ba'i khur bcings dang/ /bsam gtan shes pa lhung len te/ /blo mig legs par bye ba dang/ /bstan bcos 'jig rten shes la mkhas/ /ngo tsha khrel yod gos dang ni/ /nges pa'i ska rags 'ching ba yin/ /snying rje'i bags pa gnag 'chang zhing/ /dad pa dri
4b6(mdo 'grel): med ri slab? dang/ /dran pas dbang po'i sgo bsrungs shing/ /brtan pa'i spa stegs stan la 'dug/ theg pa chen pa dga' tshan gyi/ /dka' thub nags tshal yang dag bsten/ /bsam gtan dga' ba'i 'bras bu za/ /dran pa nyer gzhag spyod yul can/ /zab
4b7(mdo 'grel): cing rgya che mdo sde'i mdza' / /'don cing sdig pa bcom pa dang/ /bden pa gnyis la brten pa yi/ /rten cing 'brel 'byung nyi bshad zlos//sgrub pa'i me tog bsngags ldan pa/ /phyogs rnams kun du dris khyab pas/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma la/ /nyin gcig
5a1(mdo 'grel): bzhin du bsnyen bkur byed/ /so sor rtog pa'i me thab tu/ /mi dge'i kun tu rtog pa bsreg/ bla med go 'phang thob bya'i phyir/ /de ltar thub po'i brtul zhug spyod/ /dbu ma'i snying po las thub pa'i brtul zhugs la yang dag par bsten pa'i le'u ste
5a2(mdo 'grel): gnyis pa'o// //gang la shes pa'i mig yod pa/ /de la mig yod gzhan ma yin/ /des na gang phyir blo ldan dag /de nyid shes pa 'tshol ba brtson/ /blo ldan 'jig rten gsum po dag /thog med mthong ba long bas kyang/ /blta 'dod thag ring cha 'phra dang/
5a3(mdo 'grel): bsgribs pa'i don yang mthong bar 'gyur/ /mig stong pa yang blo med na/ /mig dang ldan pa ma yin te/ /mtho ris dang ni byang grol gyi/ /lam dang lam min mi mthong phyir/ /shes rab mig bye mthong ba dang/ /ma mthong khyad par 'dod pa yi/ /'bras bu re ba dug tsher gyi//
5a4(mdo 'grel): spyin pa sogs la 'jug mi byed/ /snying rjes thams cad mkhyen pa'i phyir/ /'khor gsum yongs su dag pa yi/ /sbyin la sogs la rtson byed cing/ /de la'ang yid ni gnas mi byed/ /shes rab bdud rtsi ngoms byed dang/ /sgron ma snang ba thog med dang/ /thar pa'i khang
5a5(mdo 'grel): bzangs thems skas dang/ /nyon mongs bud shing bsreg pa'i me/ /blo gros de yang bden gnyis la/ /bltos nas rnam pa gnyis su 'dod/ /yang dag don rtogs rjes mthun phyir/ /yang dag kun rdzob shes pa yin/ /sbyin dang bsod nams ye shes kyi/ /tshogs rnams yongs su rdzogs byed dang/ /rgyu de dag gi 'bras bu dang/ /'brel dang mtshan nyid la sogs shes/ /byams dang snying rje bsgoms pa dang/ /sems can sdud dang smin byed dang/ /skye mched bcu gnyis brten pa yi/ /shes rab brdar btags shes par bya//
5a6(mdo 'grel): rtog pa'i dra pa ma lus pa/ /dgag ba sgrub par byed pa dang/ /zhi dang so so rang rig dang/ /rnam rtog med cing yi ge med/ /gcig nyid tha dad nyid bral dang/ /mkha' ltar dri med de nyid la/ /'jug pa med pas 'jug pa yi/ /shes rab don dam shes pa yin/ /yang
5b1(mdo 'grel): dag kun rdzob rnams kyi skas/ /med bar yang dag khang pa yi/ /steng du 'gro bar bya ba ni/ /mkhas la rung ba ma yin no/ /de nyid khang bzang thog 'dzeg pa/ /yang dag kun rdzob them pa'i skas/ /med par rung ba ma yin pa/ /gang gi yin pa de phyir ro/ /mkhas pas sems ni mnyam gzhag
5b2(mdo 'grel): phyir/ /mngon par brtson pa nyid du bya/ /de bzhin thos byung shes pa la/ /de las gzhan shes sdu phyir ro/ /ji ltar chu rnyog g.yo ba la/ /bzhin ni mthong bar mi 'gyur ba/ /de ltar sems mnyam ma bzhag dang/ /sgrib pas bsgribs la de nyid do/ /yid kyi glang po log
5b3(mdo 'grel): 'gro ba/ /dmigs pa'i ka ba brtan po la/ /dran pa'i thag pas nges bcings nas/ /shes rab lcags kyus rim dbang bya/ /rgod pa mi rtag la sogs pa/ /yid la byed pas zhi bar bya/ /zhum pa dmigs pa rgya chen dag /bsgom pas spangs pa nyid du bya/ /
5b4(mdo 'grel): g.yengs pas g.yeng ba'i mtshan ma la/ /nyes dmigs blta bas bsdu bar bya/ /zhum pa yang ni brtson 'grus kyi/ /phan yon mthong bas gzengs bstong bya/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gi/ rdzab dris sbags shing ma bsdams pa/ /mi sdug byams pa
5b5(mdo 'grel): rten 'byung ba'i/ /chu dag gis ni bkru bar bya/ /dben zhing mi g.yo zhi ba dang/ /dmigs pa dag la gzhol ba dang/ /las su rung? zhing mnyin shes nas/ /de la legs par btang snyoms bya/ /blo gros mnyam gzhag 'og tu ni/ /tha snyad sgo nas bzung bya yi/ /
5b6(mdo 'grel): chos rnams dngos po 'di dag la/ /shes rab kyis ni 'di ltar brtag /blo yis rnam par dpyad pa na/ /'di dag don dam yod dam ci/ /gal te yin na 'di de nyid/ /gal te gzhan na de btsal bya/ /phyogs su lhung bas sems gdungs pas/ /zhi ba nam
5b7(mdo 'grel): yang rtog mi 'gyur/ /'dus byas 'dus ma byas chos ni/ /phung po skye mched khams rnams ni/ /nyon mongs sgrib pa spang pa'i phyir/ /nyan thos rnams la rab tu bshad/ /nyon mongs shes bya'i sgrib dri ma/ /spang phyir snying rje ldan rnams la/ /rags phyir dang po kho nar
6a1(mdo 'grel): ni/ /gzugs kyi phung po brtag par bya/ /de la'ang dang por 'byung ba rnams/ /ji skad bstan pa'i gtan tshigs kyis/ /'dir ni sa la sogs pa dag /don dam par na 'byung ba yi/ /ngo bo nyid min byas phyir dang/ /rgyu ldan sogs phyir shes pa bzhin/ /
6a2(mdo 'grel): sa ni sra pa'i ngo bo ni/ /'byung ba nyid phyir rlung bzhin no/ /sa yi las ni 'dzin ma yin/ /byas pa nyid phyir chu bzhin no/ /med kyang gal te de nyid du/ /sa yi dngos nyid sra snyam na/ /rnal 'byor pa dag de la ni/ /'byung dang 'bying ba mi rigs so/ /bsam gtan pa yi bsam
6a3(mdo 'grel): gtan mthus/ /sa ni gsher ba nyid mi rigs/ /ngo bo nyid la 'gyur med phyir/ /yang na de sra nyid ma yin/ /de bzhin chu dang me rlung dag /gsher la sogs pa'i dngos nyid min/ /de dag las kyang sdud pa dang/ /smin dang g.yo bar byed mi rigs/ /rlung la
6a4(mdo 'grel): sogs pa kun rdzob tu/ /yon tan mnyam par mi 'dod min/ /lus kyi dbang pos dmigs phyir dang/ /'byung ba yin phyir sa bzhin no/ /sa la sogs pa rdzas yod min/ /tshogs pa'i yan lag min med phyir/ /gang dag ji skad bstan pa de/ /rdzas yod
6a5(mdo 'grel): ma mthong nags tshal bzhin/ /sa la sogs pa yul gyi blo/ /de yang rdzas yod ma yin 'dod/ /rgyu dang bcas phyir 'jig pa'i phyir/ /nags tshal la sogs blo bzhin no/ /sa la sogs pa ston pa'i sgra/ /brjod pa rdzas su mi 'dod de/ /mnyan pa
6a6(mdo 'grel): yin phyir dmag la sogs/ /ston pa'i sgra dag mi 'dod bzhin/ /pa la sha pan d+ha la sogs pa/ /nags tshal rtsom pa nyid mi 'dod/ /rgyu ldan la sogs gtan tshigs kyis/ /dper na rtsa ba la sogs bzhin/ /yan lag can gyi nags tshal ni/ /pa
6a7(mdo 'grel): la sha la sogs brtsams min/ /de dag re rer? ma rdzogs phyir/ /yal ga la sogs gang yin bzhin/ /nags tshal sgra ni ma nges pa/ /du ma'i rdzas grangs 'jug ma yin/ /khyad par can gyi blos brtag phyir/ /bum bzang la sogs sgra bzhin no/ /gang phyir
6b1(mdo 'grel): gzugs ni don dam du/ /mig gi dbang po'i gzung ba min/ /bsags phyir dper na sgra bzhin dang/ /'byung las gyur phyir de nyid bzhin/ /gzugs ni mig gis gzung min te/ /'byung las gyur phyir rang gzugs bzhin/ /bde la sogs 'byung rgyu phyir dang/ /brjod bya
6b2(mdo 'grel): yin phyir ro sogs bzhin/ /de bzhin gzugs ni 'byung 'gyur min/ /'byung phyir me la sogs pa bzhin/ /rgyu ldan la sogs gtan tshigs kyis/ /yang na sems bzhin shes par bya/ /des ni kha dog dbyibs dang ni/ /bsags dang 'phra dang rags sogs kyi/ /dbye
6b3(mdo 'grel): bas gzugs kyi mtshan nyid dag /ji snyed rnam par brtags pa rnams/ /ji ltar rig pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /bkag par khong du chud par bya/ /sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg /dgag pa'i tshul yang de bzhin no/ /mig gi dbang po don dam du/ /gzugs la blta bas ma yin te//
6b4(mdo 'grel): sems dang sems byung las gzhan phyir/ /dper na ro yi dbang po bzhin/ /yang na mig gis don dam du/ /gzugs la blta ba ma yin te/ /rnam shes dngos med mi skye'i phyir/ /pags pa dag la sogs pa bzhin/ /mig ni gzugs kyi yul can min/ /rang
6b5(mdo 'grel): gi gzugs la mi 'dzin phyir/ /nyan la sogs pa'i dbang po dang/ /gzugs can yin phyir ro sogs bzhin/ /de bzhin blta po mig med pa/ /dpe yang med pas mthong ma yin/ /blta ba'i ngo bo nyid min pas/ /ji ltar gzugs la blta bar rigs/ /
6b6(mdo 'grel): gal te blta po nyan po na/ /ci phyir de ni nyan por 'gyur/ /de shes nyid dang rtag mi 'dod/ /bsgyur rung khyad par yin pa'i phyir/ /gcig nyid ma yin tshul gnyis phyir/ /lus gzhan dag gi gzugs bzhin no/ /de bzhin mig gi dbang po ni/ /gzugs la
6b7(mdo 'grel): dmigs pa'i byed mi 'dod/ /yid bral nyid na blta po las/ /gzhan phyir nyan la sogs pa bzhin/ /de ni blta po nyid mi rigs/ /mig la sogs la bltos pa'i phyir/ /yid bzhin yongs su 'gyur phyir dang/ /de bzhin gzugs brnyan 'phyar phyir ro/ /blta po ji
7a1(mdo 'grel): ltar yid dang 'dra/ /dbang po gzhan gyi mi mthong phyir/ /yid ni yang dag nyid du na/ /blta bar mi 'dod bdag bzhin no/ /de ni blta min tshogs pa dag/ rdzas su med phyir de nyid bzhin/ /byed po nyid rung chos gzhan dag /mngon par 'grub phyir dril bu bzhin//
7a2(mdo 'grel): mig ni 'od zer ldan mi rigs/ /dbang po yin phyir dbang gzhan bzhin/ /mchan mo rgyu ba'i mig 'bras snang/ /dbang po snang ba ma yin no/ /mig ni bde sogs bdag nyid min/ /dngos po yin phyir skyes bu bzhin/ /mig ni kun tu song min te/ /g.yo phyir de 'bras
7a3(mdo 'grel): la sogs bzhin/ /yang na mig ni kun 'gro min/ /gzhan don nyid phyir bum pa bzhin/ /gzugs dmigs 'gyur ba'i rgyu yin phyir/ /dper na gzugs bzhin de bzhin no/ /mig ni me dang ldan ma yin/ /dbang po yin phyir pags sogs bzhin/ 'byung chen
7a4(mdo 'grel): dang sogs bdag nyid na/ /me shas che ba ma yin no/ /mig ni yul dang phrad ma yin/ /dbang po yin phyir yid bzhin dang/ /rgyu phyir rgyu dang ldan pa'i phyir/ /yang na gzugs la sogs pa bzhin/ /sna tshogs yul phrad 'dzin mi 'dod/ /phyi don mngon sum 'dzin phyir dang/ /
7a5(mdo 'grel): 'das dang ma 'ongs mi 'dzin phyir/ /dper na mig gi dbang po bzhin/ /sgrub dang 'dra bar bkag pa'i phyir/ /lus la sogs pa ma nges min/ /mig sna yid kyi mtshan nyid gsum/ /yul dang ma phrad 'dzin ma yin/ /lta ba ji ltar rgyas bshad pas/ /nyan dang
7a6(mdo 'grel): snom dang myang ba dang/ /lus kyi dbang po gsal ba dag/ nges par khong du chud par bya/ /sgra dang dri dang? ro? dang reg/ dgag pa'i tshul yang de yin te/ /mkhas pas gzu bo'i blo dag gis/ /ci rigs par ni shes par bya/ cher ba don dam nyid du na/ /myong ba'i
7a7(mdo 'grel): bdag nyid yin mi rigs/ /rnam shes mtshungs par ldan pa'i phyir/ /de las gzhan pa'i sems byung bzhin/ /bde ba phan 'dogs mi 'dod de/ /reg las byung phyir de gzhan bzhin/ /sdug bsngal gnod pa'i bdag nyid min/ /gtan tshigs bstan pas
7b1(mdo 'grel): shes par bya/ /sdug min bde min mi 'dod de/ /'bras bu sred phyir gzhan bzhin no/ /rnam shes ngo bo nyid kyang ni/ dgag pa smra bar 'dod phyir ro/ /'du shes 'du byed rnam gnyis dag /des ni rnam par bshad gyur te/ /mkhas pas gzu bo'i blo dag gis/ /ci rigs bar
7b2(mdo 'grel): ni shes par bya/ /rnam shes don dam nyid du na/ /dngos po rnam rig dngos nyid min/ /dmigs dang bcas phyir 'du shes bzhin/ /yang na 'jig phyir mar me bzhin/ /phung po lnga pa rnam dpyad ba'i/ /sgrub pa ji skad bstan pa des/ /phung po rnams kyi khams shes bya/ /skya
7b3(mdo 'grel): mched rnams kyang shes par bya/ /skye sogs 'dus byas nyid kyis ni/ /mtshan nyid mtshan gzhi'i nyid mi rigs/ /'dus byas yin phyir rtogs bya'i phyir/ /de las gzhan pa nyid bzhin no/ /dngos rnams mtshan nyid yod pa'i phyir/ /ngo bo nyid yod nyid mi 'dod/ /
7b4(mdo 'grel): de phyir gtan tshigs don ma grub/ /don 'gal nyid duAng gyur pa yin/ /sa yis mtshan nyid sa nyid kyis/ /sra ba nyid du mtshon mi rigs/ /lus kyi rnam shes rgyu yin phyir/ /me nyid kyis ni mi rigs bzhin/ /glang gi mtshan nyid glang nyid kyis/ /nog dang lkog
7b5(mdo 'grel): shal sogs mi 'dod/ /khyad par can gyi blos brtag phyir/ /dper na bong bu'i mtshan nyid bzhin/ /gcig na ji ltar mtshan nyid yin/ /des ni de nyid mi mtshon phyir/ /gzhan na ji ltar mtshan nyid yin/ /gzhan gyis gzhan nyid mi mtshon phyir/ /ma
7b6(mdo 'grel): song ba la don dam du/ /'gro? ba yod par mi 'dod de/ /lam yin phyir dang 'gro med phyir/ /dper na ma 'ongs lam bzhin no/ /bgom? la don dam nyid du na/ /'gro ba yod pa ma yin te/ /song dang ma song ma gtogs par/ /bgom pa rtag tu med phyir ro/ /bgom pa song dang
7b7(mdo 'grel): ma song bar/ /brjod pa min la'ang 'gro med de/ /lam yin phyir na 'das pa bzhin/ /yang na ma 'ongs lam bzhin no/ /'gro ba grub phyir 'gro pa med/ /de phyir de ni 'gro mi 'dong/ /'gro po min par 'gro mi rigs/ /'gro dang bral phyir sngon bzhin no /rang las gzhan pa'i don
8a1(mdo 'grel): 'brel la/ /'gro po snyam pa'i blo 'di 'dod/ /blo dang sgra rjes 'jug pa'i phyir/ /dbyug can bzhin min rjes 'gro med/ /rgyun chags yul gzhan 'byung ba yi/ /'du byed rgyun la brten nas ni/ /me la sogs bzhin 'khrul pa'i 'gro /de yang kun rdzob de nyid
8a2(mdo 'grel): min/ /ser skya ba yis rnam brtags pa'i/ /'gro po don dam nyid mi rigs/ /tshogs pa rdzas su med phyir dang/ /yang na g.yo ba med phyir ro/ /gal te tshogs pa rdzas yod de/ /tshogs byed ma gzung gzung med phyir/ /de yi bdag bzhin de mi rigs/ /de dag rdzas su med
8a3(mdo 'grel): phyir ro/ /bya ba lhag ma dgag pa yang/ /phyogs des rab tu bstan pa yin/ /gal te dngos nyid yod 'dod de/ /'khor dang thar pa yod phyir na/ /gang tshe ji ltar rnam brtags pas/ /de dag rang bzhin rnam dpyad na/ /nges bzung med pa de yi tshe/ /ji ltar bcings shing gang
8a4(mdo 'grel): nas thar ngo bo nyid yod ma yin pa/ /sgyu ma rmi lam lta bu dang/ /rang gi rgyu dang rkyen dbang las/ /bdag nyid khyad par 'thob pa 'thad/ /ming dang gzugs ni don dam du/ /'khor bar rigs pa ma yin te/ /'dus byas yin phyir phyi rol gyi/ /sa la sogs pa mi
8a5(mdo 'grel): 'dod bzhin/ /ming gzugs don dam nyid du na/ /ji ltar yang ni thar mi 'gyur/ /skye rang ldan phyir 'jig pa'i phyir/ /phyi rol chu la sogs pa bzhin/ /gang zag yang dag nyid du ni/ /'khor dang thar par mi 'gyur te/ /gdags bya yin phyir khang pa
8a6(mdo 'grel): bzhin/ /brjod bya yin phyir ri dang 'dra/ /yang na gang zag gang zag min/ /rgyu dang ldan phyir bum pa bzhin/ /skye dang ldan phyir 'jig pa'i phyir/ /shes bya yin phyir 'ong ba bzhin/ /gang zag brjod du med phyir bas/ /rdzas su yod par mi 'grub ste/ /dri dang
8a7(mdo 'grel): dkar sngor brjod med pa'i/ /mo gsham bus ni ma nges 'gyur/ /de ltar phung po bdag med cing/ /srog med sems can yod min pa/ /mkhas pas gzu bo'i blo dag gis/ /ci rigs par ni shes par bya/ /lus dang dbang po'i tshogs rnams la/ /de nyid du na
8b1(mdo 'grel): bdag med 'dod/ /rgyu dang ldan phyir ka ba bzhin/ /yang na bsags phyir grogs mkhar bzhin/ /dran pa dang ni ngo shes dang/ /shes skye ba sogs gtan tshigs kyi/ /bdag yod nyid du dam 'cha' ba/ /gtan tshigs rnams ni ma grub nyid/ /gal te dbang bcas lus la ni/ /bdag
8b2(mdo 'grel): yod nyid du sgrub byed na/ /gtan tshigs thun mongs nyid mi 'gyur/ /rjes su 'gro ba med phyir ro/ /gal te bdag sgra don bzhin te/ /'ga' la nye bar gdags pa'i phyir/ /seng ge'i sgra dang 'dra zhe na/ /bdag ni grub pa nyid mi 'gyur/ /ci ste rnam shes yul la ni/ /don bzhin
8b3(mdo 'grel): gzhan la sgrub byed na/ /rtag dang kun 'gro sogs bral phyir/ /'gal ba nyid du 'gyur ba yin/ /de phyir gang la'ang don dam du/ /bcings bas thar ba yod mi 'dod/ /song dang ma song bsgoms pa yis/ /de bzhin sems la lhag ma bshad/ /gang tshe sems ni 'gag
8b4(mdo 'grel): pa la/ /mngon du phyogs shing skyes pa'i tsha/ /gang la gang gis chags par 'dod/ /chags pa 'gags la'ang mi 'dod do/ /gal te skye bzhin chags zhe na/ /de ci gal te skye mngon phyogs/ /ma skyes pa la de mi 'dod/ /zhi med bya ba mi ldan phyir/ /skye bzhin
8b5(mdo 'grel): skyes dang ma skyes par/ /brjod pa min la'ang chags pa med/ /brjod med sems kyang chags min te/ /brjod du med phyir 'dod chags bzhin/ /gal te sems ni chags pa yis/ /rnam par skyes pa chags 'dod de/ /shes la tshon chags blo bzhin na/ /
8b6(mdo 'grel): de'i blo ji ltar chags nyid yin/ /de ltar chags pa med pa'i phyir/ /'dod chags rtogs pa kun rdzob yin/ /'dod chags bzhin du chos rnams kun/ /ci rigs par ni shes par bya/ /dngos po rdzas la brten rigs na/ /de yang de las dbyer yod min/ /de
8b7(mdo 'grel): phyir 'dod chags ji bzhin du/ /sems la'ang chags pa 'thad mi 'gyur/ /'dod chags chags las gzhan mi rigs/ /chags pa ma bzung gzur? med phyir/ /chags pa nyid bzhin tha dad na'ang/ /des na mi chags gzhan bzhin no/ /dngos po rnam par rig pa'i sems/ /'dod
9a1(mdo 'grel): chags las gzhan yod min te/ /dmigs pa la sogs mtshungs phyir dang/ /tha dang rgyu gzhan med phyir ro/ /de phyir 'dus pa cig rang nyid/ /skyes la bltos nas 'dus ba can/ /tha dang bstan pa nyid 'dod de/ /me tog rgyas pas shing bzhin no/ /de
9a2(mdo 'grel): spangs phyir ni mya ngan 'das/ /mi rigs de nyid mi 'thad phyir/ /mya ngan 'das ba don dam du/ /dngos dang dngos med mtshan nyid min/ /gal te mya ngan 'das dngos na/ /dngos po yin phyir de 'dus byas/ /gnyen po ma yin 'dus byas phyir/ /dper?  na 'du byas 'dags bzhin/ /gal te? dngos
9a3(mdo 'grel): med zhig pa bzhin/ /gal te dngos med gzhan rten 'gyur/ /dngos po med phyir zhig pa bzhin/ /de ni gnyen por mi 'dod de/ /gzhan la rten phyir zhig bzhin no/ /de ni 'dus ma byas mi rigs/ /gdag pa gong du bstan ba'i phyir/ /grangs can dag gis rab brtags pa'i//
9a4(mdo 'grel): grol ba'i sems las khyad ci yod/ /nyon mongs rnam rtog gtsub shing las/ /byung ba rang gi ngad zad pa/ /da la bsags pa yod min pas/ /gang zag khyod mthar mi zad 'gyur/ /skye ba med la rtog pa yang/ /de bzhin med phyir tshul nyid mtshungs/ /zad pa can nam
9a5(mdo 'grel): zad med na/ /gang gi zad pas thar pa smros/ /rang bzhin stong nyid rtog pa'i phyir/ /de yi blo yang zlog gyur pas/ /zad med mi zad chos nyid 'thob/ /thob pa med pa'i tshul gyis so/ /yang dag ji bzhin yongs rtogs pa/ /bdag la phan pa 'dod pa dag /lta ngan nad
9a6(mdo 'grel): dri ngan bsgos pa'i/ /sgrags pa'i tshig la brten mi byed/ /phyin ci log dag yod pa'i phyir/ /'dod chags yod par mi rigs te/ /'dod chags bzhin du brtags pa'i phyir/ /rtog pa de yang kun rdzob la/ /sems dang sems las byung ba yi/ /ngo bo nyid phyir
9a7(mdo 'grel): sngar bkag phyir/ /gang gi de ni chags 'gyur ba'i/ /'dod chags chags pa'i dngos nyid med/ /ngas ni sdang dang rmongs la sogs /so sor bshad pa byas par 'gyur/ /de ltar bcings thar ma grub phyir/ /ngo bo nyid med g.yo ba med/ /sa ni don dam nyid du na/ /
9b1(mdo 'grel): sa las gzhan min nyid mi 'dod/ /rgyu dang ldan phyir rlung bzhin dang/ /dngos po yin phyir shes pa bzhin/ /sa las don dam nyid du na/ /chu ni gzhan par mi gzung ste/ /skyi dang ldan phyir rdzas las ni/ /sa gzhan min pa ji bzhin no/ /sa la sogs pa sgra blo dang/ /
9b2(mdo 'grel): las dang mtshan nyid tha dad pas/ /de dag gzhan nyid mi 'dod de/ /bsgrub bya'i chos dang mi ldan phyir/ /gzugs kyi bdag nyid ma gzhan yang/ /tha snyad yod phyir ma nges 'gyur/ /yongs su brtag pa ma grub phyir/ /do don ma grub nyid du 'gyur/ /sgra sogs bye brag tha
9b3(mdo 'grel): dad kyang/ /de phyir de dag 'khrul par 'gyur/ /khyad par brjod par gyur kyang ni/ /'gal bar nges par zlog par 'gyur/ /gnyi ga nyid kyang mi rung ste/ /'gal phyir me la grang dro bzhin/ /gzhan dang gzhan min phyogs dgag pa/ /bstan phyir da yang bzang po min//
9b4(mdo 'grel): gnyi ga'i bdag nyid nyid yin yang/ /kun la grags pa'i cha dper bstan/ /des na gzhan la dpe med pa/ /rab tu skye bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de ni bltos nas 'grub pa ste/ /gnyis las gang yang rung ba zhig/ sngar ma grub na mi 'grub phyir/ /yid kyi rnam par brtags par
9b5(mdo 'grel): zad/ /gnyi gar smra ba thams cad la/ /dgag pa'i tshul yang de nyid do/ /de ltar 'di skad bsgrub bstan pas/ /ngo bo nyid yod nyid ma grub/ /de ltar 'dus byas chos de dag /bsdu bas rnam par brtags pa yin/ /'dus ma byas ni 'gog gnyis dang/ /nam mkha' 
9b6(mdo 'grel): dang ni de bzhin nyid/ /so sor brtags te 'gog pa ni/ /don dam du na dngos po min/ /rtag dang rang bzhin mi 'gyur phyir/ /mo gsham bu yi gzugs bzhin no/ /ma skyes phyir dang rgyu med phyir/ /da bzhin las kyang med phyir dang/ /'dus byas ma bsdus phyir dang
9b7(mdo 'grel): ni/ /'gag pa med pa'i phyir yang ngo/ /gang gis 'bras bu gang 'dod pa/ /de ni de'i rgyu ma yin te/ /ma skyes la sogs gtan tshigs kyis/ /glang chen klad kyi rwa bzhin no/ /ma skyes rgyu dang ldan pa yi/ /'bras bur mi 'dod shes par bya/ /'bras bu yin
10a1(mdo 'grel): phyir sbrang rtsi ni/ /mkha' min sogs rgyu ldan min bzhim? des ni nam mkha' de bzhin nyid/ /phyogs dang dus dang bdag las so/ /'dus ma byas ba ji snyed ga bkag bar mkhas pas shes par bya/ /rdzas dang gtso bo srog la sogs/ /mu stegs brtags pa'i shes bya dag /rig dang
10a2(mdo 'grel): lud la mkhas rnams kyis/ /ci rig par ni dgag par bya/ /rang nge? dad? gzhan gyi grub pa'i phyir/ /dngos po rnams la bdag btags pa/ /mkhas pas bdag med rtogs bya zhing/ /de nyid shes pa'i bdud rtsi btung/ /yang na rnam rtog dra ba yi/ /rgyun 'brel de dag la sogs
10a3(mdo 'grel): par dngos por skye bar 'dzin? brten pas/ /nan gyis byis pa 'khrug par byed/ /gang tshe mkhas pa rig sgron gyis/ /yang dag ji bzhin yongs rtogs pa/ /de che skye bkag de zhi bas/ /spros pa nye bar zhi bar 'gyur/ /de la re zhig bdag skye ba/ /kun rdzob tu yang mi rigs
10a4(mdo 'grel): te/ /bdag nyid yod phyir dper bya na/ /zho ni bdag las mi skye bzhin/ /dngos rnams bdag las ma skyes ste/ /dngos po yin phyir skyes bu bzhin/ /ma skyes pa la bdag med de/ /ma skyes phyir nam mkha' min bzhin/ /nam mkha' i me tog med pa'i don/ /mkha' la sogs pa
10a5(mdo 'grel): khyod 'dod pa/ /de dag nam mkha' i me tog min/ /de phyir kho bo'i phyogs med min/ /gal te rgyu la 'bras bdag yod/ /de las de ni skye snyam zhing/ /dngos rnams de las skye ba ni/ /bdag las skye ba nyid 'dod na/ /de las gzhan min bdag bzhin na/ /rgyu ni rgyu min nyid
10a6(mdo 'grel): du 'gyur/ /ma skyes phyir ni rgyu min pa/ /ci zhig yin zhing gang gi rgyu/ /'bras bu bdag nyid nyid yod na/ /rgyur rtags pa ni don med 'gyur/ /de nyid las ni de skye na/ /bskyed dang bskyed bya gcig tu 'gyur/ /gal te 'o ma zho nyid du/ gnas pas gnod pa med snyam na/ /pha?
10a7(mdo 'grel): ni bu nyid mi 'gyur bas/ /gnod pa med pa ma yin no/ /mi mthun phyogs ni med pa'i phyir/ /gtan tshigs 'gal ba nyid mi 'dod /de ltar re zhig dngos po rnams/ /bdag las skye bar mi rigs so/ ngo bo nyid ni med pa'i phyir/ /gang zhig gang las gzhan du 'dod/ /glad ?
10b1(mdo 'grel): ni ri rtse las/ /rta ru gzhan du mi 'dod bzhin/ /mig la sogs pa rkyen gzhan rnams/ /don dam du ni mig sogs kyi/ /rnam shes bskyed par byed ma yin/ /gzhan phyir rtsi bskyad la sogs bzhin/ /gzugs kyi blo la sogs pa dag /brjod 'dod mig sogs rgyu can min/ /gzhan phyir snga na med
10b2(mdo 'grel): pa'i phyir/ /dper na bum snam la sogs bzhin/ /ma skyes pa yi gzhan nyid ni/ /kun rdzob yin bas don dam min/ /gzhan las skye ba nyid kyang ni/ /rigs pa ma yin gzung bar bya/ /skyes pa brjod du med pa la/ /skye ba don med nyid du 'gyur/ /ma skyes pa la skye med? do/ /ma skyes phyir ni mkha' min bzhin
10b3(mdo 'grel): skye bzhin skye bar 'dod pa la/ /brgal zhing brtag pa mtshungs par 'gyur/ /brjod du med la'ang de med de/ /brjod du med phyir gzhan bzhin no/ /yang na mig la sogs pa dag /brtags pa'i bdag nyid nyid kyis stong/ /byas pa'i phyir dang 'jig pa'i phyir/ /dper na sgyu ma'i 'o ma bzhin/ /bsgrub dang mtshungs
10b4(mdo 'grel): par bkag pa'i phyir/ /cig shos kyi ni the tshom med/ /sgyu ma'i bdag nyid ma brtags pa'ang/ /yang dag tu na log par 'dod/ /la la'i 'dod chags rgyu yin phyir/ /dper na brtags pa de nyid bzhin/ /grags pa'i chas ni de grub phyir/ /kho bo'i dpe ni med ma yin/ /yang na mig la sogs ba ni/ /yang dag
10b5(mdo 'grel): tu na dngos nyid stong/ /byas pa nyid phyir 'jig nyid phyir/ /bdud kyi sprul pa'i sangs rgyas bzhin/ /dngos po rnams kyi dngos nyid gang/ /yang dag tu na dngos de med/ /byas phyir dper na chu yi ni/ /tsha ba nyid dang brtan nyid bzhin/ /dngos rnams rang gi bdag nyid du/ /skye bar 'thad pa ma yin pas//
10b6(mdo 'grel): gzhan gyi dngos por mi skye sta/ /ba glang bod bur ma mthong bzhin/ /rgyu la sogs pa'i rkyen gzhan las/ /skye ba kun rdzob tha snyad yin/ /de phyir khas blangs gnod pa med/ /de dag yang dag nyid ma yin/ /yod la rkyen rnams mi rigs te/ /med la'ang mi rigs yod med phyir/ /de las gzhan bzhin rkyen ma
10b7(mdo 'grel): skyes/ /rkyen rnams su ni ji ltar 'gyur/ /rgyu ni 'bras bu bskyed ma yin/ /de yi stong phyir de gzhan bzhin/ /skye bar 'dod pa'ang de skyes min/ /snga na med phyir de gzhan bzhin/ /des ni skyes dang ma skyes dang/ /skye bzhin bskyed pa mi byed de/ /nyes ba bstan phyir ma skyes pa'i/ /rgyu ni yang dag nyid ma yin/ /skyes pa
11a1(mdo 'grel): dmigs dang mi phrad de/ /skyes la'ang skye ba don med phyir/ /ma skyes pa'ang ma skyes phyir/ /dper na mi skye chos bzhin no/ /skye bzhin phrad par 'gyur snyam na/ /de yang dmigs pa med par med/ /yan lag ma tshang ba la ni/ /skye ba'i bya pa 'jug mi 'dod/ /yang na sems dang sems byung
11a2(mdo 'grel): rnams/ /yang dag dmigs pa yod mi 'dod/ /skye bzhin phyir dang bzung ba'i phyir/ /dper na gzugs la sogs pa bzhin/ /yang na de dag dmigs bcas pa/ /dus gcig phyir na de mi rung/ /de ltar dmigS pa yod min pas/ /gang zhig gang gis dmigs par 'gyur/ /ma skyes pa la 'gag
11a3(mdo 'grel): med/ /ma skyes nyid phyir mkha' min bzhin/ /'gags pa la yang 'gag med de/ /'gag phyir dper na shi ba bzhin/ /mi 'gag pa la'ang ma 'gags phyir/ /da ltar 'jug pa'i mar me bzhin/ /'gag bzhin pa la mi 'dod de/ /dgag pa gong du bstan phyir ro/ /de yang dus mnyam nyid cig gam/ /rang
11a4(mdo 'grel): na dus gzhan 'gyur grang na/ /mi rigs 'gag bzhin yin pa'i phyir/ /dgra bcom sems kyi tha ma bzhin/ /dngos po yod pa don dam du/ /mi rigs skye ba med pa'i phyir/ /mo gsham bu yi yod pa bzhin/ /de phyir bdag po med par 'dod/ /'bras bus stong ngam mi gtong ba'i/ /rkyen zhig bdag
11a5(mdo 'grel): por 'gyur grang na/ /stong pa ma yin des stong phyir/ /dper na mig ni sgra blo bzhin/ /sbyang la sogs na gnas pa yi/ /rgyu tsam yod pa nyi tshe la/ /'bras bu 'bras bur mi 'gyur zhing/ /med pa khyod la 'bras bur 'gyur/ /gal te 'bras bu'i nus 'bras na/ /de las gzhan pa'i rgyu ci yod/ /de
11a6(mdo 'grel): las gzhan pa ma yin la/ /bzhi dang bzhag pa'i dngos mi 'dod/ /'bras bu'i ming tsam nyid la ni/ /dper na mkha' la mkha' gnas bzhin/ /gal te de nyid rgyu yin na/ /gang gis mi gtong de cir yod/ /yod la skye pa med pa'i phyir/ /gang zhig gang gis bdag por 'dod/ /med las
11a7(mdo 'grel): rkyen yang med pa'i phyir/ /gang zhig gang gis bdag por 'dod/ /gal te bum sogs skyes mthong bas/ /mthong la gtan tshig don med de/ /mngon sum dang ni grags pa yi/ /gnod pas gnod par 'gyur zhe na/ /bum pa la sogs skye ba dag /byis pa'i blo dang mthun mthong ba/ /gang
11b1(mdo 'grel): phyir de ni mi 'gog pas/ /de phyir ji skad smras skyon med/ /gzugs la dmigs pa'i blo la ni/ /yang dag tu na rang rig med/ /de ma skyes phyir kho bo la/ /de yi gnod pa med phyir ro/ /mngon sum blo ni don dam du/ /don bzhin nyid du mi rigs te/ /byis ba'i blo dang khyad med phyir/ /mgal me'i 'khor lo'i blo bzhin no/ /de yi
11b2(mdo 'grel): spyod yul dngos min te/ /'dus byas yin phyir bdag blo bzhin/ /gzugs la sogs pa rdzas min phyir/ /nged la mngon sum gnod pa med/ /mkhas pa'i chul la spyod pa la/ /grags pa'i gnod pa yod ma yin/ /de nyid la ni ma rig pa'i/ /ling tog ldongs pa'i tshig skabs min/ /yod la'ang skye ba mi
11b3(mdo 'grel): 'dod de/ /yod pa ci phyir skye bar 'gyur/ /yod pa rags par mi byed de/ /snga na med dang phyis 'byung phyir/ /mig gi rags pa nyid gang yin/ /de ni rkyen gyis ma byas te/ /snga na med phyir rdza ma bzhin/ /shes bya yin phyir za po bzhin/ /za po la sogs kun rdzob tu/ /thun mong yin par 'dod pa'i phyir/ /de phyir red? la
11b4(mdo 'grel): gang du yang/ /dpe yi skyon du 'gyur ba med/ /gal te gsal ba skyon med na/ /gang gi ci gsal ji lta bu/ /gal te 'di dag 'di skad ces/ /dper na mar mes bum pa bzhin/ /yod la sngon gsal byed phyir ro/ /kun rdzob tu yang mar mes ni/ /bum pa snang dang bcas pa dang/ /de yi blo 'am gnyen po dag /skye bar byed
11b5(mdo 'grel): pa nyid yin no/ /mngon par mi gsal gsal ni byed/ /mi gsal phyir na mkha' min bzhin/ /rang tshul gyis kyang dper bya na/ /gtso bo za po bzhin du bstan/ /gal te de yang mngon gsal na/ /za po kun 'gro ma yin zhing/ /rgyu med ma yin shes yod min/ /mi gsal ba yang nyams par 'gyur//
11b6(mdo 'grel): gal te gtso bo mngon gsal na/ /khyod kyi gtso bo bya ba dang/ /dpag yod gsal par thal 'gyur te/ /d ni de dag min par grags/ /gang gis gsal byed gang dag 'dod/ /de dag de gsal byed mi 'dod/ /rgyu nyid la sogs gtan tshigs kyis/ /rgyu spun la sogs zho min bzhin/ /gal te
11b7(mdo 'grel): rgyu spun la sogs la'ang/ /de nus yod phyir dper med na/ /de min rgyu spun la sogs dngos/ /de dag de gsal byed min phyir/ /bdag dang gzhan las skye ba dang/ /bdag nyid yod dang med mi 'dod/ /gnyi gar smra ba yod min te/ /rigs pas gong du brtags phyir ro/ /kun rdzob tu yang 'bras bu ni/ /rkyen
12a1(mdo 'grel): rnams kyis ni gsal mi 'dod/ /de zhig par du rjes sgrub phyir/ /sa la sogs pas bum pa bzhin/ /mig ni kun rdzob nyid du yang/ /blo bur skye bar mi 'dod de/ /spyi dang khyad par ldan pa'i phyir/ /de ni dper na bum pa bzhin/ /'bras bu yin phyir rim skye'i phyir/ /'jig pa'i phyir dang
12a2(mdo 'grel): yongs 'gyur phyir/ /rgyu rkyen nges pa'i phyir dang ni/ /skye ba'i phyir yang shes par bya/ /gal te 'jim gong tshe bzhin la/ /'gags pa mi skye zhig pa'i phyir/ /'bras bu yin phyir dper na ni/ /bum pa bzhin du 'dod ce na/ /ji ltar bum pa bum pa yis/ /ngo bo nyid 'gags mi skye ba/ /de ltar
12a3(mdo 'grel): 'jim gong 'dod na ni/ /'dod pa nyid ni sgrub pa yin/ /'on te 'gags pa rgyun min na/ /des na gtan tshigs 'gal ba nyid /gal te rgyun nyid ma nyams na/ /nges na 'khrul pa nyid du 'gyur/ /mngal nas sngon rol blo la ni/ /mdun rol kho na 'gags blo yod/ /shes bya gzhan gyis de
12a4(mdo 'grel): gzhan phyir/ /yang na blo phyir de 'og bzhin/ /tsai tra la ni sgra blo dang/ /gzugs blo skye ba gang yin pa/ de gnyis mi gcig yul gzhan phyir/ /dper na rgyud gzhan dag gi bzhin/ /de phyir pha rol phyin yang ni/ /dpe med par ni mi 'gyur te/ /blo phyir de yang gcig nyid min/ /gzhan blos
12a5(mdo 'grel): 'khrul? par 'gyur phyir ro/ /gal te med sgra byis pa yis/ /'chi 'pho'i sems la mtshams sbyor med/ /'chi 'pho'i sems phyir dgra bcom gyi/ /tha ma'i sems bzhin sgrub? byed na/ /gtan tshigs ma nges nyid 'gyur te/ /'das pa'i 'chi 'pho'i sems kyis so/ /tshe rabs dran
12a6(mdo 'grel): la sogs yod dang/ /tshul smras phyir na de yang yod/ /'phags pa min pa'i 'chi 'pho'i sems/ /sems gzhan bskyed pa nyid yin te/ /ma rig pa dang bcas pa'i phyir/ /sems de bskyed pa byed pa bzhin/ /gal te lus dang dbang blo dag /rang gi las kyi skyed mi 'dod/ /zhig phyir
12a7(mdo 'grel): dper na bum pa bzhin/ /de phyir 'jig rten pha rol med/ /de nyid kyi ni de ma byas/ /de gzhan gyis kyang ma byas phyir/ /'jig rten rang gi las bskyed min/ /gzhan 'di de la ci zhig gnod/ /las kyis skyed nyid ma yin la/ /dpe ni yod pa ma yin no/ /shing la sogs pa dus skye ba/ /sems
12b1(mdo 'grel): can las kyi dbang gis te/ /sems dmyal gnas dang mtho ris na/ /mtshon dang dpag bsam shing skye bzhin/ /'byung ba rnams la blo gros ni/ /mtshan nyid mi mthun ji ltar 'byung/ /'byung ba sems med rnams las ni/ /shes pa yod pa nyid skye ste/ /skye can yin phyir myos mthu ? me shel la?
12b2(mdo 'grel): ni me bzhin no/ /myos mthu shes yod ma yin pas/ /khyod kyi dpe ni med pa nyid/ /rgyu rnams rigs mthun yin pa'i phyir/ /gtan tshigs kyang ni 'gal ba nyid/ /nang gi 'byung ba rnams kyang ni/ /shes pa yod pa ma yin te/ /sa la sogs pa'i dngos phyir dang/ /'byung ba yin phyir de gzhan bzhin/ /de phyir mngal
12b3(mdo 'grel): nas sngon rol sems/ /sems gzhan sngon du song yin par/ /mkhas pa rnams kyi shes bya ste/ /'dzin pa yin phyir de 'og bzhin/ /be'u yang sngon chad goms byas pas/ /byung ma thag tu zas 'tshol byed/ /zas kyi don du bskyod pa'i phyir/ /dper na dbang po smin pa bzhin/ /khab long gis ni rdo bskyod
12b4(mdo 'grel): bas/ /gtan tshigs ma nges nyid ma yin/ /de ni zas za mthong ba'i phyir/ /ma grub nyid kyang ma yin/ /dbang phyug 'jig rten byed po min/ /la la'i dga' ba'i rgyu yin phyir/ /dper na dbang phyug dga' byed pa'i/ /byed po dbang phyug ma yin bzhin/ /dbang phyug kun gyi rgyur mi 'dod/ /ma skyes phyir dang rgyu med phyir/
12b5(mdo 'grel): de per na nam mkha' i me tog ni/ /kun gyi rgyur ni mi 'dod bzhin/ /'gro ba ma lus 'di dag gi/ /rgyu ni dbang phyug rab tu min/ /sems dang ldan phyir dper na ni/ /glang rdzi 'gro rgyu rab min bzhin/ /dbang phyug gcig pu 'ga' yang med/ /dngos rnams tshogs las 'grub pa'i phyir/ byed po gcig po 'ga' yang med
12b6(mdo 'grel): nga? phyir ma nges nyid ma yin/ gal te mig sogs dbang phyug bcas/ /mang phyir bran? na 'dod ce na/ /ma skyes dbang phyug gcig mi 'grub/ /dbang phyug de las zlog par 'gyur/ /ci ste byed por bcas 'dod de/ /bkong phyir bum sogs bzhin zhe na/ /gal te khyad par ma bstan pa'i/ /byed po yin na grub pa sgrub/ /ci
12b7(mdo 'grel): ste rtag gcig phra sogs kyi/ /khyad par gyis na khyod dpe med/ /khyod kyi de ni mi rtag dang/ /gzugs can skyes nyid skyon du 'gyur/ /gal te seMs can? snod bgrang? ba'i/ 'jig rten sna tshogs rgyu yi las/ /dbang phyug yin na kun rdzob tuAng/ /grub pa nyid la rab tu sgrub/ /des ni dus dang skyes bu dang/ /gtso bo rdul phran khyab 
13a1(mdo 'grel): 'jug dag 'gro ba 'di yi rgyu min par/ /dgag pa khong du chud par bya/ /gal te lta ba'i mun sel ba/ /gang phyir sangs rgyas 'byung de'i phyir/ /de bzhin skye mched skye 'dod na/ /lam du rung ba ma yin no/ /dus med skye ba yod min na/ /gang la lta ba gang zhig 'dod/ /de yod ma yin rtog bya'i
13a2(mdo 'grel): phyir/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba byed po nyid/ /gal te lha dang lha min gcig/ des na ji ltar rtag mi 'gyur/ /gal te lha dang lha min gzhan/ /ji ltar chang par mi rigs 'gyur/ /brjod min bum pa bzhin na yang/ /chad pa ji ltar spong bar 'gyur/ /yin dang ma yin nyid yin yang/ /mya ngan 'das tshe gcig
13a3(mdo 'grel): mnga' med/ /gal te 'gags pa skye gyur na/ /des na ji ltar rtag ma yin/ /'gags pa skye ba med gyur na/ /ji ltar chang smra nyid ma yin/ /rgyu ni rje su med pa'i phyir/ /rtag chang de dag ga la yod/ /de med phyir na ma skyes la/ /rtag ming chad med rigs pa yin/ /gal te sdug bsngal mi bskyed phyir/ /sangs rgyas
13a4(mdo 'grel): rnams ni chos ston pa/ /de phyir de yi 'bras yod phyir/ /skye ba yod par 'dod cen/ /gal te de ni skye 'dod na/ /de ni sngar bzhin skye med phyir/ /skye ba med de 'bras min/ /de yongs shes pa de'i 'bras yin/ /de ni bdag gis byas mi rigs/ /de nyid kyis de ma byas phyir/ /gzhan gyis byas par mi 'dod pe/
13a5(mdo 'grel): gzhan gyis gzhan byed 'gal ba'i phyir/ /sdug bsngal rang rgyud skye mi 'dod/ /sems can la sogs med phyir dang/ /rdzas med phyir dang dbyer med phyir/ /sdug bsngal de la rgyud kyang med/ /gal te mi gsogs 'du byed rnams/ /de nyid du na skye can te/ /seMs can ming du brjod pa'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas nyid du sgrub byod?
13a6(mdo 'grel): na /nged la sangs rgyas skye chos min/ /de phyir de yod ma yin la/ /de bzhin de skye yod min te/ /bdag bzhin sgyu ma bzhin 'byung yod/ /gzugs ni yang dag nyid du na/ /sangs rgyas ma yin rtog bya'i phyir/ /'khor los bsgyur bzhin rnam shes min/ /rang gzhan snang phyir mig
13a7(mdo 'grel): 'phrul bzhin/ /phung? po gzugs can sangs rgyas min/ phung po bsdus pa yin 'dod phyir/ /skye 'jig chos can yin phyir dang/ /shes bya yin phyir gzugs bzhin no/ /sku ni sangs rgyas yin mi rigs/ /de zhig 'jig pa'i skyon phyir dang/ /gzhan gyi mtshan nyid med pa'i phyir/ /bdag bzhin de ni gal
13b1(mdo 'grel): yod/ /brjod min rdzas med min 'dod de/ /snga ma bzhin du gsal ba'i phyir/ /bum pa bzhin du brjod min na/ /de ni ji ltar sangs rgyas 'dod/ /rten cing 'brel par 'byung mthong bas/ /chos dang sangs rgyas mthong ba'i phyir/ /skye med skye yod mi 'dod de/ /snga ma bzhin du bsal phyir ro/ /bdag dang gzhan gnyis rgyu med min/
13b2(mdo 'grel): yod med rtag pa mi rtag min/ /gzhan dang gzhan min skye med pas/ /rtag dang chad pa rnam par spangs/ /skye ba yod min med pa yin/ /yod med ma yin de gang na/ /de mthong ston pa mthong 'gyur bas/ /ji lta bur ni shes par bya/ /de phyir ngo bo nyid smri tshig /'dod pa rnam par nyams pa yin/
13b3(mdo 'grel): gang la skye ba sgyu ma yi/ /skye ba yod pa de la rung/ /smras pa'i nyis pa'i dri bsal ba'i/ /dam chos sgron ma rab bstan phyir/ /mdzad pas phan thogs tshul gyis ni/ /kun rdzob tu ni sangs rgyas mthong/ /de ni de nyid mthong min te/ /sgyu 'dra yang dag ma yin phyir/ /rab tu brtag min rnam shes min
13b4(mdo 'grel): brtag bya ma yin dpe med pa/ /mtshan ma med cing snang ba med/ /rnam rtog med cing yi ge med/ /lta ba'i blo yis rtogs bya ba/ /mthong ba med pas de mthong yin/ de ni don dam nyid du na/ /bdag las ma yin gzhan las min/ /gnyis las ma yin rgyu med min/ yod med ma yin gzhan
13b5(mdo 'grel): ma yin sred med dbang phyug skyes bu dang/ /gtso bo rdul phran la sogs pa'i/ /rgyu las skyes dang gsal bya yi/ /dngos po 'ga' yang yod ma yin/ /de la ngo bo nyid dang las/ /mtshan gzhi mtshan nyid brten pa dang/ /gcig nyid gzhan nyid kun nyon mongs/ /rnam par byang bar bya brten pa/ /dper na
13b6(mdo 'grel): mkha' la lcags 'debs dang/ /chon gyi ri mo'i las dang ni/ /sa bon ngag ni skye med ltar/ /rtog pa thams cad skye ba med/ /rab rib bral bar gyur pa'i mig /rni dag dri ma med pa la/ /skra dang sbrad bu zla gnyis dang/ /rma bya'i mdongs dag mi snang ltar/ /mkhas pa nyon mongs shes bya yi/ /sgrib mun rab
13b7(mdo 'grel): rib bral gyur cing/ /yang dag mkhyen can dri med la'ang/ /de bzhin ci yang snang ba med/ /dper na gnyid log gnyid dbang gis/ /bu dang bud med gzhal med khang/ /gnas la sogs pa mthong gyur pa/ /sad na de la mi thong ltar/ /de bzhin kun? rdzob shes pa dag /blo gros mig ni bye gyur cing/ /mi shes
14a1(mdo 'grel): gnyid dang bral gyur nas/ sang pa'i tshe na mi mthong?/ /dper na mtshan mo mun khrod na/ /'byung po yang dag min mthong ba/ /nyi ma shar cing mig bye'i tshe/ /snang bar gyur pa ma yin ltar/ /de bzhin mkhas pa yang dag gi /shes pa'i nyi mas mi shes pa'i/ /bag chags ma lus bcom pa'i tshe/ sems dang sems byung yul mi
14a2(mdo 'grel): mthong /dngos rnams ngo bo nyid yod par/ /mi mthong dngos nyid ma grub phyir/ /yang na dngos nyid skye med phyir/ /sgyu ma'i glang chen ji bzhin no/ /dngos rnams ngo bo nyid yod par/ /mi mthong kun rdzob skye yod phyir/ /yang na rgyu dang ldan pa'i phyir/ /sgyu ma'i glang chen ji bzhin no/ /dngos rnams med cing bya ba'i blo/ /don bzhin yin par mi 'dod de/ /rtog
14a3(mdo 'grel): pa'i sgo nas grub pa'i phyir/ /tho yo ral ni mi blo bzhin/ /yang na yang dag ma yin blos/ /dmigs bya'i dngos bdag log par 'dod/ /rtog pa'i shes pa'i yul yin phyir/ /mig rgyu la ni chu blo bzhin/ /yod med blos ni rtogbya ba/ bkag phyir de bzhin mkhas rnams kyi/ /rnam par mi rtog blo gros ni/ /skye ba med pa'i tshul gyi skye//
14a4(mdo 'grel): chos rnams thams cad stong pa'i phyir/ de mi gtong ba'i sgo nas kyang/ /mi rtog blo gros mi 'dod min/ /de ni sngar bzhin bkag phyir ro/ /gang phyir stong nyid stong sogs kyi /ngo bo nyid kyi stong de'i phyir/ /mkhas pa stong ba nyid la yang/ /stong pa nyid du lta mi 'gyur/ /dngos po'i bdag nyid snang med pa/ /mi rtog blo yi sbyod yul yang/
14a5(mdo 'grel): don bzhin ma yin dmigs bya'i phyir/ /chu zla la ni zla ba bzhin/ /rnam par mi rtog don yul gyi/ /blo rnams rtog pa med pa'ang rdzun/ /bdag med la sogs ngo bo'i phyir/ /dper na rnam rtog bcas blo bzhin/ /shes bya rnams kun ma grub phyir/ /gang la rnam par mi rtog pa'i/ blo yang skye bar mi 'gyur ba/ /de nyid
14a6(mdo 'grel): mnyam med de mkhyen gsung/ /de rtogs phyir na gang zhig la/ /blo skye med pas sangs rgyas dngos/ /rnam rtog gnyid ni sangs phyir dang/ /rtog pa med pas rgyas phyir ro/ /yongs shes byas sogs mthar thug dang/ /mnyam nyid rtog par gyur pa dang/ /sprul pa dag gis skal ldan gyi/ /blo yi pad+ma kha
14a7(mdo 'grel): 'byed phyir/ /chos rnams mtshan nyid tha dad pa/ /skyed dang dgag pa ma mdzad par/ /mnyam pa nyid kyi mnyam nyid dang/ /bdag gzhan bdag nyid mnyam pa nyid/ /dmigs med nyid du rdzogs rgyas shing/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas med sangs rgyas pas/ /lha mir bcas pa'i 'jig rten na/ /de ni rdzogs sangs rgyas zhes
14b1(mdo 'grel): brjod/ /chos rnams gsal dang gzhag med phyir/ /chos nyid ji lta de bzhin du/ /gang phyir de ni gshegs gyur pa/ /de phyir de ni de bzhin gshegs/ /rtogs bya gtan dang ma lus dang/ /mthar lhung rnam par spangs pa dag /rtogs med tshul gyis rtogs pa yi/ /bder gshegs phyir na bde bar gshegs//
14b2(mdo 'grel): gzhal med gzhal yas rtog pa'i phyir/ /grangs med gzung du med pa'i phyir/ /bsam yas sems yul ma yin phyir/ /bstan min bstan du med pa'i phyir/ /brtag med de ni 'di'o zhes/ /rnam kun rtag tu med pa'i phyir/ /gsal min gsal byed med pa'i phyir/ /zhi ba gnod pa med pa'i phyir/ /brtag
14b3(mdo 'grel): bar brjod de snang med pa'i/ /bdag nyid nyid kyis rnam kun tu/ /rnam rtog med pas rtag phyir dang/ /rtag tu don ni rab sgrub phyir/ /zhi pa ngo bo nyid stong phyir/ /mtshan ma med pa dngos med phyir/ /mtshan ma nyid du mi 'gro dang/ /mtshan ma med phyir de yang yin/ /mtshan ma med phyir snang ba med/ /snang med
14b4(mdo 'grel): phyir yang mtshan ma med/ /mtshan ma med cing snang med pa/ /lta 'dod bdag nyid grol bas mthong/ /mi gnas mtshan ma med pa'i phyir/ /rnam par mi rtog mi gnas phyir/ /spros med rnam par mi rtog phyir/ /dmigs med der 'dzin med pa'i phyir/ /skye ba med pa rnam pa med/ /'gyur ba
14b5(mdo 'grel): med pa 'od gsal ba/ /mnyam pa mi mnyam mu med pa/ /rnam par mi rtog mtshan nyid med/ /mkha' bzhin de la lta med par/ /bdag nyid chen po de dag lta/ /gang dag rnam par mi rtog pa'i/ /gnas pas lhun grub dri med mig /'dud par byed dang yid byed dang/ brjod la sogs pa gsal ba
14b6(mdo 'grel): dag /mgon po la ni phyag 'tshal ba/ /de dag la ni gus phyag 'tshal/ /sangs rgyas la sogs sgo btags pas/ /sgrub dang rjes su mthun par bstan/ /de nyid du ni rnam kun du/ /rnam rtog min phyir brjod mi 'dod/ /'di la tshigs dang ldag 'gyur zhing/ /'di ni sems kyi spyod yul min//
14b7(mdo 'grel): 'di la kun rtog ldog 'gyur zhing/ /shes pa 'jug par mi 'gyur ro/ /grangs med bsod nams tshogs ldan zhing/ /shes bya mdza' yas mkhyen gyur pa'i/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos sku 'di/ /spro ba nyer zhi zhi ba yin/ /sha yi mig gis de lta min/ /lha yi mig gis blta ma
15a1(mdo 'grel): yin/ /rtog bcas rnam rtog med pa yi/ /shes pas kyang ni mthong bar dka' / /mthe ris sdig can yul min dang/ /nyon mongs med pa de bcas min/ /nyi ma dmus long yul min ltar/ /de yang rtog ge'i spyod yul min/ /yod min med min yod
15a2(mdo 'grel): med min/ /de las gzhan min gzhan ma yin/ /phra ba ma yin chen po min/ /gcig min ring min nye ba'ang min/ /de las cung zad ji ltar yang/ /skye ba med cing gsal ba med/ /'di la 'ga' yang gnas pa med/ /'ga' yang bag la zhar mi 'gyur/ /tshangs la
15a3(mdo 'grel): sogs pas gang mi rtogs/ /de ni tshangs pa dam pa yin/ /de ni bden pa dam pa zhes/ /thub pa bden pa gsung pas gsungs/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang dang/ /'phags pa byams pa la sogs pa/ /mkhas pa thub pa mang po dag? /bsnyen med tshul
15a4(mdo 'grel): gyi de bsnyen byed/ /de las dngos nyid mi gzhan dang/ /des ni thugs su chud pa'i phyir/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur 'dod de/ /gzhan gyis ma yin de ma rtogs/ /de nyid bsgom pa goms byed pa/ /dmigs med gnas pa de la yang/ /gang la yid ni chags 'gyur
15a5(mdo 'grel): zhing/ /sdang 'gyur rmongs 'gyur ga la yod/ /sdug bral mi sdug phrad pa las/ /byung ba'i sdug bsngal ga las 'byung/ /'jig rten chos kyis mi gos te/ /pad+ma la ni chus bzhin no/ /'khor ba las ni byung ba ma yin/ /'khor ba las gnod bral ba yin/ /mya
15a6(mdo 'grel): ngan 'das pa thob ma yin/ /mya ngan 'das la gnas dang 'dra/ /nyon mongs ma'i gdung ba med/ /nyon mongs ldan yang nam mkha' bzhin/ /sems med sems med ma yin te/ /snyoms par 'jug pa la gnas phyir ro/ /de ni shes rab lhun po'i rtser/ /'dzegs shing
15a7(mdo 'grel): mya ngan med gyur kyang/ /snying rje'i dbang gis 'jig rten pa/ /mya ngan gdungs dang sdug bsngal blta/ /de ni de tshe snying rje yis/ /brlan pa'i mig gis 'jig rten pa/ /rnam rtog bzo las byung ba yis/ /rtog pa'i dra bas dkris pa dang/ /skye rgan 'chi'i zug rngu yis/ /rma
15b1(mdo 'grel): gtod na bar gyur pa dang/ /gzhan dang bkren dang mdza' ngan dang/ /mgon med dpung gnyen med pa dang/ /sdug bsngal nye bar zhi 'dod pas/ /sdug bsngal chu bo tshar lhud dang/ /sdug bsngal rgyu dag spel ba'i phyir/ /rmongs pa'i yid kyis zhugs ba dang/ /de nyid bdud rtsi zhi ba dang//
15b2(mdo 'grel): spros pa nyer zhi ston ka yi/ /dri med mkha' la blo spyod ba'i/ /snang med mig med kun bltas nas/ /snying rjes shin tu yid gdungs pa/ /ngo la phan phyir brtul zhugs can/ /rdo rje rin chen sra ba'i sems/ /sems can gtso bo legs bslabs pa/ /sbyin pa tshul khrims
15b3(mdo 'grel): bzod pa dang/ /brtson 'grus bsam gtan shes rab brtson/ /dus dan dang ni mthu bzhin du/ /shes rab dran pa sngon 'gro bas/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /sbyin la sogs ma'i ri bo las/ /byung ba'i chu klung bsod nams dang/ /dri med dag ba'i chu
15b4(mdo 'grel): ldan 'debs/ /slod ba kun la dus kun du/ /phyi nad dngos po thams cad kyis/ /dngul dang slong ba'i sdug bsngal kun/ /rnam pa kun tu sel bar byed/ /slod ba rnams kyi bsam pa dag /skad cig skad cig dag rdzogs shing/ /dus kun mi bzad 'bras bu yi/ /'byor cing
15b5(mdo 'grel): dpag bsam shing ltar byed/ /de ni gzhan phan bde skyid pa'i/ /ngad? 'gro kho nar skye bar 'gyur/ /yang na 'dod pas gzhan dag tu/ /gzhan phan bde ba skyed par skye/ /'gro ba de dang de dag tu/ /'khor bcugs rtag bzod mdza' yas dang/ /rgya mtsho bzhin du sgo kun
15b6(mdo 'grel): nas/ /bsod nams chu bos yongs rgyas 'gyur/ /sems gnyen rnam par mi g.yeng dang/ /shes bya rtog? dang mkhas pa'i blo/ /lhan cig skyes dang ldan gyur cing/ /ji srid 'dod pa'i skal par gnas/ /grangs med dpag tu med pa yi/ /ting 'dzin des rtog blo dang ldan//
15b7(mdo 'grel): 'jig rten khams ni mdza' yas dag /rgyan rnams kyis ni brgyan par byed/ /bzo dang las sngon 'du byed dang/ /las kyi rnam smin rab tu ston/ /'gro la phan pa bsgrub 'dod pas/ /ji ltar 'dod pa rab tu skye/ /sangs rgyas skus ni gang ba yi/ /'jig rten khams rnams
16a1(mdo 'grel): ston par byed/ /ji ltar 'dod pa'i dus dang ni/ /zhing du rdzogs par byang chub ston/ /ye shes mig gis shes bya ba'i/ /de nyid thams cad ston par byed/ /chos rnams bzhag pa nyid rtogs shing/ /ming la sogs pa thob pa nyid/ /rdzu 'phrul rnam par
16a2(mdo 'grel): 'phrul pa yis/ /mdza' yas zhing dag g.yo bar byed/ /dus gcig gam ni rim yang rung/ /lus la 'bar dang 'bebs par byed/ /phyogs ni mdza' yas kun tu yang/ /rang gi 'od kyis spro bar byed/ /tshang med rmad byung bsam mi khyab/ /yon tan rin chen 'od 'bar ba//
16a3(mdo 'grel): 'jig rten rtsa lag sangs rgyas rnams/ /'khor dang bcas pa'ang ston par byed/ /gser dang nor bu baiDUrya/ /mu tig rdo rje mthon ka cher/ /ri bo'i dbang po che rnams dang/ /me nyid grang bar bzheng pas byed/ /chen por gyur pa'i lus kyis su/ /rdo rje sogs la mi
16a4(mdo 'grel): chags par/ /ngo mtshar byed cing skad cig gis/ /phyogs kun tu ni 'gro zhing 'ong/ /rang gi lus sam rdul phran la/ /dpag tu med pa'i 'jig rten khams/ /yang dag 'dzud kyang sems can la/ /gnod pa med pa'ang ston bar byed/ /'jig rten khams
16a5(mdo 'grel): rnams phra rab tu/ /phra rab de yi tshad nyid du/ /bsdus pa 'am ni rgyas par yang/ /bzhed pa tsam byed 'og steng kyang/ /de'i tshad 'od dang kha dog dang/ /dbyangs dang spyod lam phun tshogs kyis/ /gdul bya 'dul bar 'dod pa'i phyir/ /tshangs pa la sogs
16a6(mdo 'grel): 'khor du 'gro/ /snang bar 'gyur zhing mi snang 'gyur/ /de dag 'gags kyang mi shes dang/ /gzhan gyis zil gyis gnon par yang/ /byed de snying rjes bskul ba'i phyir/ /'gro ba'i gnas ni brjod rnams su/ /'gro ba dbang byas dgos 'dod pas/ /spobs sogs
16a7(mdo 'grel): kyis ni dman pa la/ /spobs pa'i bde ba rab tu ster/ /dmyal sogs sdug bsngal gyis gdungs dang/ /'od zer btang ba la sogs kyis/ /zhi bar byed cing lha dbang sogs/ /skal pa mnyam par 'gro bar byed/ /gdul bya ji bzhin sprul pa yi/ /sprul pa?
16b1(mdo 'grel): yi ni phyogs bkang nas/ /bstan pa rin chen char phab pas/ /'jig rten 'das pa'i bde ba bskyed/ /dus gsum tshad med lus nyid dang/ /sangs rgyas zhing ni phun sum tshogs/ /'jig rten khams ni dpag med rnams/ /'jig pa dang ni chags pa yang//
16b2(mdo 'grel): rang lus bde bar gshegs zhing du/ /de yang rang lus bdag nyid du/ /rang gi zhing ni bde gshegs skur/ /bzhed pa tsam gyis byin gyis brlob/ /pa spu'i khud dang 'od zer las/ /nam mkha' la ni rol mo'i sgra/ /sprul pa yis ni rab bton nas/ /thos na dga' 
16b3(mdo 'grel): bar 'gyur bas ni/ /mthar thug par ni gsal bar 'gengs/ /ka la bing ka'i sgra dbyangs ni/ /zab cing rgya cher sgrogs pa yis/ /'jig rten rnams ni gsung gis 'gengs/ /mos pa'i dbang dang dbang po bzhin/ /zhi bar ro gcig zhi ba dang/ /gdul bya rnams ni
16b4(mdo 'grel): 'dul pa'i phyir/ /chos 'di rnams ni gsung bar mdzad/ /dman dang bag la nyal bcas dag /bde dang sdug bsngal sogs dang bcas/ /dman dang 'bring dang mchog rnams dang/ /yang dag gya nom sogs de rnams/ /gang la ji ltar ji srid du/ /lus can rnams
16b5(mdo 'grel): kyi sems 'byung ba/ /de rnams de la de bzhin dang/ /de rnyed mang rnams rig par byed/ /lha dang sprul pa phra mo dang/ /de las bzlog par gyur pa dag /kun tu gzugs ni thams cad kyang/ /lha'i mig gis de dag mthong/ /lha dang 'phags pa bkod dang sprul//
16b6(mdo 'grel): gsal po'i sgra dang mir bcas pa dang/ /ring na gnas dang bzlog pa dag /lha yi rna ba 'di yis thos/ /sngon gyi gnas rnams thams cad de/ /sems can rnams dang bdag nyid kyi/ /ming dang rigs kyi bye brag rnams/ /dran zhing gzhan dag gi yang dran//
16b7(mdo 'grel): tha dad 'gro ba'i 'dod pa dang/ /mi 'dod las 'bras sna tshogs gnas/ /'chi dang 'pho dang skye ba rnams/ /lus can kun gyi rig par gyur/ /'jig rten khams ni dpag med du/ /'di yis gdul bya 'dul ba'i phyir/ /dga' ldan gnas 'phos 'jug pa dang/ 
17a1(mdo 'grel): yang dag byang chub mngon par ston/ /rang gi 'dod pas dpag med pa'i/ /'jig rten khams kyi rdul mnyam pa/ /sangs rgyas zhing yang de snyed du/ /sems can rnams kyang de rnyed kyi/ /gdul bya thabs kyis sprul pa ni/ /rang gi zhing nas ma g.yos
17a2(mdo 'grel): par/ /rang gi 'dod pas lus sprul pa/ /re re las kyang de snyed lag /de snyed pa yi mgo las lce/ /so so kun nas de snyed spro/ /lag pa de dag gis bzung ba'i/ /me tog dris bkang sna tshogs pa/ /gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed/ /lhun po'i tshad tsam dri spro zhing/ /rgyas pa
17a3(mdo 'grel): mchog bzang dri dag dang/ /rdzogs sangs rnam par sangs rgyas dag /'gro la phan par byed pa'i mchog/ shin tu gus pas mchod par byed/ /lan cig min par bstod pas bstod/ /rin chen gdugs dang bla re sogs/ /mu tig dra bas yongs brgyan pa/ /tshad
17a4(mdo 'grel): med rin chen myu gu las/ /mche ba lta bu'i 'od zer 'phro/ /steng g.yogs ka ba 'bar bas dga' / /mu tig phreng ba 'phyang ba dang/ /rin chen sna tshogs du ma las/ /sna tshogs las kyi gzo sbyar ba/ /rin chen 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang/ /'od zer sgron ma brgya
17a5(mdo 'grel): snyed 'bar/ /shin tu mtho pa mkha' mnyam pa/ /rin chen 'od kyis phyogs khyab byed/ /de yi rnam grangs du ma yi/ /bstan pa rtag tu mkhas pa des/ /thos nas gus pa gzhan dag la/ /lhag chad med pa'i yi ges ston/ /mkhas pa legs bar bslab pa des/ /bskal
17a6(mdo 'grel): pa grangs med dpag med par/ /bsod nams ye shes stobs kyis 'phags/ /pha rol phyin rnams pha rol phyin/ /'di ni 'di ltar skyes bu mchog /rdzogs sangs nyi mar gyur nas ni/ /gdul bya'i sems can pad+ma'i mtsho/ /bstan pa'i 'od kyis rgyas par
17a7(mdo 'grel): byed/ /dri ma med pas dri ma sbyong/ /gangs phreng bsil ba'i 'od zer dang/ /tsan dan pas lhag bsung gi chus/ /lus can yid kyi nyon mongs mes/ /rab tu gdungs pa zhi bar byed/ /skye bo'i 'khor ba dpa' klong can/ /'chi ba'i chu srin bcas mtsho las/ /theg pa
17b1(mdo 'grel): gsum gyi gru chen gyis/ /'di yis skye bo myur du sgrol/ /bdag gis legs bshad chu rgyun gyis/ /thog ma med dus 'gro ba rnams/ /shin tu skom pa sel bar byed/ /yon tan gyis phongs kyang sel byed/ /srid ba'i dgon bar lam stor bas/ /ma rig bas bsgribs lam ston byed//
17b2(mdo 'grel): 'gro rnams shes rab mig bye nas/ /mya ngan 'das par phyin par byed/ /nyon mongs sbrul gdug mche bas btab/ /rang la phan pa'i thabs la brgyal/ /ye shes sman ni yang dag pa/ /rig pa bstan pas 'gro rnams gso/ /srid par mgon med srog chags rnams/ /yun
17b3(mdo 'grel): ring gnyid kyis log pa la/ /bstan pa lnga yi sgra dag gis/ /snying rje yi ni sad par byed/ /yun ring 'khor ba'i btson ra na/ /srid pa'i lcags sgrog gis bsdams pa/ /bdud bzhi las ni rgyal byas nas/ /bcings pa las ni grol bar byed/ /byin za ngoms pa med pa
17b4(mdo 'grel): bzhin/ /lha dang mi'i yul dag gis// shes rab bdud rtsi'i ro bzang pos/ /lus can rnams ni tshim par byed/ /'khor du stong nyid seng ge yi/ /sgra chen spra ni sgrags pa yis/ /gdul dka' mu stegs myos pa ni/ /shes pas myos pa'i nga rgyal sel/ /dbang po chen po'i gzhu 'dra ba/ /
17b5(mdo 'grel): 'dom gang 'od kyis kun tu bskor/ /gzugs nas 'bar ba yongs rdzogs pa'i/ /mtshan dang dpe byad rnams kyi dpal/ /dpal nyid rgyan du gyur pa yi/ /yid dang mig ni 'phrog byed pa'i/ /gzugs ni mnyam pa'i gzugs med pa/ /mdzes pa thams cad zil gyis gnon/ /de yi rnam
17b6(mdo 'grel): pa drug cu dang/ /ldan pa'i gsung gis cho 'phrul dang/ /bcas pas lha dang lha min mi/ /la sogs yid ni dga' bar byed/ /de yis gsung dang sku rnams kyis/ /yid bzhin nor bu dpag bsam ltar/ /gdul ba'i dbang gis phyogs kun tu/ /sna tshogs bdag po'i gzuD
17b7(mdo 'grel): su bsgyur/ /de dag de ltar srog grangs med/ /dpag med rmad du byung ba'i gnas/ /che ba'i bdag nyid mkhas pas lam/ /'di la brten nas thob par 'gyur/ /dbu ma snying po las de kho na nyid kyi shes pa 'tshol ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// //
18a1(mdo 'grel): rtog par dka' ba'i lugs 'di la/ /rtogs pa'i nus pa chung gyur pa/ /gnas min skrag pa'i dman mos dag/ yang dang yang du rtsod bar brtsom/ /ston pa'i rnam par mi rtog blo/ /sku la rten pa ma yin te/ /lus can yin phyir ba rdzi yi/ /lus la ji lta ba
18a2(mdo 'grel): bzhin zer/ /yang dag lta sogs lam gyis ni/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub cher/ /'dren byed yang dag rab rtog byed/ /byang chub yin phyir slob ma'i bzhin/ /ston pa'i dbang po khyad 'phags pas/ /kun mkhyen ye shes srid pa yin/ /lam gcig na yang 'dod pa bzhin
18a3(mdo 'grel): 'ga' yi so so yang dag rig/ shes bya'i sgrib pa zad byed pa/ /de yang lam de nyid kyis yin/ /sems las byung ba'i sgrib yin phyir/ /nyon mongs sgrib pa ji bzhin 'dod/ /theg chen du yang lam 'di yis/ /kun rig thub pa 'thob byed de/ /theg pa gzhan nyid yin pa'i phyir
18a4(mdo 'grel): rang rgyal theg pa bzhin du 'dod/ /mdo sde sogs su ma bsdus dang/ /lam gzhan nye bar ston phyir dang/ /theg chen sangs rgyas gsungs pa yin/ /rig byed mdza' pa'i lta ba bzhin/ /chad par lta ba ji bzhin du/ /rgyu dang 'bras bur skur 'debs pas/ /sde pa bco brgyad
18a5(mdo 'grel): khongs su yang/ /gtogs pa med pas ma yin nges/ /gzugs la sogs la dmigs pa'i blo/ /rang rig nyid du yod pas kyang/ /mngon sum gnod pa gang yin des/ /skye med smra ba de la gnod/ /srid pa rnams ni de nyid du/ /skye med ces bya'i khyad par gyis/ /mngon
18a6(mdo 'grel): sum dang ni grags pa dag/ gnod pa 'di la med ce na/ bgrod min la yang yang dag tu/ /bgrod par bya ste bud med phyir/ /bud med gzhan bzhin zer ba yi/ /skyon bcas tshig kyang skyon med 'gyur/ /bden pa mthong ba de nyid min/ /de nyid med par thal bar
18a7(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ /nam mkha' i lha yis bstan pa ltar/ /de nyid yin bar mi 'dod do/ /phyi rol skye mched yod pa las/ /der snang ba yi blo 'byung bas/ /yod par rigs te sems nyid ni/ /yod la dga' ba ji bzhin gyis/ /gal te sems yod mi 'dod na/ /khyod kyi 'gro ba
18b1(mdo 'grel): sems tsam min/ /'gro ba phyogs su bya ba dang/ /gtan tshigs bsgrub ba khyod la med/ /de pa sngar smras rigs pa ni/ /rang gi phyogs nyams dogs bas gzhan/ /mi 'dod gyur pa gang smra ba/ /de ni rigs pa ma yin no/ /ston pa'i rnam par mi rtog blo/ /bdag med pa la dmigs bar
18b2(mdo 'grel): 'dod/ /yul can gyi ni blo yin phyir/ /gang zag bdag med pa bzhin no/ /sbyor las byung sogs blo dag ni/ /'byung ba gal te 'gog byed na// shes bya kun tu ma grub pas/ /blo gang gang gi rjes 'byung ba/ /de ni rtog med sngon byang chub// shes bya de nyid ma log phyir/ /de yi ngo bo
18b3(mdo 'grel): rnam rtog sogs/ /bral ba'i blor ni mngon 'dod pas/ /de yi rte ni 'gog byed na/ /grub pa nyid ni rab sgrub byed/ /de nyid zhi nyid sogs bstan pa/ /rtog pa rnams kyis sgro btags pa'o/ /mthong ba med pa rtog med pa/ /brjod pa med pa byed med pa/ /'tsho ba med brtsom med pa//
18b4(mdo 'grel): de na dga' med gnas med pa/ /de tshe lam ni de nyid kyis/ /sangs rgyas byang chub 'dod phyir bdag/ grub pa sgrub pa'i skyon yang yin/ /bsgom nyid la yang brtag par bya/ /ji ltar lud dang mi 'gal bar/ /rjes su dpag pa'i rjes 'brangs pa/ /'di ltar de nyid bsgom pa
18b5(mdo 'grel): ste/ dpe ni de bzhin mkhas pas 'dod/ /gang gis de rtog de sangs rgyas/ /gzhan ni mi'ang du mtshungs/ /theg chen sangs rgyas gsung min zhes/ /zer ba 'di rang gtan la dbab/ /sngar bstan pa yi lam 'di yis/ /sangs rgyas byang chub thob mi nus/ /sdug bsngal rnam
18b6(mdo 'grel): par rtogs byed phyir/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa bzhin/ /rjes su dpag pas gnod pa yang na gzhan gyi phyogs la 'byung bar 'gyur/ /dpe ni ma grub pa nyid kyang/ /de la zhugs pa bzlog par dka' / /mi skye zad bar shes pa ni/ /ji bzhin don gyi don dam min/ /'khrul
18b7(mdo 'grel): bzhin rnam rtog bcas pa'i phyir/ /de rtogs ji ltar de nyid yin/ /theg pa gzhan nyid rgyu yin zhes/ /zer ba de yi lan yang btab/ /ji ltar sgrib pa yod bzhin du/ /dgra bcom mya ngan 'da' bar rib/ /ma rig nyon mongs can spangs pas/ /de ni grol gyur sangs rgyas bzhin/
19a1(mdo 'grel): de ni mi bden med pa'i phyir/ /dngos dang sprul ba'i sangs rgyas la/ /yang dag tu na theg chen gyi/ /lam gyi sangs rgyas byang chub dag/ sgrub min rtog bcas mtshan bcas phyir/ /'jig rten pa yi lam bzhin no/ /ji srid 'ga' zhig skrag pa yis/ /theg pa la ni sprul zhes 'khrul/ /'khri shing
19a2(mdo 'grel): bsdogs par shes pa ni/ /gnyen po'i phyogs kyi shes par 'byung/ /des na gtan tshigs ma des bcas/ /rgol ba'i smra ba spangs pa yin/ /kun nas nyon mongs gnyen po'i phyir/ /'dis ni lan yang btab pa byas/ /theg chen sangs rgyas gsungs yin te/ /bdag med la sogs ston pa
19a3(mdo 'grel): dang/ /dkon mchog gsum gyi bdag nyid che/ /ston phyir slob ma'i theg pa bzhin/ /phyir rgol tshad mas gnod pa'i phyir/ /de yi gtan tshigs ma grub nyid/ /bla ma kun dga' pa rta li/ /sdug bsngal phung po sa ba te/ /'char byed stong pa 'char ba dang/ /gang po spangs pa ram pa dang
19a4(mdo 'grel): mya ngan 'das dang yul 'khor skyong/ /zhes bya gzhan yang 'gro ba'i mdo/ /rtsa ba'i sdud par ma tshang bas/ /rgyas pa min par rtog par bya/ /thams cad mkhyen nyid thob pa'i lam/ /yang dag lta ba sngon 'gro ba/ /gang phyir theg chen las gsungs pa/ /de phyir gtan tshigs ma
19a5(mdo 'grel): grub nyid/ /sdug bsngal skye ba bkag bstan pas/ /ma skyes sdug bsngal yin mi 'dod/ /skyes pa sdug bsngal ngo bo na/ /de stong ci'i phyir khas mi len/ /'dus byas yin phyir sgyu ma 'am/ /zag med phung po ji bzhin no/ /khyod ci sdug bsngal bden 'dod pa/ /yang dag lta
19a6(mdo 'grel): ba'i blos 'dod pa/ /tshor ba sdug bsngal sdug bsngal yin/ /skye sogs sdug bsngal nyid ji ltar/ /mi rtag phyir na sdug bsngal na/ /rgyu dang lam yang sdug bsngal nyid/ /sdug bsngal rgyu yin phyir zhe na/ /kun 'byung sdug bsngal nyid du 'gyur/ /sdug bsngal nyid ni tshig ce?
19a7(mdo 'grel): phyir/ /de shes ji ltar sdug bsngal shes/ /sdug bsngal yul can shes pa de/ /de nyid du na bden pa min/ /sdug bsngal nyid du de shes phyir/ /phung sogs sdug bsngal blo bzhin no/ /rgyu ni sdug bsngal rgyu nyid du/ /mi rigs kun 'byung bdag nyid phyir/ /ral gris bshaD
19b1(mdo 'grel): sogs bzhin du 'am/ /sems byung yin phyir lam bzhin no/ /sdug bsngal rgyu yi yul can gyi/ /blo de brdzun pa nyid du 'dod/ /rgyu sogs rnam par rtog ba'i phyir/ /sdug bsngal rgyu yi blo can bzhin/ /skye med 'gag pa yod min te/ /sngar smras pa yi dgag pa nyid/ /skyes pa 'gag na ma skyes la//
19b2(mdo 'grel): nam mkha' i me tog bzhin mi rigs/ /gang tshe skyes pas de ma skyes/ /'gog pa nyid kyis 'gog yin par/ /mi 'dod de tshe mkhas ba khyod/ /ci zhig bden pa yod par smros/ /ma skyes pa yi 'gog pa yang/ /yang dag tu na 'gog pa min/ /ma skyes pa yis 'gog yin phyir/ /so sor brtags
19b3(mdo 'grel): min 'gog pa bzhin/ /'gog pa'i ngo bo nyid med na/ /khyod kyi lam gyi ci zhig len/ /ma skyes lam yang ji ltar yin/ /gang gis ci zhig thob par byed/ /lam gyi ngan grol thob min te/ /'dus byas yin phyir gzhan bzhin nam/ /'gog pa la ni dmigs pa'i phyir/ /de las gzhan
19b4(mdo 'grel): pa'i 'gog pa bzhin/ /spyi la dmigs pa yin phyir ram/ /'dus byas yin phyir de bzhin du/ /sdug bsngal la sogs mthong ba brdzun/ /brdzun pa'i shes pa bzhin du 'dod/ /'dis ni yang dag rtog pa dang/ /rtsol ba sogs kyang brdzun nyid phyir/ /lam gyi bden pa don
19b5(mdo 'grel): dam du/ /mi bden par ni grub pa yin/ /des na bsgom de mi rigs la/ /sdug bsngal la sogs ma mthong rigs/ /mthong ba rnams kyi ma mthong gzugs/ /thams cad du yang de bzhin gnas/ /gal te blo ngan 'ga' zhig ni/ /bden ba mthong ba mi 'dod phyir/ /khyod ni thar bar rig
19b6(mdo 'grel): min te/ /byis pa'i skye ba bzhin zhe na/ /sdug bsngal des sdug ma skyes phyir/ /su zhig thar pa gang la 'dod/ /grol ba'ang sgyu ma byas ba bzhin/ /'khrul ba'i dbang gis bstan pa yin/ /sdug bsngal la sogs gang dag rnams/ /gtan du ma mthong grol bar 'dod/ /de phyir dpe yang
19b7(mdo 'grel): yod min la/ /de bzhin gtan tshig ma grub nyid/ /yang dag lta ba sngon 'gro ba'i/ /ji ltar 'byung ba'i lam 'di nyid/ /theg chen du yang nyer bstan pas/ /de phyir gtan tshigs ma grub nyid/ /bden pa gnyis la nyer brten nas/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos bstan te/ /'jig rten kun
20a1(mdo 'grel): rdzob bden pa dang/ /don dam nyid kyi bden pa'o/ rig byed mthar yang legs bstan gang/ de kun sangs rgyas gsungs pa yin/ de phyir dpe ni ma grub ste/ /the tshom zan brtag par gyis/ /yod dang med pa'i rtog bral zhing/ /shes rab spyod pas gnas pa la/ /rgyu
20a2(mdo 'grel): dang 'bras bu skur 'debs pa'i/ /lta ba gang yod 'dod pa gang/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu 'brel pa dag/ 'jig rten grags pa ji lta bar/ /de bzhin de ni 'gog pa min/ /de phyir gtan tshigs ma grub nyid/ /dngos po mngon sum spyod yul gyi/ /kun rdzob byas pas bzung ba 'di/ /'dir ni lan yang snga ma
20a3(mdo 'grel): bzhin/ /de yis gnod pas mi gnod do/ /mkhas pa'i lugs kyi brtags pa la/ /grags pas gnod pa ma yin te/ /ji ltar chos bdag med pa dang/ /skad cig ma zhes brjod pa bzhin/ /gzugs kyi de nyid byis rnams kyis/ /yul nyid 'gyur ba ma yin te/ /nang la rig pa ma sbyangs phyir//
20a4(mdo 'grel): bdag sogs stong pa ji bzhin no// byis rnams blo la yang dag tu/ /gzugs kyi de nyid ldan pa min/ /ma rig rab rib kyis bsgribs phyir/ /mya ngan 'das? pa'i spyod yul bzhin/ /srid pa rnams ni yang dag tu/ /skye med ces bya'i khyad par gyis/ /mngon sum dang ni grags pa dag/ gnod pa
20a5(mdo 'grel): bstan pas gnod pa med// yang dag par na chos rnams ni/ /zhi zhing mkhas dang mnyam pa la/ /bud med nyid kyang ma grub na/ /dpe yi gnod par ji ltar 'dod/ /bgrod bya bgrod pa bgrod po dang/ /gsum po ji ltar yod bzhin du/ /bgrong min bgrong par sgrub byed pa/ de bzhin skyon
20a6(mdo 'grel): zhig 'dogs par 'dod/ /grags pas gnod pa nyid ni bden/ /khyad par can lam grub phyir/ /des ni mi mthun phyogs 'di la/ /bdag gi phyogs gnod nus pa med/ /spros pa med cing rang rig la/ /rnam rtog dri ma dang bral ba/ /du ma nyid dang gcig nyid bral/ /zhi ba de nyid mkhas
20a7(mdo 'grel): rigs pa/ /nam mkha' i lha yis bstan pa nyid/ /de nyid yin par mi rigs kyang/ /tshangs pa dang po'i lha las byung/ /lha de la gus de skad smra/ /gzugs sogs skye mched snang ba nyid/ /blo yi yul du 'dod pa yin/ /de yi yod pa thun mong nyid/ /bsgrub bya zhe nang yang 'ded?/
20b1(mdo 'grel): 'byung las gyur sogs ngo bo yi/ /gzugs sogs skye mched yod nyid ni/ /bsgrub bya'o zhe na dpe yang med/ /phyir rgol rtog ges gnod pa'ang yod/ /gzugs sogs skye mched 'byung ba dang/ /'byung ba las gyur mtshan nyid min/ /rang bdag rnam par snang ba'i blo/ /skyes pa'i rgyu phyir yid bzhin no//
20b2(mdo 'grel): sems dang sems byung ngo bo nyid/ /sems dang sems byung rab tu grags/ /gtan tshigs dang ni dpe yang med/ /phyogs kyang rnal 'byor pa la med/ /rnam shes tsam zhes bya ba 'dir/ /phyi rol don ni bzlog pa'i phyir/ /tshig don 'di ni de spang? zer/ /bdag gi phyogs nyams ji ltar
20b3(mdo 'grel): 'dod/ /'ga' yi tshig gis smrar med par/ /bya bar mi nus zhi ba'i blo/ /snying po yod dam snying po med/ /mkhas pas de la dpyad par gyis/ /dbu ma'i snying po las nyan thos kyi de kho na nyid la 'jug pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// //rang gi lugs kyi nga rgyal gyi/ /mkhaS
20b4(mdo 'grel): par rlom gzhan 'di skad smra/ /de nyid bdud rtsir 'jug pa yang/ /rnal 'byor spyod pas legs bstan zer/ /dngos po gnyis po med pa'i phyir/ /gnyis dngos med pa'i yod pa ni/ /yod la sogs pa'i blo yi yul/ /dam pa'i don du 'dod do le/ /med pa'i dngos po bdag med pa/ /de bzhin
20b5(mdo 'grel): nyid dang chos gnas dang/ /rnam par mi rtog blo'i gzung ste/ /de shes par ni bya ba yang/ /dmigs pa la ni brten byas nas/ /mi dmigs pa ni rab tu skye/ /mi dmigs pa la brten byas nas/ /mi dmigs pa ni rab tu skye/ /brtags pa nye bar mi dmigs shing/ /gzhan gyi dbang
20b6(mdo 'grel): yang gzung med pas/ /de nyid mthong ba yongs grub pa'i/ /ngo bo nyid la blta ba yin/ /brtags pa rgyu mtshan bcas phyir dang/ /gzhan du gnyis po med phyir dang/ /kun nas nyon mongs dmigs pa'i phyir/ gzhan dbang yod pa nyid du 'dod/ /shes rab pha rol phyin tshul 'di/ /
20b7(mdo 'grel): thams cad mkhyen nyid thob pa yin/ /skye dang 'gag la sogs pa dag/ dgag pa lhur len ma yin no/ /'dir bshad de bzhin gshegs bka' kun/ /kho bo cag gi tshad ma yin/ /tshad ma yid ches lung yin phyir/ /bzang po dag ni sgrub par byed/ /lung gzhan dag gis the tshom
21a1(mdo 'grel): dang ? log pa'i blo can gzhan mi byed/ /de phyir de dag sgrub gzhug phyir/ /rig pa ldan pa'i tshul btsal bya/ /gnyis med pa yi dngos po ni/ /rig pa ma yin 'gal ba'i phyir/ /nam mkha' i me tog med dngos sam/ /de dngos yin par brtag mi bya/ /gal te yang
21a2(mdo 'grel): dag brtags med phyir/ /de la dbye pa med snyam na/ /mtshan gzhi mtshan nyid rnam gzhag la/ /de ni mtshungs phyir lan ma yin/ /gal te de dngos ma btang gang/ /de ni de dngos yin 'dod na/ /de ltar dngos nyid mi gtong ba/ /de phyir de ni dngos ma yin/ /des na de nyid gzigs
21a3(mdo 'grel): rnams kyi/ /mkhyen pa dngos med dmigs par 'gyur/ /de yang chos bdag med yin te/ /med pa'i blo yis rgyu phyir ro/ /gal te dngos med dmigs pa'i blo/ /rnam par mi rtog yin 'dod na/ /des na gzugs blo mi rtog pa'ang/ /dam pa yin pa nyid du 'gyur/ /gal te gzung
21a4(mdo 'grel): bar snang 'dod pas/ /gzugs blo yang dag ma yin na/ /des na gtan tshigs 'khrul 'gyur zhing/ /dam bcas pa yang nyams par 'gyur/ /ngo bo nyid la dmigs yin na/ /ston pa'i byang chub rtog can dang/ /dmigs pa can du 'gyur ba dang/ /rnam par mi rtog blor mi 'gyur
21a5(mdo 'grel): sems tsam du ni dmigs pa dang/ /gzugs la sogs pa mi 'dzin na/ /khas blangs pa dang grags pa yi/ /dam bcas pa la gnod par 'gyur/ /de ltar snang ba skye ba'i phyir/ /rmi lam gzugs sogs blo bzhin du/ /gzugs la sogs pa don med par/ /rnam par
21a6(mdo 'grel): shes zhes byar mi rung/ /gang phyir rmi lam la sogs pa'i/ /rnam shes chos la dmigs pa'i phyir/ /de phyir dpe yang med pa dang/ /yul la skur ba 'debs par 'gyur/ /gal te yul du snang ba nyid/ /sems kyi dmigs pa yin 'dod na/ /yul du snang ba ma gtogs
21a7(mdo 'grel): par ? sems kyi bdag nyid gzhan ci yod/ /gzhan ltar skyes phyir de gnyis snang// shel dang 'dra bar mi 'dod de/ /nye bar bzhag las der skye bas/ /shel gyi skad cig min phyir ro/ /de 'gags gzhan ni skyes pa la/ /de'i blo ni 'khrul bar 'dod/ /gnyis su snang med nus pa ni/ /?
21b1(mdo 'grel): min phyir yul snang bzhin/ /sems ni rang dang gzhan snang ba/ /lhan cig 'dra bar 'byung ba'i phyir/ /gzugs brnyan bzhin du mi 'dod de/ /de phyir gnyis su snang ma yin/ /gal te tshad ma 'bras yod phyir/ /gnyis su snang bar 'dod ce na/ gzhan duAng de dag 'grub pa'i phyir/ /rtag pa de yang mi 'dod do/ /yul du
21b2(mdo 'grel): snang ba 'dzin pa yis/ /rnam par shes pa skye bzhin pas/ /gzhal bya gang yin 'jal byed pa/ /des na de ni tshad mar 'dod/ /bstan du med pa'i ngo bo nyid/ /de bzhin rtog pa gang thob pa/ /gal te smra 'dod bsgrub bya ba/ /phyi don sems kyi dngos nyid de/ /rnam par shes pa'i yul yin phyir/ /dper na de ma
21b3(mdo 'grel): thag bzhin na/ /des na sems byung so so yi/ /gtan tshig 'khrul ba nyid du 'gyur/ /mdo las sems tsam gsungs pa ni/ /byed po za po dgag phyir ro/ /gal te rnam brtags don mthong bas/ /rnam par shes bsgrub byed na/ /brtags pa ma yin don yod phyir/ /yul med par ni mi 'gyur ro/ /rmi lam
21b4(mdo 'grel): la yang brtags min pa'i/ /ngo bo nyid blos ma nges 'gyur/ /dmigs pa med par mi 'dod des/ /dpe ni rab tu ma grub phyir/ /ci ste blo yul rnam gnyis te/ /gcig dang 'dus pa yin snyam na/ /rig pas yongs su brtags pa na/ /de ni gnyi gar mi rigs so/ /de la gzugs rdul gcig bu ni//
21b5(mdo 'grel): gzugs blo'i skyong? yul ma yin te/ /de snang nyid du mi 'gyur phyir/ /dbang gzugs spyod yul ma yin bzhin/ /phrar ba gzugs ni du ma de/ /sems kyi spyod yul yin mi 'dod/ /rdzas su yod pa ma yin phyir/ /dper na zla ba gnyis bzhin no/ /de la gal te pha rol po/ /bsags pa min
21b6(mdo 'grel): pa'i gzugs sems kyis/ /spyod yul min par sgrub byed na/ /der na grub pa nyid sgrub 'gyur/ /ci ste bsags pa'i gzugs la ni/ /gtan tshigs ma grub nyid 'gyur te/ /gzugs gzhan dag gi bsags pa ni/ /der snang blo ni skye phyir ro/ /de ni dmigs nyid yin 'dod de/ /der snang blo yi rgyur
21b7(mdo 'grel): 'gyur phyir/ /'dod chags bzhin te de'i phyir/ /khyod dam bcas la rjes dpag gnod/ /gal te rang blo dmigs med de/ /rang gi sa bon las skye'i phyir/ /yid blo bzhin 'dod brtags min phyir/ /khyod kyi dmigs bcas nyid du 'gyur/ /dmigs pa med pa rjes dpogs pas/ /de ni blo nyid ma yin
22a1(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ /'dus pa dam ni ma bcas pas/ /da 'gog pa ni gnod pa med/ /mi rtog blo ni spang min te/ /'phags phyir rnam par mi rtog phyir/ /de skye thar pa ga la yod/ /de yi sa bon ma bcom phyir/ /gnyis kyi 'du shes 'jug pa na/ /sna tshogs snang pa rab tu skye/ /de yi sna tshogs snang
22a2(mdo 'grel): gang dang/ /de rang sa bon las skye'i phyir/ /zhi ba de la nus phul dang/ /rang bdag nyid dang gzhan las so/ /rnam par shes pa'i ming gis ni/ /de la bdag tu btags par 'gyur/ /gnyis yod sgyu ma lta bu dang/ /zad can ma zhi bdag med dang/ /gnyis med mi zad yang dag dang/ /'chi med go 'phang
22a3(mdo 'grel): mchog rtogs nas/ /de la 'dra ba med pa'i phyir/ /rnam par rtog pa rnam ldog pas/ /mi rtog blos ni dmigs byas pa'i/ /grol ba khyad par med par 'gyur/ /yang na sems tsam bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /sems las byung rnams sems las ni/ /tha dad med par khas blang bya/ /yang na rnam rig
22a4(mdo 'grel): tsam mi 'grub/ /yang na tshor sogs 'dus pa la/ /sems su gdags par 'dad par gyis/ /des na gzhan gyi rjes smra dang/ /rang gi gzhung yang btang bar 'gyur/ /kun nas nyon mongs rnams byang las/ /gal te sems ni rdzas 'dod na/ /tshor sogs de bzhin skye ba'i phyir/ /de grub pas
22a5(mdo 'grel): na gnad pa med/ /utpal rtsa ba nus mang las/ /lo ma la sogs rgyun 'byung ltar/ /de bzhin sems rdzas med pa las/ /rgyun rnams sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur/ /gnyen pos skye bar mi 'gyur zhing/ /byed rgyu yod na skye bar 'gyur/ /'di las sna tshogs skyes la sogs//
22a6(mdo 'grel): brtags ba mi 'dod rdzas med phyir/ /de la dmigs pas mi 'grol te/ /blo 'gag med pa'ang ma yin pas/ /de phyir kun rdzob don dam duAng/ /bdag tu smra dang 'dra mi 'gyur/ /gzugs la sogs ba stong pa ste/ /ngo bo nyid kyis ma skyes phyir/ /rdzas su med phyir 'jig pa'i phyir/ /sgyu ma bzhin gis?
22a7(mdo 'grel): chaD med 'gyur/ /gzugs la skor ba yod kyang ni/ /yang dag ji bzhin rtogs gyur pa/ /de yod ma yin de yi tshe/ /lag 'dzin ci phyir mi ldog 'gyur/ /gnyis su rnam par rtog pa dag /sems dang sems byung spyod yul na/ /gzugs la sogs pa dgag byas kyang/ /'jug par mi 'gyur mi rigs so//
22b1(mdo 'grel): gal te da ni dgag pa'i phyir/ /sgrub gzhan yongs su 'dzin 'dod na/ /'di ma rdzab 'khru bar byed pa bas/ /ma reg par ni bsrings na bzang/ /kun btags yod pa ma yin te/ /btags phyir sbrul dang 'drar mi 'dod/ /thag pa'i dngos por ma nges phyir/ /yang na grags pas gnod par 'gyur/ /de ni
22b2(mdo 'grel): 'khrul min gang gi phyir/ /du ma'i cha de mthong phyir ro/ /khyod kyis dngos la skur 'debs 'gyur/ /rnam pa kun tu yul 'gog phyir/ /de med par yang kun nyon mongs/ /ming las don 'jug las 'byung min/ /smra mi shes pa'i dud 'gro yang/ /nyon mongs skye ba mthong phyir ro/ /gzugs ni gzugs kyi
22b3(mdo 'grel): ngo bos stong/ /gzugs zhes brjod la ltos byas par/ /gzugs blo skye bar 'gyur phyir zhes/ /brtag pa bzod par mi 'gyur ro/ /gzugs ni stong nyid mi rigs te/ /gzugs min bdag nyid rnam bcas pa'i/ /dngos par snang blo spyod yul gyis/ /gzugs kyi bdag nyi bdag nyid de yod phyir/ /
22b4(mdo 'grel): mngon bar brjod bya spyi yin na/ /spyi ni ci yang yod min pas/ /de na mngon brjod bdag nyid kyis/ /stong pa 'thad par mi 'gyur ro/ /brjod bya spyi ldan dngos po de/ /der snang blo yi rgyu yin phyir/ /de ni de bdag nyid yod pas/ /brjod med nyid du mi rigs so/ /shis mi mthun pas stong nyid do?/ /blo
22b5(mdo 'grel): mthun 'jug pa'i rgyu yin phyir/ /rigs mthun pa la mthun pas na/ /spyi zhes bya bar nges pa yin/ /gzhi ma bzung na gzugs med de/ /de gzung gzung du yod pa'i phyir/ /grangs bzhin ngas na dngos de ni/ /brtag bya brjod par 'dod gzhan min/ /dbyer med phyir na gcig pa dang//
22b6(mdo 'grel): rdzas med phyir na du mar 'jug/ de nyams na yang mi nyams phyir/ /gzhan la'ang da 'dod ma yin min/ /sngon min utpal ma yin pa/ /med pa'i dngos pos ma bsal bas/ /gzhi mthun ldan pa nyid yin te/ /gnyi ga don gcig 'jug phyir ro/ /gzhan sel gzhan gyi spyi ma yin//
22b7(mdo 'grel): chos gzhan yin phyir khyad par bzhin/ /lkog shal la sogs blo dbye med/ /med la khyad par med ?/ /dngos ma bzung bar de 'dzin phyir/ /brtag bya brjod min yin mi 'dod/ /de yi sto? nas gzhan ? rang na/ /de ni brjod bya'i nyid sogs nyams/ /de ni gzhan gyi ngo bo na/ /des na
23a1(mdo 'grel): brjod med nyid mi rigs/ /de phyir rnal 'byor spyod pa yi/ /tshul gyis smra ba mi rigs so/ /dngos rnams ngo bo nyid med de/ /mngon brjod bdag nyid stong phyir ro/ /de nyid kyis de skye med phyir/ /ma skyes pa dang ma 'gags nyid/ /gang phyir mngon brjod ldan dngos ni/ /ji
23a2(mdo 'grel): ltar brjod pa de ltar med/ /de phyir chos rnams dngos med nyid/ /ces bya la sogs gang smras pa dang/ /gzhan dbang yod pa nyid smras pa/ /kun rdzob tu ni grub pa sgrub/ /gal te don dam dpe med cing/ /gtan tshigs 'gal ba nyid du 'gyur/ /gal te gzhan dbang ngo bo nyid//
23a3(mdo 'grel): skye ba ngo bo nyid med de/ /yod par gyur las ma skyes na/ /skye 'gag la sogs 'gal sgrub yin/ /rkyen rnams las ni gang skyes pa/ /de skye med par thub pas gsungs/ /don dam du na dngos nyid las/ /de yi skye ba dgag phyir ro/ /chos rnams yang dag nyid min phyir/ /
23a4(mdo 'grel): de dag kun rdzob blo dang sgra/ /sna tshogs rang spyi'i spyod yul du/ /'gyur ba la ni 'gal ba med/ /ming ni gang dang gang dag gis/ /chos rnams gang dang gang brjod pa/ /de la de ni yod min pa/ /de ni chos rnam chos nyid do/ /ci ste rkyen 'byung ngo bo yis/ /gzhan gyi
