23a5(mdo 'grel): dbang las skye 'dod na/ /rgyu bzhin yang dag nyid min pas/ /'dod pa sgrub par byed pa yin/ /gzhan gyi dbang yang gzung med pa/ /ngo bo nyid kyis ma skyes 'dod/ /don dam du ni skyes pa la/ /log par snang ba mi rigs phyir/ /gal te ji ltar snang ba ltar/ /der snang
23a6(mdo 'grel): bdag nyid yod gyur na/ /ji ltar snang ba der yod phyir/ /chos rnams ji ltar sgyu ma bzhin/ /ma skyes pa dang ma 'gags dang/ /dngos med ngo bo nyid med pa'ang/ /yod pa nyid las ma skyes dang/ /rdzas su yod pa ma yin phyir/ /bdag la skyon chags nyid med de/ /rnam
23a7(mdo 'grel): rig cam du mtshungs phyir ro/ /spang dang spong byed yod pa'i phyir/ /yongs shes sogs yod gang gir 'dod/ /de ni gang byed rdzas med kyang/ /rnam rtog bral bas thar bar 'gyur/ /rdzas yod nyid na'ang skye med phyir/ /'di las gzhan du brtag mi 'dod/ /dngos rnams
23b1(mdo 'grel): ngo bo nyid med na/ /gdags pa'ang yod par mi 'gyur bas/ /de ni med bar lta ba dag /mi gleng bstan par bya min dang/ /rang yang ngan song gzhol ba dang/ /gzhan yang 'phung bar byed pa yin/ /zhe sdang sha rul sgregs pa 'di/ /nga rgyal ma zhu ston pa yin/ /chos rnams sgyu ma bzhin 'dod
23b2(mdo 'grel): de/ /ngo bo nyid na med phyir dang/ /byis pa rmongs pa'i rgyu phyir dang/ /ma byung ba las 'byung phyir ro/ /rnam par mi rtog dngos po ni/ /mkha' dang mtshungs pa nyid mi rigs/ /rnam rtog 'du shes sna tshogs kyi/ /go skabs rab tu 'byed phyir ro/ /skyes pa brjod med nyid mi rigs/ /dgag
23b3(mdo 'grel): pa gong du bstan phyir ro/ /brjod du med nyid yin gyur na'ang/ /kun rdzob la ni de nyid nor/ /de la de nyid gzhan mang phyir/ /gal te de nyid mthong 'dod na/ /bum la'ang bum pa gzhan med pas/ /ci phyir de nyid mthong mi 'dod/ /khyod kyi tshul skyon sba phyir gyi/ /de nyid nyon mongs bya
23b4(mdo 'grel): mi 'gyur/ /gser la sogs pa rkyen rnams kyi/ /rjes su 'gyur ba yin phyir ro/ /nam mkha' rtag tu rnam dag ste/ /mig ni dag dang ma dag pas/ /dri bcas dri med mkha' 'dod dang/ /chos rnams chos nyid de bzhin no/ /ma dag la sogs blo 'khrul te/ /byed pa'i chos yin laS
23b5(mdo 'grel): kyi min/ /de la dmiD pa dag ma yin/ /de nyid migs byar mi 'dod do/ /de nyid rdzas su yod yin na/ /skyon ni snga ma bzhin du 'gyur/ /'jig rten 'das pa rnam mi rtog/ de blor mi 'dod 'jig phyir ro/ /de srid shes pa dmigs yod pa/ /de srid shes bya'i rjes 'jug nyid/ /thams cad mkhyen nyid
23b6(mdo 'grel): cig bar? min// shes pa rang la 'jug pa ni/ /med phyir ral gri'i so bzhin dang/ /rang rig 'gog par byed phyir ro/ /rnam par mi rtog 'phags blo'i gzung/ /rnam pa kun tu brjod med nyid/ /sngar bzhin skye ba bkag pa'i phyir/ /skye med rdzas su yod min phyir/ /yod dang
23b7(mdo 'grel): med pa'i dngos nyid kyi/ /ngo bo don dam nyid yin na/ /sgro 'dogs pa dang skur mdza' las/ /grol ba khyod la ji ltar yod/ /yod min de nyid skye med phyir/ /med min de yod ma yin phyir/ /yod dang med pa gnyis spangs pas/ /de 'dod de phyir gnyis su med/ /ston pa dmigs
24a1(mdo 'grel): med mi 'gyur te/ /de bzhin nyid la dmigs pa'i phyir/ /byang chub mnyam nyid mi 'gyur te/ /de nyid rang snang tha dad phyir/ /de bzhin nyid la dmigs pa'i blo/ /nus pa ma bzhag ga las 'byung/ /nam mkha' i me tog snang ba'i blo/ /nus pa ma gzhag mi rigs
24a2(mdo 'grel): bzhin/ /rang tshul sbed pas khyod kyis ni/ /de nyid gcig nyid gzhan mi 'grol/ /rdzas med dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ /nged la ji skad smras te rigs/ /nam mkha' 'dra ba'ang skye med pas/ /khyad par med phyir ma gos phyir/ /shin tu brjod du med nyid kyang/ /blos ni rnams kun gzung med
24a3(mdo 'grel): phyir/ /skye ba rab rib bral ba'i blo/ /'jig rten 'das pa yin par 'dod/ /'jig rten las sgrol don phyir dang/ /'jig rten shin tu 'da' phyir ro/ /de ni mi rtogs dmigs med dang/ /mtshan ma med cing de yis ni/ /rang gzhan chos nyid cig car du/ /rtogs med tshul gyis mnyam
24a4(mdo 'grel): nyid rtogs/ /chos rnams skye ba med pa ni/ /chos bdag med pa nyid ces bya/ /de la rtog dri'i mtshan ma dag/ 'byung ba med pa snga ma bzhin/ /gal te de nyid rtog ge yi/ /spyod yul min phyir rjes dpag pas/ /de mi rtogs pa de yi phyir/ /chos rnams chos nyid rtag min na//
24a5(mdo 'grel): 'di la rjes dpag skyon med pa/ /lung gi rjes su sgrub byed pas/ /btags pa'i rnam rtog chu bo dag/ sna tshogs ma lus bsal mdzad nas/ /sangs rgyas rnam rtog mi mnga' ba/ /dgongs pa mkha' mnyam ye shes kyi/ /shes bya mdza' dag ji bzhin du/ /chos rnams
24a6(mdo 'grel): bzhag pa nyid rtogs shing/ /ming la sogs pa thob pa nyid/ /des na rjes su dpag pa'i yul/ /de nyid yin par sgrub mi nus/ /de nyid shes pa'i mi mthun phyogs/ /gang yin de ni des zlog byed/ /lus kyi khyad par tha dad pas/ /tha dang gyur pa'i blo la ci/ /lung gi dbyi ba
24a7(mdo 'grel): med pa la/ /rtog par gyur ba gzhan ci yod/ /mi mthun phyogs ni spang bya ba/ /dam bcas tsam gyis ji ltar 'dod/ /rnam par rtogs pa ma spangs pr/ /rnam par mi rtog bla ji ltar/ /thub pa bden pa gzigs pa yi/ /'di ltar bden pa gnyis su gsungs/ /tha snyad la ni bsten nas su/ /de nyid
24b1(mdo 'grel): don ni rtogs 'gyur phyir/ /de bzhin nyid la dmigs pa'i blo/ /dmigs dang bcas phyir brdzun yin te/ /rmi laM soD yin de shes bya/ /des na de nyid yin mi riD/ /gzung du med pa brjod med pa/ /shes pa'i spyod pa rnams spangs pa/ /thub pa'i dbang pos gsungs pa'i chos/ /de yis 'di ltar 'di la
24b2(mdo 'grel): gnod/ /de ltar lung rigs ldan pa yi/ /de nyid gang zhig sngar bstan pa/ /rigs pas yongs su brtags na yang/ /de la nyams pa med par gnas/ /kha cig phung po'i ljon shing chags/ /kha cig rnam rigs rgya la thogs/ /yang dag mdza' yi g.yang sar yang/ /ma ltung rgyal ba'i
24b3(mdo 'grel): thug sras rol/ /shes bya rnam kun ma grub phyir/ /gang la rnam par mi rtog pa'i/ /blo yang skye bar mi 'gyur ba/ /de nyid mnyam med de mkhyen gsung/ /dbu ma'i snying po las rnal 'byor spyod pa'i de kho na nyid gtan la dbab pa la 'jug pa ste le'u lnga pa'o// //
24b4(mdo 'grel): rang bzhin gang zhig rtogs med pa/ /yon tan gsung dang skyed bdag nyid/ /de las bzlog pas skyes bu nyid/ /'di dag rtag tu goms par bya/ rtsa ba'i rang bzhin mi 'gyur ba/ /chen po la sogs rnam pa bdun/ /rang bzhin 'gyur ba bdun nyid do/ /'gyur ba rnam pa bcu drug kyang/ /rang bzhin
24b5(mdo 'grel): 'gyur ba min skyes bu/ /yid la snying stobs skyes pa can/ /skyes bu'i gzugs brnyan 'byung ba 'am/ /de bzhin yongs su gyur nas ni/ /blo 'jug payi rjes su byed/ /bdag kyang gzhan la rang bzhin gzhan/ /'di ltar de nyid mthong ba yi/ /byed dang bya ba ldog pa yi/ /skyes bu grol
24b6(mdo 'grel): pa yin zhes brjod/ /bdag dang bdag ming rtogs pa 'am/ /don byas pa na rjes bzung ba/ /rang bzhin gyis ni grol yin phyir/ /de nyid yin bar grangs can smra/ /de la gtso bo skyes bu ni/ /ji ltar mi rigs las sngar bstan/ /de yang yang 'dir brtag bya ste/ /bdag ni rtog pa ma yin no/ /
24b7(mdo 'grel): shes bya rtogs pas rtogs yin na// shes bya med pas de yang med/ /rtogs pa can nam rtog med pa/ /'dir ni bdag tu gang zhig 'gyur/ /ma bsregs srogs par mi rigs te/ /bsregs pa med phyir de sngon bzhin/ /des na sreg byed dpe yis ni/ /rtogs pa'i bdag nyid grub ma yin/
25a1(mdo 'grel): shes bya'i rnam pa 'dzin byed pas/ shes la rtogs pa zhes 'dod de/ /dngos po byed pa la brten phyir/ /de yang skyes bu 'di la brten/ /brtags pa byas pa yin na ni/ /skyes bu 'gyur med rang gi yul/ /de dang 'di ni lugs 'dis 'gal/ /shes las rtogs pa gzhan min
25a2(mdo 'grel): pas/ /ci zhig gzhan du brtag par bya/ /rtogs pa blo gros ma yin te/ /rgyu dang ldan phyir bum pa bzhin/ /nges na rtogs pa shes pa min/ /gal te blo la de snyam na/ /rtogs las shes pa gzhan yin par/ /sgrub byed zhe na dpe yang med/ /shes pa'ang de dngos med ce na/ /khas blangs pa yis
25a3(mdo 'grel): gnod pa yin/ /ma skyes pa ni rtogs min te/ /ma skyes phyir na rigs ldan min/ /blo yi 'jug pa'i khyad par ni/ /gang phyir shes la 'jug 'dod na'ang/ /tha dad khyad can nyid 'gyur gyi/ /de med pas na de yang med/ /gal te bdag gi blo gang yang/ /la lar ji
25a4(mdo 'grel): bzhin don du 'dod/ /la lar de las bzlog nyid de/ /mtho la mtho yi blo bzhin no/ /la lar ji ltar ji bzhin don/ zhe na kun rdzob grub pa sgrub/ /ji bzhin don gyi sems kyi yul/ /bdag ces bya bar bdag cag 'dod/ /ci ste kun la khyab sogs kyi/ /mtshan nyid can blo don bzhin na/ /de nyid du 'am
25a5(mdo 'grel): kun rdzob tuAng/ /dpe ni yod pa ma yin no/ /rtogs pa med pas rtogs pa ni/ /rang bzhin rtogs pa med pa 'am/ /gang gi de nyid shes skye bas/ /gang zhig grol bar 'gyur ba yin/ /rtogs pas 'dzin par byed pa na/ /bdag ni 'di ltar zhes sogs nges/ /rtog pa med phyir gzhan ni/
25a6(mdo 'grel): rigs/ /de med gyur na yang ci zhig/ 'di yi ldog pa'ang rigs min te/ /mang po dag dang thun mong phyir/ /ji ltar rje gcig shi gyur kyang/ /tshogs pa dag ni bran bzhin 'dod/ /tha dad yul lam bsgribs phyir/ /ji ltar bdag gi dbye ba las/ /skyes bu'i yid la snying stobs dag/
25a7(mdo 'grel): lhag pas de nyid mthong bar 'dod/ /sgra la sogs pa rtogs pa dang/ /de bzhin chos dang chos min dag skyon ni rjes su mtshungs pa'i phyir/ /ma mthong nges pa med pa'ang yin/ /gal te skyes bu 'gyur zhe na/ /skyes bu rtogs pa med pa dang/ /rgyu med khyab pa ma yin te/ /skyes bu 'gyur?
25b1(mdo 'grel): phyir 'o ma bzhin/ /sems ni 'gyur ba med na yang/ /gzugs brnyan gyi ni rgyu yin phyir/ /ji skad smras pa'i skyon ldan par/ /'byung ste gdong gi gzugs brnyan bzhin/ /skyes bu rtog pa med pa'i phyir/ /bdag dang gzhan zhes mi rigs so/ /brtags nas skyon med zhe na yang/ /grol ba btags pa nyid du 'gyur
25b2(mdo 'grel): gtso bo yod de sna tshogs kyi/ /rjes su 'gro phyir yongs gyur phyir/ /bya dang byed pa'i ngo bo'i phyir/ /nus phyir sna tshogs ngo bo'i phyir/ /ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ /snod chags pa yi dum sogs ltar/ /de bzhin dbye ba de dang ldan/ /des na dbye ba rgyu dang bcas/ /dbye rnams rgyu dang bcas nyid du/ /
25b3(mdo 'grel): sgrub byed ce na grub pa sgrub/ /kun la khyab par ma grub ste/ /'di'i gtan tshigs ma grub phyir/ /spyi ni sngon du song 'dod de/ /spyi dang ldan pa'i phyir zhe na/ /spyi nyid dam ni khyad par la/ /snga ma bzhin du dpe yang med/ /bde la sogs pa'i ngo bo'i phyir/ /tshor ba'i phung po bzhin mi 'dod/ /phung po
25b4(mdo 'grel): yin phyir bde sdug sogs/ /so sor ma nges pa nyid yin/ /ma nges pa yi spang bas na/ /de ltar don byed bdag nyid yin/ /rjes 'gro sogs kyis rjes dpag gi /dam bcas skyon gyis gnod pa yin/ /skye med mdza' med nyid sogs kyi/ /de yis khyad par spangs pas na/ /gtso
25b5(mdo 'grel): bo'i yon tan 'dod pa yi/ /gtan tshigs ma nges pa nyid yin/ /de bzhin tha dad rgyu las kyang/ /'byung bar 'dod pa'i dpe yod min/ /tsan dan du ma bur gyur pa na/ /nyes pa min par rtogs bya ste/ /stobs dang gzugs dang tshad la sogs/ /nye bar gnas te bdag nyid bzhin/ /nus
25b6(mdo 'grel): pa'i bdag nyid nyid du ste/ /yod na sngar bzhin dpe mi 'grub/ /bsal ba'i ngo bor de yod na'ang/ /grub pa'i mdza' ni spangs par 'gyur/ /bya dang byed pa gcig nyid du/ /sgrub na'ang smras pa'i tshul nyid yin/ /rigs mthun nyid la gcig nyid du/ /bsgrub na'ang grub pa bsgrub pa yin//
25b7(mdo 'grel): de las don gzhan rtog na yang/ /snga ma bzhin du skyon kun 'byung/ /bde dang sdug bsngal sogs kun du/ /gtan tshigs ma nges pa nyid yin/ /dus dbyer med pas gzhan min na'ang/ /grags dang lung dang 'gal ba nyid/ /tsan dan ngo bo mi mngon pas/ /med par grub pa ma yin te/ /dus dang
26a1(mdo 'grel): drug bas bstan pa'i phyir/ /da ltar skad cig bzhin zhe na/ /de lta na yang? spro gyur nas/ /rang gi lugs kyi skyon sbed kyang/ /smras pa'i skyon rnams med min te/ /gyen du skra 'greng bum 'dra bzhin/ /de gzugs zhen gtan tshigs don/ /rnam pa rtog pa ma nges nyid/ /dbyer med ngo bo yin na yang//
26a2(mdo 'grel): gtan tshigs ma nges pa nyid yin/ /rna sogs sbyar bya pa yin te/ /rtog pa med phyir gal te 'dod/ /khyad par dag ni ma bstan bar/ /spyad bya'o zhe na grub pa sgrug /ci ste g.yo ba med sogs kyi/ /khyad par can na rjes 'gro gang/ /rtogs par bden yar rtsol med phyir/ /spyod pa bor ni mi 'dod do/ /
26a3(mdo 'grel): dngos rnams bya ba med nyid du/ /rab tu rtogs te gzhal bya'i phyir/ /smras pa ji ltar de de ltar/ /rtogs te bde dang gti mug bzhin/ /bya ba med par sdug bsngal yang/ /shes par bya ste rgyud ldan phyir/ /rtogs pa med phyir brjod bya'i phyir/ /gzhal bya yin phyir gti mug bzhin/ /rjes 'grol sogs
26a4(mdo 'grel): gtan tshigs rnams/ /tha dang nyid du 'dod pas na/ /gtso bo'i yon tan la de rnams/ /ma nges ma yin pa de bden/ /bya dang byed pa sgrub bcas phyir/ /rgyu dang ldan par rjes dpag nyid/ /gtan tshigs rnams kyang khyad bcas pas/ /de ltar 'gal ba nyid du 'gyur/ /de ma bzung bar mi 'dzin
26a5(mdo 'grel): pas/ /gzugs sogs gzhan min dngos bzhin/ /tha dad dngos phyir gzhan min min/ /gang de rtogs bya rtogs byed phyir/ /des na mi mngon ma yin la/ /bya bar yod pa'ang mi 'dod do/ /da ltar gyi na skad cig kyang/ /rdzas su yod par ma grags nyid/ /spyod bcas pa yi spyad bya 'di//
26a6(mdo 'grel): spyad bya yin phyir ma la sogs bzhin/ /rtogs pa po ni spyod pa nyid/ /de yi sgrub par byed pa min/ /rtogs pa nges par rtogs yin na/ /de ni gang gi yin pa smros/ /dngos po byed po la brten te/ /gos sogs tshon du bcos pa bzhin/ /sgra sogs shes par mi 'gyur ga/ yin
26a7(mdo 'grel): na'ang shes pa ji ltar yin/ /sgra sogs shes par 'gyur ba nyid/ /yin na'ang shes pa ji ltar yin/ /byed pa med pa ma skyes phyir/ /byed po nyid du ji ltar 'dod/ /ma skyes pa la 'dogs na yang/ /skyes bu btags pa pa ru 'gyur/ /byed po'i sgra'i brjod bya'i phyir/ /me bzhin khyod ?
26b1(mdo 'grel): kyis skyes bu yang/ /rgyu bcas bya bcas spyad bya dang/ /bya ba rab tu bskyed pa'ang yin/ /kun khyab ma yin rang bzhin las/ /gzhan pa ma yin skyes bu min/ /de yis rang dngos khyad par ni/ /de yis 'di ltar spong bar 'gyur/ /des na khas blangs pa de la/ /gnod phyir dam bcas skyon med
26b2(mdo 'grel): min/ /ji ltar dbang phyug rgyur smra bzhin/ /rtogs pa la sogs spangs pa yin/ /bdag dang bdag gi min rtogs pa/ /blo yis rjes su rtogs pa yi/ /lta ba log pas grol bar ni/ /khyod kyi skyes bu 'gyur mi rigs/ /skyes bu tha dad mthong ba yi/ /thar pa thob pa ma yin te/ /blo gzhan yin
26b3(mdo 'grel): phyir spyad bya dang/ /skyes bu gzhan nyid mthong ba bzhin/ /ji ltar rnam rtog bcas pa'i phyir/ /mi ni tha dad mthong ba ltar/ /skyes bu tha dad mthong ba yis/ /de bzhin grol ba mi 'dod do/ /de ltar grangs can de nyid ni/ /sngon dang phyi mar 'gal ba dang/ /rigs pa dang ni mi ldan la/ /mkhas pa rnams kyi blo
26b4(mdo 'grel): mi 'jug /n+ya gro da'i sa bon gyi/ /nang na yod pa'i n+ya gro dang/ /bud med skyes pa 'grogs la bu/ /rnga yin ngan sgra gnas dang/ /zas kyi nang na phyi sa sogs/ /shing la 'bar yod mi mthong zhes/ /gang zhig mngon sum spong byed pa/ /de ni bden smra ji ltar yin/ /de ni yod kyang mi gsal bas/ /des
26b5(mdo 'grel): na bya ba sngon ma mthong/ /zhen mi gsal med min pas/ /e ma'o bstan bcos shin tu legs/ /dbu ma'i snying po las grangs can gyi de kho na nyid la 'jug pa ste le'u drug pa'o// //blo sogs bdag gi yon tan bcad/ /drungs nas phyung ba'i rnal'byor pa/ /yid la
26b6(mdo 'grel): bdag ces gnas pa ni/ /bye brag pa yi thar par shes/ /rgyas par sngar bstan rim pa yis/ /mi bden skye ba bkag pa 'am/ /dngos po yongs su bkag pas na/ /'dod dang sdang sogs yon tan med/ /ma skyes byed per? mi rung ste/ /bya ba nges par bya ba la/ /byed po yin phyir sbrang rtsi'i rgyu/ /nam
26b7(mdo 'grel): mkha' i me tog min ba bzhin/ /ma skyes skyes pa ma yin te/ /nam mkha' i me tog ma skyes bzhin/ /'byung ba'i ngo bo la sogs kyi/ /don dam par na yod min te/ /rtag pa'i bdag la shes mi brten/ /rgyu dang ldan phyir bum pa bzhin/ /blo ni bdag gi yon tan du/ /mi rigs skyo dang ldan
27a1(mdo 'grel): pa'i phyir/ /ji ltar de yi yon tan du/ /gzugs la sogs pa mi 'dod bzhin/ /'du pa yin phyir bdag med pas/ /rigs te mi rtag pa yi phyir/ /de ltar bde dang sdug bsngal sogs/ /dgag pa mthar thugs shes par bya/ /yid ni rtag par min par 'dod/
27a2(mdo 'grel): brjod bya yin phyir bum pa bzhin/ /'di ni bdag gi byed pa min/ /dngos po yin phyir bde ba bzhin/ /bdag yod pa ni bkag zin kyang/ /'dir yang brtag par bya ba ste/ /brten nas byung pa ma yin phyir/ /bdag med nam mkha' i me tog bzhin/ /de yi sbyin yod par yang/ /khas
27a3(mdo 'grel): len pa yang brtag par bya/ /'di ni khyab min rtag pa min/ /rtogs bya yin phyir bum pa bzhin/ /blo skye 'gyur dang bcas zhe na/ /khyod kyi bdag nyid nyams par 'gyur/ /'on te 'gyur med shes pa min/ /shes dang shes min ji ltar rung/ /'du pa dgag pa byas pas ni/ /de dang
27a4(mdo 'grel): 'brel pa'ang rigs pa min/ /bde dang sdug bsngal 'bad pa 'dod/ /sdang la sogs kyang tshul 'di yin/ /brtags pa'i bdag la bde mi brten/ /rgyu dang ldan phyir bum pa bzhin/ /yang na bdag gi yon tan ni/ /bde ba yin par ma gtogs te/ /skye dang ldan phyir gzugs la sogs
27a5(mdo 'grel): de yi yon tan mi 'dod bzhin/ /yang na 'di dag 'du ba ni/ /bdag la yod par ma gtogs nyid/ /lhan cig yod chen dang 'brel bar/ /yod pa mang pa mi rigs so/ /yod na 'di sbyor de na med la/ /med na de yang med par 'gyur/ /gsal bar byed pa chos gzhan phyir/ /de na
27a6(mdo 'grel): gsal byed ji ltar yin/ /grangs la sogs dang 'brel ba yang/ /'di nyid kyis ni lan btab po/ /gal te spyi sogs dang 'brel pas/ /skyes bu spyi dang gcig gtogs par/ /de sogs rkyen dang phrad tsam gyis/ /skyes bu 'byung bar 'dod na ni/ /yod min med min du ma min/
27a7(mdo 'grel): gcig min phra min chen po min/ /'di ni rtag min mi rtag min/ /gzhan min gzhan min min de nyid/ /ji ltar bdag bzhin tshig gi don/ /gzhan yang 'di ltar stong pa de/ /'bad nas gsangs su zin kyang ni/ /gzegs zan pa yis gsal par byas/ /'di dag mtshan mar 'dzin?
27b1(mdo 'grel): pa'i phyir/ /de nyid mtheng bar mi rigs so/ /mtshan ma mi bden par skyes pa'i/ /ngo bo rtag par mi bden 'dod/ bdag las tha dad gyur pa'i don/ /de dang 'brel par mi 'dod de/ /yod pa'i blo phyir bo spyi la/ /spyi zhes bya bar 'dod pa bzhin/ /de bzhin grangs sogs 'brel ba yang/ /bdag gam gzhan pa la
27b2(mdo 'grel): la la/ /mkhas pas ji ltar rigs pa bzhin/ /blo de min par rtag par bya/ /bdag ni blo dang sdug bsngal dang/ /bde sogs yon tan dang ma 'bral/ /yon tan yin phyir grangs bzhin no/ /de phyir yon tan med bdag min/ /yul dang ngo bor dbyer med kyang/ /gang zhig ngang gi bdag nyid 'gyur//
27b3(mdo 'grel): bdag dang sbyor par 'dod pa las/ /dran nas shes pa kun tu 'byung/ /ma mthong nges pa 'ang sngar bzhin du/ /thal 'gyur ? na yang 'di la yin/ /med pa'i skye ba bkag pas na/ /de yi sbyor ba'ang mi 'dod do/ /yid dang bdag gi med pa la/ /rten dang brten par mi 'dod do/ /bdag dang yid
27b4(mdo 'grel): ni yod na yang/ /rten dang brten par mi 'dod do/ /rnam rtog rgyu mtshan bcas pa'i phyir/ /rdzas sogs mthong bas grol bar mi/ ji ltar 'ug pa mi 'dod pa/ /de bzhin 'ug pa ba mi 'dod/ /sa soD de nyid 'byung ba'i blo/ /thar pa min par gzegs zan 'dod/ /khyad par dag ni mi 'dzin phyir/ /'tsho ba'i de nyid
27b5(mdo 'grel): blo bzhin no/ /bye brag pa yi de nyid la'ang/ /lta ngas? rab rib skyes pas na/ /des na rig pa dang bral phyir/ /blo ni dga' bar mi bya'o/ /dbu ma'i snying po las bye brag pa'i de kho na nyid la 'jug pa ste le'u bdun pa'o// //rig byed mthar smras smras pa ni/ /
27b6(mdo 'grel): 'dus byas stong par smra ba yi/ /phyi rol pa la bdag rig dkon/ /bdag dang thar ba ga la yod/ /mun pa las gzhan skyes bu ni/ /chen por gyur pa nyi ma'i 'od/ /dbang phyug chen po bdag de nyid/ /mkhas pas shes na 'chi med 'gyur/ /byed po dbang phyug gsar mdog tu//
27b7(mdo 'grel): gang gis mthong zhing blta ba da/ /sdig dang bsod nams las 'das nas/ /mchog tu zhi ba thob par 'gyur/ /byung gyur byung dang 'byung ba dag /thams cad skyes bu yin 'dod de/ /de ni phyi nang ring ba dang/ /de ni nye dang de lus byed/ /srid pa sna tshogs de las skyes/ /dar gyi srin bu'i
28a1(mdo 'grel): skud pa bzhin/ /mkhas pa de'i char thim pa/ /yang srid len par mi 'gyur ro/ /'chi bcas rnams la bdud rtsi med/ /me la grang ba ji bzhin no/ /des na bdud rtsi skyes bu nyid/ /ma rtogs bdud rtsi yod mi rigs/ /gang las mchog gyur gzhan med phyir/ /gang las
28a2(mdo 'grel): dam pa gzhan med phag? 'di las phra gyur gzhan med pas/ /sna tshogs 'di dag rgyu gcig nyid/ /de ni phra ngang rags dang ldan/ /yang ldan gtso bo dbang sgyur ba/ /rab phye 'dod pa'i mthar thug gang/ /rnal 'byor ji ltar 'dod par 'gro/ /der ni 'byung ba thams cad kyang/ /bdag
28a3(mdo 'grel): nyid du ni 'dus par mthong/ /byis dang mkhas dang gdol ba dang/ /bram ze sogs rnams mnyam pa nyid/ /bum pa 'byung zhing 'jig pa ltar/ /nam mkha' de yi bdag nyid min/ /lus can 'byung zhing 'jig pa ltar/ /de bdag yin pas bdag mi 'dod/ /bum pa'i nam mkha' 
28a4(mdo 'grel): bzhin du gcig/ du ma'o zhe na bum pa dag/ chags na dbye med gcig nyid du/ /thams cad nyams par 'gyur bar 'dod/ /ji ltar bum sogs tha dad kyang/ /sa la tha dad 'ga' yang med/ /de bzhin lus ni tha dad kyang/ /bdag la tha dad 'ga' yang med/ /ji ltar bum pa'i
28a5(mdo 'grel): nam mkha' gcig/ rdul dang du bas bsgribs pa na/ /thams cad de bzhin ma yin ltar/ /bde sogs de bzhin bdag la min/ /bdag ma shes shing ma rtogs pas/ /rmi lam longs spyod nga rgyal bzhin/ /las rnams sogs shing dge ba dang/ /mi dge'i 'bras bu sbyor pa
28a6(mdo 'grel): yin/ /?lus la gnas kang ma chags dang/ /spyod par byed kyang mi gos te/ /'dod bzhin spyod kyang rgyal po bzhin/ /sdig pas gnod par mi 'gyur ro/ /gcig pu kun khyab rtag pa ste/ /tshangs mchog 'chi ba med pa'i gnas/ /rnal 'byor pa yis goms byas na/ /de ni
28a7(mdo 'grel): yang srid len mi 'gyur/ /de ni rtag par rtog med pa/ /dag la spyod yul gang ma gyur/ /blo ni dbye bas srogs rnams kyis/ de la tshig tu sbyor bar byed/ phyogs su ltung ba m yin pas/ /'dir ni 'di yang 'di ltar dbyad/ /phyogs la chags pas bsgribs pa'i blos/ /ji ltar bden
28b1(mdo 'grel): pa'ang rtogs mi 'gyur/ /bdag yod pas ni bkag pa na/ /'gro ba'i rgyu yang de bzhin te/ /des na de mthong grol ba ni/ /mi bden par ni rab brtags nyid/ /byol song rnams la 'jig tshogs blta/ /lhan cig skyes yod zhi ma gyur/ /kun nyon mongs kun rtsa ba'i phyir/ /de nyid khyod kyi shin tu sbel//
28b2(mdo 'grel): 'jig tshogs lta la zhen pa yi/ /bdag 'dzin bdag gis 'dzin pa dag /gang las 'khor bar 'byung 'gyur pa/ /de nyid grol ba yin par smra/ /myos par gyur la myos 'gyur bzhin/ /de lta ba yi zhi gyur na/ /shin tu ma zhu'i nang ldan la/ /kha zas zos pas phan par 'gyur/ /rig byed smra
28b3(mdo 'grel): bas bdag de ni/ /rnam pa gnyis su 'dod byed de/ /lus zhes bya ba bcings bdag dang/ /mchog na gnas pa grol ba'i bdag /mchog tu 'dzin pa bdag gi yul/ /bdag blo ji bzhin don ma yin/ /bdag ni 'di zhes mchog 'dzin phyir/ /lus la bdag gi blo bzhin no/ /
28b4(mdo 'grel): yongs su btags pa yod na'ang/ /khyod kyi bdag gis ci zhig byed/ /gzugs dang sgra sogs yul rnams la/ /blo'o zhe na de mi rigs/ /gzugs sogs yul la blo dag ni/ /byed po bdag ni med kyang ste/ r/rkyen la bltos pa'i skye yin phyir/ /me shel gyi ni me bzhin no/ /gang yang
28b5(mdo 'grel): yi ge'i bdg nyid sgra/ /de yi byed po bdag mi 'dod/ /mnyan bya'i phyir dang sgra yin phyir/ /dper na brag cha ji bzhin no/ /'dis ni lus kyi bya ba gzhan/ /'ong ba dang ni 'gro ba dang/ /lag pa rkang pa g.yo pa ni/ /mtshan nyid lhag ma rnams kyang bkag /rnam par bcad nas kun shes las/ /
28b6(mdo 'grel): kun shes dran pa nyid las dran/ /so sor rnam par rab shes las/ /shes rab nyams su myong ls tshor/ /shes sogs byed par smra zhe na/ /byed pa'i du sgrub pa'am/ /de las gzhan pa'i byed po nyid/ /gcod byed bzhin du rigs ldan min/ /byed pa po la rkyen ldan zhing/ /gang phyir
28b7(mdo 'grel): byed pa la min pas/ /des na gtan tshigs ma grub pa'am/ /ma nges pa nyid yin par 'gyur/ /shes la sogs pa byed po nyid/ /byed po'i sgra'i brjod pa'i phyir/ /lha sbyin gyis ni gcod de zhes/ /ji ltar byed por mthong ba bzhin/ /'dus byas phung po bye bral nyid/ /'di la byed pa 
29a1(mdo 'grel): brjod bya ste/ /byed pa yin phyir mar me yi/ /gsal bar byed pa yin pa bzhin/ /yang dag gtso gcig byed po min/ /gang phyir gcig gis bum mi byed/ /des na mar me sogs byed po/ /gdags pa par ni mi 'dod do/ /'dod chags sogs ki dbang phyug sems/ /
29a2(mdo 'grel): gzugs sogs yul la mngon zhen pa'i/ /thar pa mi mthun phyogs kyis phrogs/ /'khor ba'i btson rang bcings pa yin/ /lag pa la sogs tshogs pa ni/ /sems bcas sems can zhes bya ste/ /gtong pa la sogs sems 'byung ba/ /yod pa gtong por la sogs brjod/ /rig pa
29a3(mdo 'grel): skyes pas mi rigs sogs/ /kun sbyor ldog par gyur pa'i phyir/ /chags sogs 'ching pa las grol pa/ /grol ba zhes ni brjod pa yin/ /nam mkha' 'dra ba'i bdag la ni/ /'di dag thams cad brjod bar dka' / /gal te bdag la lhag chags na/ /nam mkha' i me tog bdag
29a4(mdo 'grel): 'dod kyis/ /gang phyir bdag ni rang bzhin gyi/ /shes pa'i ngo bor 'dod na ni/ /byed pa la sogs bltos pa'i phyir/ /de ni gcig tu mi rigs so/ /bdag sogs shes bya yod pas na/ shes pa ldog par mi 'gyur te/ /don byas zin pa'i mar me yang/ /rang gi rgyu las
29a5(mdo 'grel): skye bar mthong/ /ci srid yid la shes 'byung ba/ /de srid sa bon sogs 'byung te/ /ci srid sgra ni yod gyur pa/ /de srid sgra brnyan 'byung ba bzhin/ /byed pa med par shes pa ni/ /'khor ba ji ltar shes pa yin/ /kun tu khyab med yin pa'i phyir/ /gang las ji ltar bcingS
29a6(mdo 'grel): dang grol/ /sdug bsngal las kyang thar min te/ /thar dang gcig tu smra ba'i phyir/ /bdag las de ni gzhan min phyir/ /ji ltar me dang tsha ba bzhin/ /nyams dang ma skyes pa yi blo/ /phyed pa med par ji ltar min/ /gang pos gcod par byed pa yang/ /sta re med pa ji ltar
29a7(mdo 'grel): rigs/ /me yi bsregs ces smras pa na/ /me yis bsregs kyi byed pas min/ /de bzhin blo yis rig smras pas/ shes pas rig gi skyes bus min/ /rdza mkhan bzhin du mi 'grub/ /de yi ngo bo med pa'i phyir/ sred byed bzhin duAng 'grub mi 'dod/ /bsreg bya med
29b1(mdo 'grel): bas me med phyir/ /gal te mi shes byed po dang/ /za po khyod kyis shes ji ltar/ /mkha' 'dra rtog pa med pa yang/ /lung 'ba' zhig gis brtags ci bya/ /mi shes pa'am shes dngos min/ /'di ni dngos po med par 'gyur/ /dngos med bdag tu mi 'gyur te/ /'di ni mo gsham bu bzhin no/ /gang la
29b2(mdo 'grel): gnod dang phan pa las/ /gang la gnod dang bde mi 'byung/ /de yi bdag tu mi rigs te/ /nam mkha' de ba shar ma'i bzhin/ /nyi tshe'i bdag dang grol bar ni/ /bsam gtan shes sogs kyis 'dod na/ /bdg med don la 'bad pa yi/ /shi ba mi 'chir ji ltar 'gyur/ /nyi tshe'i bdag ni
29b3(mdo 'grel): bdag las gzhan/ /zhen thams cad skyes bu yin/ /de ni nyi tshe gnyis dag dang/ /phyi zhes dam bcas nyams pa yin/ /bdag las nyi tshe'i bdag de ni/ /gzhan min zhin na'ang? dam bcas nyams/ /gang yang bdag gi bde sdug sogs/ /'gro bas mi shes gtso bo min/ /gal te
29b4(mdo 'grel): phra yin 'di che min/ /chen po yin na phra ba min/ /gcig kyang ma yin gzugs kyi chos/ /ji ltar gzugs med bdag gi yin/ /gcig nyid du ma'i ngo bo ru/ /glang po'i dpe 'di mi rigs te/ /sna ni glang du mi 'dod phyir/ /sna tshogs rnams kyang gcig nyid min/ /gang yang
29b5(mdo 'grel): bdag ni nyi sogs mdog /yin na mdog bral ji ltar yin/ /bdag de du ma'i ngo bo yi/ /dper na pa la sha mi 'dod/ /gcig pu pa la sha med do/ /kun tu 'gyur ba'i bdag nyid dang/ /ji ltar rtsa ba sogs du mar/ /rkyen la sogs pas 'byed pa'i phyir/ /gtso bo nyid dang dm pa nyid//
29b6(mdo 'grel): de las gzhan la bltos nas 'dod/ /gcig nyid yin na tshul 'di nyid/ /yod par ji ltar 'dod par bya/ /gal te bdag de rdzad yin na/ /rdzas yin phyir na kun khyab min/ /bum pa bzhin du rtag mi 'gyur/ /des na 'gro ba rgyas ji ltar/ /rdzas ni rten du rigs gyur na/ /bdag ni rdzas su mi riD
29b7(mdo 'grel): te/ /nam mkha' i me tog i lta bar/ /de bzhin ma skyes phyir rdzas med/ /thams cad byung gyur byung ba dang/ /'byung 'gyur bdag med ji ltar mthong/ /bdag med bdag tu mi rigs te/ /ji ltar dngos med ngo bo bzhin/ /byis sogs khyad par med ma yin/ /brten med pa dang dpe med phyir/ /bdag
30a1(mdo 'grel): gcig yin du ma yi/ /skyon rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ma yin/ /tse ta'i bdag de me tre'i byed/ /me tra'i bdag gi 'ang de bzhin te/ /tse tra tha dad min dngos phyir/ /yang na yul la dbye med phyir/ /bde dang sdug bsngal spyod pa dang/ /de grol bas kyang grol ba dang/ /de bcings
30a2(mdo 'grel): pas kyang bcings pa dang/ /de sdug pas kyang sdug nyid 'gyur/ /bum pa'i nam mkha' dper bstan pa/ /kun la de ni 'byung ma yin/ /gang phyir nam mkha' gcig nyid du/ /khyod kyi de ni ma grub ste/ /rdzas kyi ngo bos gang stong pa/ /de ni kun rdzob nam mkha' yin/ /de la 'gro ldan 'bro ba dab/
30a3(mdo 'grel): de ni skabs 'dod skabs can no/ /des na nam mkha' i sgrib med min/ /skabs sbyin pa yang ma yin te/ /de yod gtan tshigs smras pa yis/ /gtan tshigs 'di yang ma grub nyid/ /rgyu la nye bar ma byung ba/ /nam mkha' dngos po mi 'dod de/ /de ni gcig kyang ma yin te/ /mo sham gyi ni bu
30a4(mdo 'grel): bzhin no/ /bum sogs gzugs kyis rnams ni/ /sa yi rigs su gcig na yang/ /rdza sogs gzhan dang gzhan yin ltar/ /des na gzhan ni gcig ma yin/ /bdag ma shes shing ma rtogs pas/ /rmi lam longs spyod nga rgyal bzhin/ /shes nyid phyin ci ma log pas/ /shes 'di da
30a5(mdo 'grel): rgyal mi rigs so/ /mi shes nyid na'ang log med pas/ /mi shes nga rgyal mi 'dod do/ /nam mkha' bzhin du 'gyur med phyir/ /de bzhin chags pa med pa'i phyir/ /bdag ni byed por mi rigs la/ /za ba por yang mi rigs so/ /byed po bdag yin mi gos pa/ /byed po'i 'bras bu
30a6(mdo 'grel): 'dod ci ltar/ /mi dbang sdig dang bcas pa'i phyir/ /rgyal po'i dpe ni mi rigs so/ /phyi rol la ni ma bltos par/ /gcig nyid ngo bo nyid mi rigs/ /gcig nyid dang ldan pas zhe na/ /de ni de dang ldan ma yin/ /du ma nyid du brtags pa dag /gsal ba gcig nyid yin zhe na/ /
30a7(mdo 'grel): ji ltar brtags pa kun rdzob phyir/ /des na gcig de don dam min/ /rtag dang gcig sogs ngo bo yis/ /don dam de yod yin zhe na/ /gcig sogs sgra dang blo 'jug pa/ /don yod na ni skyon med 'gyur/ /gcig la sogs par rnam rtog pa/ /'di ni ji ltar mi rtag
30b1(mdo 'grel): nyid/ /rnam par rtogs pa'i yul don la/ /tshig 'jug par ni ma bkag go /'di ltar blo yi yul min dang/ /dag gi spyod yul min ci ltar/ /brjod med rtog pa med pa yang/ /sngar bstan rig pas brdzun pa nyid/ /shes bya ye nas ma grub pas/ /blo yi yul du mi rigs so/ /blo yi yul las 'ong?/
30b2(mdo 'grel): bas na/ /ngag gi yul las log pa'ang yin/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi brdzun pa'i/ /lugs 'di dge bar shes nas ni/ /de phyir mu stegs 'dod skyes te/ /de la bdag gir byas pa yin/ /sngon dang phyi mar 'gal ba yi/ /de yi lugs la su zhig dang/ /shin tu rigs mi gcig pa'i
30b3(mdo 'grel): phyir /lcags las nor bu rin chen bzhin/ /'di ltar 'di ni lugs 'di ni lugs 'di la/ /kha cig dag ni drang phyir dang/ /lhag ma 'dzin las bzlog pa'i phyir/ /sna tshogs dag tu bstan pa yin/ /dngos po rnams ni ma skyes nyid/ /rang bzhin bcos ma med pa'i phyir/ /'di la nyams pa med pas na//
30b4(mdo 'grel): bdg ces kyang ni brjod pa yin/ /tha dad dngos kyang dbye med phyir/ /ngo bo gcig phyir gcig nyid yin/ /kun khyab chos rnams thams cad phyir/ /rtag pa'ang de yin mi nyams phyir/ /ma skyes phyir na skye med nyid/ /de nyid phyir na rga shi med/ /'pho ba med phyir 'di 'pho med/ /rab mthar thugs
30b5(mdo 'grel): phyir mchog yin nyid/ /gzugs dang sgra dang dri sogs min/ /sa dang me dang chu rlung min/ /nam mkha' zla ba nyi ma min/ /yid dang shes pa'i mtshan nyid min/ /thams cad 'di yin rang bzhin phyir/ /nyams pa med phyir thams cad min/ /de la nyon mongs skye med phyir/ /dag pa 'di
30b6(mdo 'grel): yin zhi nyid 'di/ /de ni brtags pas sgro btags na/ /brjod bya yang dag brjod bya min/ /ye nas brjod bya ma yin phyir/ /'di ni dri ma med ces bstan/ /gang zhig 'di ltar mngon 'dod pa/ /khyod kyis bdag kyang yin na ni/ /ming sogs chos mang 'dra ba la/ /skyon med rig pa
30b7(mdo 'grel): dang bcas yin/ /bdag med nyid kyis 'jigs pa rnams/ /'jigs kyang de nyid la gnas te/ /nam mkha' 'jigs par gyur pa dag /gzhan pa'i gnas 'ga' med pa bzhin/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten gnyan rnams kyi/ /de nyid bdud rtsi mchog 'di la/ /'di ni 'ga' yang
31a1(mdo 'grel): bkag med pas/ /legs par 'ongs so ngoms par gyis/ /yang dag lta li sgrib med pa'i/ /bdag ni byed po za po sogs/ /rten med brdzun pa'i 'dzin pa ni/ /des na spang pa kho nar gyis/ /dngos rnams rang bzhin skye med phyir/ /de nyid du na skye med 'dod/ /ngo bo nyid kyis
31a2(mdo 'grel): skye med nyid/ /'di yi ngo bo nyid du bstan/ /dngos med nyid na bdag med pa/ /de ni bdag min 'gal ba nyid/ /bdag med bdg tu 'gyur zhe na/ /ba lang min pa'ang ba lang 'gyur/ /dngos po'i ngo bo med 'di ni/ /'di ltar byed po za por rigs/ /gang phyir mo gsham dag gi bu//
31a3(mdo 'grel): byed po za por ma yin bzhin/ /de ltar gyur la skye ji ltar/ /de las nyams par 'gyur ji ltar/ /mkha' la me tog med pa la/ /ji ltar skye 'jig btags pa bzhin/ /dngos po med pa'i yul dag pa/ /ji srid blo ni 'jug gyur pa/ /blo yis btags pas spro btags
31a4(mdo 'grel): phyir/ /de srid gcig la sogs par 'dod/ /rtog bcas rtog pa med pa las/ /gang tshe blo ni log gyur pa/ /de tshe blo la yul med phyir/ /spros pa nyer zhi zhi ba nyid/ /dbu ma'i snying po las rig byed kyi mdza' rgyud smra ba'i de kho na nyid la 'jug pa ste le'u brgyad pa'o// //
31a5(mdo 'grel): ngo tsha med pa kha cig ni/ /byang grol legs lam bsam gtan dang/ /shes la skur 'debs bya ba tsam/ /dag gis deni 'thob par sems/ /chags sogs skyon gyis nyams pa'i phyir/ /skyes bu'i tshig ni rdzun nyid yin/ /rig byed skyes bus ma byas phyir/ /des
31a6(mdo 'grel): na tshad mar gzung bar bya/ /byed po mi dran par 'dod phyir/ /rig byed skyes bus ma byas lo/ /brgyud nas 'ongs pa ma chad phyir/ /des na lung yin de med na/ /sgra brtag dbyangs kyi gsal bar byed/ /don dang 'brel pa rtag pa nyid/ /don la rtog pa dang ldan la/ /rtogs
31a7(mdo 'grel): pa rab tu skye bar 'gyur/ /lan gcig 'jug phyir goms pa'i phyir/ /phyis kyang shes phyir de bzhin du/ /mnyan bya yin phyir sgra nyid bzhin/ /sgra ni rtag par shes par bya/ /mgnon sum rjes su dpag pa dang/ /sgra dang byung dang nyer 'jal dang/ /don gyi go dang dngos
31b1(mdo 'grel): med pa'i /gtan tshigs sgrub bya sgrub par byed/ /'di ni rjes dpag las tha dang/ /tshad ma yin phyir gzhan de bzhin/ /yang na gcig dang du ma'i yul/ /rtog par gyur pa ji bzhin no/ /rtag dang 'bral ba ma mthong ba'i/ /dngos don blo yi rgyu phyir ram/ /yang na tha dad blo skye ba'i/ /rgyur byung ba nyid
31b2(mdo 'grel): yin phyir ro/ /sngon med pa yang bya bas gsal/ /thar pa'ang bya bas sgrub par byed/ /mkhas gang zla ba'i btung sogs kyis/ /mthar byed pa las nges par rgyal/ /drang srong ltas bstan dam pas 'dod/ /lam rnying bzang po rig don 'di/ /phyi rol dmangs rigs bud med gzugs/ /'dzin pas
31b3(mdo 'grel): ri bas ldan gsum 'di spangs/ /'di la gang yod gzhan la yod/ /'di la gang med 'ga' la'ang min/ /chos la sogs pa bzhi po yang/ /de nyid gzhan na'ang mthong ba min/ /gtan tshigs smra bas gtan tshigs kyis/ /lam gsum po ni sun 'byin te/ /rjes su dpag pa gtsor gyur phyir//
31b4(mdo 'grel): rang gi lugs ni gsal byed gang/ /long brgad pa'i tshod dpag kyis/ /nyam pa'i lam du rgyug pa ltar/ /rjes su dpag pa gtsor 'dzin rnams/ /ltung bar bka' ba ma yin no/ /'di ni 'ga' yang kun mkhyen med/ /gang phyir 'di ni ma mthong phyir/ /thams cad mkhyen par sangs rgyas
31b5(mdo 'grel): la/ /brtags pa 'jig rten gus bya'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas gsung yang tshad ma min/ /byas pa'i phyir na gzhan bzhi no/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun mkhyen min/ /skyes bu yin phyir gzhan bzhin no/ /sangs rgyas gsung ni tshad ma min/ /lta ba gsum po sun 'byin phyir /ji ltar
31b6(mdo 'grel): gang smra de de ltar/ /gcer bur rgyu pa'i lta ba bzhin/ /sgra don rig pa shes pa yis/ /phyogs su lta ba'i dug spangs nas/ /yang dag ji bzhin 'tsho la byed na/ /'di la 'di ltar dpyad par bya/ /brgyud nas 'ongs pas mchad pa/ /lung nyid yin pas lung zhe na/ /rkun gyi lung yang 'grub
31b7(mdo 'grel): 'gyur bas/ /nges par gang gi de nyid bzung/ /gal te rig pas brtags bzod pa'i/ /tshig gang yin pa de lung yin/ /de? zhig de nyid dpyad par bya/ /phyi nas de yi gang bstan pa'o/ /de la de yi gnyen po'i phyir/ /ye shes grol ba zhes 'dod de/ /nad kyi gnyen po yin pa'i phyir
32a1(mdo 'grel): sman gyi nad las grol ba nyid/ /bya bas grol ba 'thob pa min/ /bya ba yin phyir zhing las bzhin/ /blo ma yin phyir brjod bya'i phyir/ /cung zad dus can yin phyir yang/ /skyes bu'i tshig ni skyon bcas phyir/ /tshad ma min par 'dod ce na/ /gser rtog shes sogs
32a2(mdo 'grel): tshigs rnams kyis/ /gtan tshigs nyid ni ma nges 'gyur/ /'on te byas pa min pa'i phyir/ /rig byed tshad mar bsgrub ce na/ /gtan tshigs thun mong min nyid dang/ /ma grub pa yi don yang yin/ /rjes su bstan yin skyon med do/ /zhes sangs rgyas kyi'ang ma byas/ /sngon gyi sangs
32a3(mdo 'grel): rgyas rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /ji ltar rtogs de gsal byas yin/ /byas pa nyid du rjes dpag pas/ /phyoD la rjes su dpag paS gnod/ /byed pa mi dran ma grub pas/ /gtan tshig 'di ni ma grub nyid/ /gal te sngags kyi byed po sngon/ /sngags dang bcas par 'byung gyur pas/ /byed pos byas kyang
32a4(mdo 'grel): ma byas pa la /khyod kyi bstan bcos mngon 'dod pa/ /de dang lhan cig byung bcas phyir/ /skye ba dran pas smras pa bzhin/ /bstan bcos byed po dang bcas na/ /'di ltar ci phyir smra mi byed/ /rtogs dang rjes su mthun phyir ram/ /de bzhin yi ge'i lugs ldan phyir/ /rig
32a5(mdo 'grel): byed tshig rnams gzung bya ba'i/ /byed po skye bu mi mnam ci/ /'dis kyang ris byed tshig rnams ni/ /skyes bus byas pa yin par 'dod/ /brjod 'dod don gyi blo skye ba'o/ /rgyu phyir 'dod pa spyod pa bzhin/ /skyes bu mi bzang pas byas par/ /rig byed 'di ni gzhal bya
32a6(mdo 'grel): ste/ /'byung po tshe dang chang 'thung rdzun/ /smra phyr ma ga'i bstan btsas bzhin/ /gal te gnod sems mi 'dod pa'i/ /'bras bu mi sbyin 'dod pa'i 'byin/ /sngags kyi gzung phyir dug sbyong? bzhin/ /bstan bces 'byung phyir sbyin pa bzhin/ /sngags sogs phye mas bkug
32a7(mdo 'grel): pa yi/ /bgrong min la yang bgrong bya gang/ /sngar bstan chang btung phyi ma yang/ /des na ma nges pa nyid yin/ /blo sngon ma song bya ba yis/ /dug zos na yang 'chi byed la/ /las ni blo sngon ma song la/ /'bras bu 'byin par ma bstan to/ /de nyid phyir na dug gi dpe/ /?
32b1(mdo 'grel): ba min pas rigs ldan min/ /des na sngags kyis phyug gsong pa/ /rag pa min par rtog par bya/ /tshe yi bar du gcod byed phyir/ /sngags kyi gzung ba 'dod pa yi/ /'bras bu 'byin par mi 'dod de/ /dug mtshon bstan bcos sbyor ba bzhin/ /rang gi lus las bstan ce na//
32b2(mdo 'grel): 'khor ba sgrol byed pa'i yang 'grub/ /thun mong gtan tshigs smra zhe na/ /gzhan la ma grub pa nyid yin/ /gang yang sngags kyis ma gzung bai/ /bsod nams cung zhig ci byas pa/ /de kun 'bras bu med 'gyur ba/ /mi 'dod pa yi 'bras zhe na/ /sngags kyis gzhan ni
32b3(mdo 'grel): gsod pa dang/ /de yang skyon med thal bar 'gyur/ /dbang du byed pa'i sngags gang gis/ /gzhan gyi bud med bsten pa dang/ /sngags kyi stobs kyis 'tshe 'gyur gang/ /gal te gsor par mi 'dod na/ /gzhan gyi nor ni sku byed pa/ /de yang skyon bcas ma yin 'gyur//
32b4(mdo 'grel): gal te sngags sngon spong ba'i las/ /der ni dger 'dod gzhan ma yin/ /zhe na lung 'di 'dra ba la/ /gtan tshigs khyad par smra dgos so/ /gal te srog chags bsngags btab pas/ /gang yang bcing ba ma byas la/ /g.yo ba med par bya zhe na/ de lta na yang khyad par med//
32b5(mdo 'grel): gang phyir sgo kun bsubs na ni/ /bzung nas nus med byol song dag/ mtshon cha rnon pos gsod pa la/ /de la sngags kyis ci zhig bya/ /rang nyid rang byung gyur pa yis/ /mchod sbyin don du byol sod bskyed/ /des na de la dgos pa'i phyir/ /mchod sbyin chos yin 'di ltar dpe/ /bram
32b6(mdo 'grel): ze'i don du 'tshe phyed pa/ /'di ltar chos min min pa bzhin/ /mchod sbyin byol song rnam gtses kyang/ /'bras bu mi 'dod min de yi/ /de ni phyir zhe na bram ze'i phyir/ /ci ltar 'dod pa 'tshe byed bzhin/ /byol song sbyar pa'i phyir skyed de/ /sbyad bya yin phyir bud med bzhin/
32b7(mdo 'grel): de phyir mchod sbyin phyir ma grub/ /byol song gtan tshigs ma grub phyir/ /dbugs kyi mchod sbyin gnas bsad na'ang/ /ma 'khrul bsams bzhin bsad pa'i phyir/ /phyi mar byed po mi 'dod pa'i/ /'bras bur 'gyur te gzhan bzhin no/ /mchod sbyin la ni gsad pa yang/ / 
33a1(mdo 'grel): mi 'dod pa yi 'bras bu 'byung/ /bsams bzhin du ni srog 'chad pa'i/ /sdug bsngal bskyed phyir gzhan bzhin no/ /bya ba ji ltar byas pa las/ /de 'dra'i 'bras bu lus la mthong/ /byed po de 'dra'i ma mthong yang/ /bsang pa yin phyir gzhan bzhin no/ /myos 'gyur btung
33a2(mdo 'grel): sogs? kyang bshad pas/ /ci ltar bstan bzhin spang bya ste/ /des na myos 'gyur brten mi bya/ /myos par 'gyur phyir myos sogs bzhin/ /mchod sbyin sngags kyis yongs bzung ba'i/ /myos 'gyur skyon med ma yin te/ /myos phyir dper na gzhan bzhin te/ /sngags kyis pa ? mthong ba bzhin/ /
33a3(mdo 'grel): rtags ni mthong ba med ces te/ /gal te mtho ris sogs ma nges/ /zhe na rtags las rjes dpag nges/ /nges pas nges pa yin nam ci/ /lan cig 'jug phyir zhes bya 'dir/ /mar me'ang lan cig nyid 'jug pas/ /gtan tshigs ma nges nyid min phyir/ /sgra yi rtag pa nyid? kyang brdzun/ /yod phyir
33a4(mdo 'grel): sgra ni mi rtag ste/ /ci phyir bya ba bzhin mi bzung/ /yang na lus kyi g.yo ba bzhin/ /blo yi rgyu phyir nyams par 'gyur/ /goms phyir phyis shes phyir zhes pa'ang/ /gtan tshigs rjes 'gro med pa nyid/ /goms dang phyis kyang shes pa ni/ /rtag min nam yang ma mthong phyir/ /sgra nyid rtag pa nyid ma
33a5(mdo 'grel): grub/ /sgra nyid dpe yang ma yin la/ /mngon par gsal byed pa yang bkag /'di ni dag gi gsal byed min/ /gal te sgra de mnyan byas na/ /ngag gis gsal bar ji ltar 'dod/ /rtogs pa zhes bya'ang brda'? nyid pas/ /'di nyid sgra ru thal bar 'gyur/ /dang po brda ni? med pa na/ /rtogs
33a6(mdo 'grel): pa med par mi rigs so/ /'khor ba thog ma med pa ltar/ /brda yang rjes su 'jug pa nyid/ rjes su dpag pa'i tshad ma nyid/ /de bdag nyid las tha dad min/ /nges na tshad ma yin phyir zhes/ /bya ba'i gtan tshigs 'di ma nges/ /tha dad spyod yul can gyi blo'i/ /rgyu nyid du ni khyod kyi de/ /ma grub tha dad
33a7(mdo 'grel): yul min phyir/ /gtan tshigs ma grub nyid du 'gyur/ /du ma'i don dngos tha dang phyir/ /don cig min pa rtogs pa'i rgyu/ /rjes su dpag par yang 'dod pas/ /de phyir sgra byung las gzhan min/ /rtag pa dang 'brel ma mthong bas/ /mthong pa'i don las rjes dpag nyid/ /gang phyir rtog bya rtogs par
33b1(mdo 'grel): byed/ /de phyir de ma thag tu min/ /rjes dpag sgra byung tha dad min/ /lkog gyur shes pa'i rgyu nyid yin/ /'brel pa dran la bltos byas phyir/ /ji ltar rjes dpog rang nyid bzhin/ /sngon med bya bas gsal mi byed/ /sgra yi gsal byed bkag pa bzhin/ /gsal bar byas pa'i bum pa ltar/ /sngon med pa yang
33b2(mdo 'grel): mi rtags dod/ /zla ba'i btung sogs bya ba'i 'bras/ /rtag pa min pa nyid du 'dod/ /bya ba'i 'bras bu yin phyir dper/ /'dod pa'i rgyus byung 'bras bu bzhin/ /zla ba'i btung sogs bya ba yi/ /thar pa thob par mi rigs te/ /bya ba yin phyir 'dod pa yi/ /rgyu mtshan bya ba mi 'dod ltar/ /
33b3(mdo 'grel): de'i phyir lam 'di la brten nas/ /mthar byed las rgyal 'gyur ma yin/ /blo yis dpyod pa'i nus med pas/ /gzhan rjes 'brang bas 'di la brten/ /'chi med nyid ni yod pa'i phyir/ /nyer zhi rig byed yod ce na/ /med de 'di ni phyin ci log /mi rtag pa la rtag par btags/ /rigs las
33b4(mdo 'grel): byung ba'i don gsum mo/ /shis brjod bstong dang cho gdag /gang phyir don 'di gsum po 'dis/ /thar pa nam yang 'thob ma yin/ /gal te rnying pa nyid yin pas/ /rig byed tshang mar 'dod cen/ /mi shes phyin ci log lta sogs/ /ci yi phyir na tshad ma yin/ /lam gsum po ni ston
33b5(mdo 'grel): byed pa/ /tshangs pa khyab 'jug bde byed rnams/ /nyon mongs bdag nyid spyod mthong bas/ /gang phyir gsum 'di spang ba'i rigs/ /'dod pa med na ji ltar 'di/ /'dod dga' ma la spyod par byed/ /de bzhin 'dod bral lha mo la/ /'gro gtso stobs kyi ci phyir brjod/ /'di ni skye dgu'i
33b6(mdo 'grel): bdag las skyes/ /de ni rang byung bu yin na/ /rang byung tsha mo 'dod ldan la/ /spyad par gyur pa min nam ci/ /rig las drang srong skye bstan pa/ /'di ltar byung 'di rtag mi bya/ /gnyis skyes rnams kyi gsang ba gang/ /kun la brjod par bya ba min/ /rang byung gi ni spyod pa 'di/ /'khrul par
33b7(mdo 'grel): gyur pa 'di la ltos/ /tsha mo mthong dang reg pa las/ /byol song bzhin du gang chags nas/ /lus ni 'byung bar gyur pa las/ /mi gtsang shor bar gyur pa 'di/ /mi ni sems dang ldan pa 'ga' / /mi skye yin na 'di byed dam/ /khyi dang bong bu dag gi ni/ /spyod pa 'phags pas dmang?
34a1(mdo 'grel): pa la/ /rang byung spyod pas nges na de/ /de dag dang ni khyad ci yod/ /shes ldan shes pas sdig pa dag /sreg ste mi yis shing bzhin no/ /des na mthu yi khyad par gyi/ /ngan 'gror de mi 'gro zhe na/ /gang gis nyon mongs sreg nus pa'i/ /mkhas pa shes des shes ldan la//
34a2(mdo 'grel): de ni sdig pa byed mi 'gyur/ /de rgyu shes ldan la med phyir/ /ltung bar byed pa'i las rnams kyis/ /rnal 'byor grub la mi gos zhes/ /smra zhing yang dag lam nyams la/ /gzhan dag gi yang nyams par byed/ /tshangs la sogs pas de nyid don/ /blo'i mthong par mi 'dod de/ /changs pa
34a3(mdo 'grel): dang ni rtse gsum can/ /theg le mchog mar kun chags phyir/ /dang por kho mes ma bsregs na/ /grong khyer sum rtsegs ji ltar bsregs/ /nye rgyal so phung ce lta bu/ /nye skal mig phyung ci lta bu/ /tshangs bsang chang 'thungs 'dod pa can/ /dbang phyug de nyid mthong zhe na/ /de yi lam
34a4(mdo 'grel): gyi rjes 'brang ba/ /ji ltar de nyid mi mthong 'gyur/ /khyab 'jug yin na sgra gcan dang/ /ca tu ra dang dmyal la sogs/ /snying rje med par gyur pa yi/ /nor srog phral ba ji lta dbu/ /gzhan nor chung ma ma byin len/ /chang sreng srog srog ni gcod pa dang/ /de nyid mthong bas 'os gyur na/ /ri
34a5(mdo 'grel): brags rkun mo shin tu 'ang yin/ /skye dgu bskyang la gsal ba'i phyir/ /lha min lha yi tsher ma dag /bsang kyang skyon ni yod min te/ /de ni chos bsrung phyir zhe na/ /gal te de ni chos bsrung par/ /'dod pa yin na ci'i phyir/ /gzhan nor bur med brku ba dang/ /g.yo rgyu la 'jug
34a6(mdo 'grel): spong mi byang/ /'gro ba'i de nyid de rang bzhin/ /rang bzhin yin phyir dong? tshe bzhin/ /'gro ba mi rtag par mthong na/ /de ni ji ltar rtag par 'dod/ /gal te 'gro las de bzhin te/ /sa dang rdzu mkhan bzhin zhe na/ /rdza mkhan dang ni sa? bzhin du/ /mi rtag par ni mtshon par bya//
34a7(mdo 'grel): chos min 'dod pa ma yin na/ /? byed par ni ji ltar 'gyur/ /yod na lkog tu gyur pa'i don/ /me shes phyir na byas pa yin/ /srad pas 'jig rten skyon zhe na/ /sred pa'i bran du ji ltar 'os/ /snying rje zhe na 'jig rten rnams/ /sgyu mas rmongs par ci phyir byed/ /skye dang 'tshe? soD
34b1(mdo 'grel): sdug bsngal can/ /lha ma ni na la'ang? cis mi brtse/ /thams cad mnyam par mthong ba'i phyir/ /dgra yi 'du shes ma rigs so/ /rang nyid 'gro ba'i byed po yin/ /skye 'jig ngag gi btso bo ni/ /phan par byed la/ /rtse bar ltar/ /phan byed la brtse de bltar/ /gal te 'grog rngo? 'diyin pas/ /
34b2(mdo 'grel): 'di las lhag pa'i mchog mang na/ /ci phyir mdangs ldan ma bcas pas/ /thub pa gos ngan khur bar byed/ /yang na de yi sbyong mthong nas/ /skye dgu byed po zhes bya'i blo/ /rang gi byas sam slob yin na 'di/ /khur bar byed pa'i blo ci yin/ /mchod ngos dka' thub lhag ce na/ /dka' 
34b3(mdo 'grel): thub gco yin nga ma yin/ /dmod pas 'jigs pa yin zhe na/ /byed po yin pa'i yon tan ci/ /'dod chags zhe sdang sogs 'dres pa'i/ /'phrog byed spyod pa 'di ci yin/ /'phags min spyod pa 'di ldan pa/ /de ni ji ltar skyes mchog yin/ /'gro ba mnyam med 'brog
34b4(mdo 'grel): byed ba/ /gal te de la stobs yod na/ /ci phyir shugs can nag po yis/ /'jigs nas phug tu zhugs zhes drag/ shugs can nag pos 'jigs skrags nas/ /rgyal po'i drang srong mu tsu ku'o/ /bri yi 'og tu zhugs gyur par/ /nag por gyur pa min nam ci/ /grong khyer
34b5(mdo 'grel): mang por gnas pa na/ /khung nas rkun mo bzhin 'bros pa/ /gal te srid gsum nges bskyed na/ /lha ma yin la ci phyir 'jigs/ /gang tshe rgas byed mdas? phog nas/ /'di ni 'chi bar 'gyur ba'i tshe/ /de nyid mthong ba'i shes pa dang/ /de yis stobs kyang gang du song//
34b6(mdo 'grel): sgyu dang g.yo yis rmongs byas te/ /ngan pa'i las la sbyar byas nas/ /bla ma gnyen bsang 'jigs pa yis/ /sring sgrub tu gyur ji lta bu/ /dgra tshogs zad par byas pa las/ /nges par rang la nus med pas/ /gang phyir snying rje med pas gzhan/ /bsgrub? pa'i don du song bar
34b7(mdo 'grel): gyur/ /gang yang cung zhig dbang phyug ldan/ /gal te de la gnas yin na/ /de ni kun la khyab nyid min/ /des na gzhung 'di ngor bar gyis/ /'og tu zhur nas sa bteg pa/ /khyab pa yin na ji ltar rung/ /'on te rang? dar? ma gnas na'ang/ /khyab par smra ba mi mdzes so/ /'og tu zhu
35a1(mdo 'grel): nas sa 'dzin par/ /nus na drang srong dmod pa yis/ /rang rigs sa 'og 'gro gyur pa/ /'dzin? par mi byed ji lta bu/ /de la gus pa mi nyams zhes/ /gang la de lta'i blo yod na/ /de la gus pa'i bud med dag /co bzung dgras khyer ji lta bu/ /de 'ba' zhig kyang ma yin gyi//
35a2(mdo 'grel): bshes dang gnyen dang bu rnams dang/ /de la gus par mthong ba gzhan/ /kun kyang nyams par gyur pa nyid/ /'phrog byed 'di yi dngos gzhan zhig /zhi bar gal te rtog byed la/ /gang mthed dul gang yang srid du/ /'byung bar mi 'gyur gang yin pa/ /'di yi yod min med ma
35a3(mdo 'grel): yin/ /yod min med pa min pa'ang min/ /des na med phyir yod pa'i phyir/ /yod med min phyir de ni mchog /nya sogs ngo bo yod pa'i phyir/ /gzhan yin na yang 'chi med min/ /gzhan min nyid na'ang gzhan min phyir/ /de ni zhi min gzhan bzhin no/ /gal te gcig ni zhi
35a4(mdo 'grel): bdag nyid/ /yin na'ang gcig ni ma zhe na/ /bud med 'phyon ma'ang bsngags par 'os/ /lus kyi phyed ni 'dod pa'i phyir/ /yod sogs sgra yis brjod min phyir/ /mchog ces bya ba'ang rigs pa min/ /yod na mchog tu rigs 'gyur la/ /rgyu nyid du yang rigs pa yin//
35a5(mdo 'grel): rgyu nyid yin pa spangs pa yin/ /gzhan nyid yin pa'ang snga ma bzhin/ /rgyu yang ma yin gzhan yang min/ /'chi med ma yin skye ba'ang min/ /gal te 'chi med dngos yin na/ /'di ni nyams 'gyur ro sogs bzhin/ /gal te 'chi med dngos min na/ /de med nam mkha' i
35a6(mdo 'grel): me tog bzhin/ /yod min med min mi rigs te/ /me la drang dang dro bzhin no/ /de bzhin 'chi ba med pa de/ /brjod med yin par ji ltar rigs/ /brjod du med nyid bdag dang ni/ /'dran med yin bkag pa nyid/ /'chi med phyir 'chi med ce na/ /'chi med med phyir 'chi med
35a7(mdo 'grel): min/ /skyon rnams sba phyir btags pa yi/ /de yi dngos po gzhan zhig ste/ /de la dmigs na ji lta bu/ /grol 'dod grol bar 'gyur ba yin/ /tshangs pa dang ni nor lha yis/ /glur? blangs gsang ba oM zhes bya/ /tshangs pa'i yi ge de nyid ni/ /yod de kun la khyab pa yin//
35b1(mdo 'grel): de ni chad gsum gsal ba yin/ /de bzhin shin tu phra bar bstan/ /dang po'i rgyu ni yi ge a/ /dag dang snying po sa me sdus/ /las dang na mkha' nyid dang kyang/ /yid? brtul snying stobs u dang ldan/ /byed po'i yi ge ma'i ming can/ /srog dang mun pa gsum pa yin/ /'gro ba thams cad
35b2(mdo 'grel): sdud par byed/ /gnyid chen shin tu log pa'i rgyu'o/ /'phe dang bsam gtan rlung 'byung 'jug gzung bar bye dang brtag pa dang/ /ting 'dzin zhes bya rnal 'byor gyi/ /an? lag drug tu brjod par yin/ /dbang po kun gyi shes pa ni/ /yul la g.yo bar byed pa rnams/ /yang dag
35b3(mdo 'grel): bsdus la srog ldan no/ /yid la bsam gtan bya ba ste/ /gnas dag tu ni spo zhi bya/ /dbang po dag dang dbang don dag /rus sbal yan lag bzhin bsdus la/ /dran pas yi ge oM brjod na/ /de gus skyes bu grol bar 'gyur/ /'phrog byed gus pas grol ba ni/ /'phrog byed mthong
35b4(mdo 'grel): bas mi rigs nyid/ /rnam rtog mtshan ma dang bcas phyir/ /dper na 'phrog byed mthong ba bzhin/ /grol phyir rnal 'byor ldan pa yi/ /mi rtag blo yang mi 'dod de/ /mtshan mar 'dzin phyir brdzun yin na/ /yongs su brtags pa smos ci gos/ /chags sogs kun tu spyod pa'i phyir/ /
35b5(mdo 'grel): tshangs sogs rnams? ni byugs rdzi bzhin/ /de nyid rig ba spangs pa'i phyir/ /rgyu la mkhas pa ma yin no/ /bden pa'i chos ni bstan pa tham?/ /rang nyid sgrub par byed pa yis/ /chos ni bsrungs par 'gyur yin no/ /de la 'di ni gnyi ga med/ /kun kyang bskyed pa'i rgyu nyid du/ /smra la rang bdag
35b6(mdo 'grel): tha dngal?/ /gang gi tshig la bden pa 'am/ /mi bden par na brtag par bya/ /de dag gcig skyon med ce na/ /tshangs pas tshangs bsad ji lta bu/ /gcig nyid rab tu bkag pa'i phyir/ /gcig nyid yin par mi rigs so/ /bdag las dbye ba mi rig pas/ /sum nyid du yang ji
35b7(mdo 'grel): ltar 'gyur/ /sdug bsngal rgyu la rmongs rnams la/ /de zhi'i gtan yang ga la yod/ /rig? las rnal 'byor bstan pa ni/ /de bstan pa las nyams pa'i phyir/ /chos bsrung par ni nus pa yi/ /re shig chos bden smra mi nus/ /sgrub pa las nyi nyams pa'i phyir/ /gzhan dag zhi par
36a1(mdo 'grel): 'khrid mi nus /ji ltar g.yang sar rang ltung ba/ gzhan dag 'dren par mi nus so/ /rtog pa'i dra bas btags pa yi/ /log pa'i gtan tshigs gsum po la/ /rigs sam mi rigs dpyad nas ni/ /gsum po 'di ni gtang ba'i rigs/ /sna tshogs byed pa bde byed sogs//
36a2(mdo 'grel): rigs pa mig pas sngar smras so/ /byed po yin par bden nyid na/ /'di dag gis ni ci zhig byas/ /de zhig bdag ni ma skyes phyir/ /de yis byas par mi 'dod do? chos dang chos min res ma bskyed/ /de yi yon tan phyir da lta bzhin/ /gal te 'di dag byed po yin/ /las kyi
36a3(mdo 'grel): bya ba'i ma yin no/ /las dang bya ba de dag gis/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu ji ltar 'gyur/ /bde dang sdug bsngal nyer dmigs pa'i/ /lus kyang de dag la 'jug pas/ /des na lus can rnams kyi lus/ /dbang phyug sogs kyi byas mi rigs/ /bskal pa dang po'i lus can lus/ /mngon
36a4(mdo 'grel): byas ma mthong rgyu can te/ /bde sogs 'byung ba'i rgyu yin phyir/ /dper? na da ltar lus bzhin no/ /gal te dbang phyug de dbang phyug /de yang bsod nams byas she na/ /de yang bsod nams gzhan dbang phyir/ /dbang phyug dbang phyug min par 'gyur/ /gal te dbang phyug
36a5(mdo 'grel): gi dbang phyug /glo bur gyur par 'dod na ni/ /des na gzhan dang mtshungs pa'i phyir/ /dbang phyug dbang phyug min par 'gyur ro?/ /dbang phyug shes ? yin? zhe na/ /des na des byas 'gro ba rnams// rgyu yi rjes su byed pa'i phyir/ /kun kyang sems dang ldan par 'gyur/ /
36a6(mdo 'grel): gal te dbang phyug rgyu yin na/ /'gro ba phra sogs ldan par 'gyur/ /las byed dbang phyug yin zhe na/ /de yang dmyal ba dag tu 'tshed gyi?/ de min gzhan dang? 'tsher? na ni/ /byas nyams ma byas 'phrad par 'gyur/ /thar ba med pa yang yin te/ /rtag tu sdug
36a7(mdo 'grel): bsngal rgyu ldan phyir/ /de yi sdug bsngal ga la zhi/ /me ni 'bang? bar gyur pa yi/ /che ba ma zhi ma glang ba bzhin/ /gcig bu sna tshogs min zhe na/ /? ji lta bu/ /'dod pas? sna tshogs yin zhe na'ang/ /gcig pu sna tshogs mi rigs so/ /rtag pa cha med
36b1(mdo 'grel): sra ba dang/ /'gro ba'i byed po gcig pu nyid/ /kun la khyab pa yin no lo/ /'di las mtshar ba gzhan ci yod/ /phan tshun za bas 'jigs pa yi/ /bde brnyed dka' i dud 'gro dang/ /zhib tu thag cing gcod 'jigs? pa'i/ /sdug bsngal gyis gzir dmyal ba dang/ /mi rnams skye rga nad ngag dang
36b2(mdo 'grel): sdug bsngal zug rngu'i rma btod nas/ /dga' 'gyur gang yin drag po zhes/ /ming don ldan pa de phyag 'tshal/ /'dzin pa can gang nor ldan dang/ /gzhan gyis 'tsho bcas dge ba can/ /chos min can 'ga' ma tho nas ldan/ /dbang phyug spyod par gsal ba yin/ /yon tan nor ldan
36b3(mdo 'grel): tshe thung dang/ /ngan par spyod rnams tshe ring dang/ /gtong ldan dbul po mthong bas na/ /dbang phyug gis byas gsal ba yin/ /kha cig sangs rgyas pa yang bde/ /de la gus pa kha cig sdug /dbang phyug bkas ni bsod nams can/ /dag kyang ci phyir sdig ma byed/ sna tshogs las
36b4(mdo 'grel): la mi shes pas/ /de rgyu nyid du smra ba yin/ /sna tshogs byed por tshangs pa ni/ /mi rigs sngon du bstan pa bzhin/ /tshangs pa byed por bden na yang/ /de yi ci zhig byas par 'gyur/ /dang por sems ni mnyam bzhag pas/ /blo yi sgo rnams legs bsdams la/ /yid la shing
36b5(mdo 'grel): bzhag par bya/ 'di ltar yi ge oM bsgoms te/ /snying la gzungs kyis bzung byas pa/ /sa sogs gzugs la goms par bya/ /bde byed mnyes na sdug bsngal las/ /grol 'gyur zer ba 'di mi bden/ /ci srid yid kyi shes 'byung bas/ /de srid grol bar mi rigs te//
36b6(mdo 'grel): yid shes 'byung phyir ji ltar sngar/ /grol bar ma gyur pa bzhin no/ /dbang phyug la gus grol 'gyur bar/ /mi rigs bde byed mthong ba yang/ /dmigs la gnas pa yin pa'i phyir/ /dper na mtho yod mthong ba bzhin/ /sdug bsngal rgyu ni dbang phyug na/ /de ni rtag phyir
36b7(mdo 'grel): bcos su med/ /des na sdug bsngal thar 'gro bar/ /dbang phyug nam yang 'gyur ma yin/ /'dis ni lhag ma'ang dgag byas phyir/ /tshangs pa khyab 'jug bdag smra la/ /mi rigs phyir na dbang phyug sogs/ /btags la blo ni dga' mi byed/ /dus chen shin tu mang por 
37a1(mdo 'grel): 'das/ /bud med sems ni shin tu g.yo/ /de phyir bram ze zhes bya ba'i rigs/ /'ga' yang gang la'ang yod ma yin/ /rtsal dang rtsal gyi sde dag dang/ /de bzhin thos pa'i rtsa can dag /drang srong chen po gau tam/ /bran song nyal ba'i mngal nas skyes/ /
37a2(mdo 'grel): gzhung ni rtsom par byed pa yi/ /kun 'das bram ze'i drang srong yang/ /thub pa chen po'i tun 'da' yi/ /gdol ba mo dang nyal las skyes/ /nya pa yi ni bu mo la/ /pha ni mchog 'gro zhes bya bas/ /nyal? bas drang srong gling lam skyes/ /de yang bram ze zhes brjod do/ /bram
37a3(mdo 'grel): ze'i drang srong 'jig rten grags/ /thos med rigs byed 'don byed pa/ /drang srong rwa? zhes bya ba'i ma/ /dud 'gror skyes pa'i ri dags yin/ /spom dang de bzhin ral bal can/ /dmangs rigs bu yin bram zer grags/ /zla ba'i btung ba yang 'thungs nas/ /'jig rten
37a4(mdo 'grel): drang srong chen por grags/ /'jig rten du ni grags gyur ba/ /bram ze long bu zhes bya ba/ /thos mang de yang gdol ba'i rigs/ /lung mang zhes bya ba las skyes/ /bur shing bu mo las skyes pa'i/ /drang srong drang srong ka nwa yang/ /ka nwa ya yi rigs bcas pa/ /skyes pa
37a5(mdo 'grel): yin zhes rjod par byed/ /drang srong ka pa'i je la yang/ /drang srong dbang byed chen po yi/ /gdol pa phreng ba mo la ni/ /nyal las skyes pa yin zhes thos/ /a ka ta dang dbang byed ni/ /bum pa'i nang nas skyes zhes thos/ /bum pa'ang bum pa'i nang nas skyes/ /de bzhin gtsang skyes
37a6(mdo 'grel): chu las skyas/ /pad+ma'i 'dab las shes rab myur/ /ka pang tya ni thal ba las/ /mgo la thod pa can nyid ni/ /thod pa las ni skyes zhes zer/ /chu yi sdig pa dag pa 'khrul/ /dge sogs nye ched byed pa dag /nyes bstan gsum la mthong bas na/ /gang phyir gsum
37a7(mdo 'grel): 'di btang ba'i rigs/ /'dis ni sdig pa dag mi 'gyur/ /ma rig phyir dang ma mthong phyir/ /ma bsgoms phyir dang bag chags phyir/ /dran pa'i shes dang dge ba bzhin/ /bang snying rkang byung klung sogs kyi/ /chus ni sdig pa 'dag mi 'gyur/ /reg bya'i phyir ram
37b1(mdo 'grel): ? bya'i phyir/ /khyim gyi ngan skyugs chu bzhin no/ /rang bzhin bsod nams ma yin las/ /chur zhugs sogs kyis zad 'gyur na/ /'babs stegs sogs su khrus byas rnams/ /sdugs bsngal mi 'gyur rgyu med phyir/ /las rnams zad pa ma yin pas/ /sdig pa zad pa
37b2(mdo 'grel): 'ga' yang med/ /rang gi bdag nyid ming dag ces/ /bstan pa yod pas de yang brdzun/ /rgyud gzhan las ni rgyud gzhan du/ /sdig pa 'phro ba min par bzung/ /lus can min phyir 'dod chags dang/ /zhe sdang gti mug mi 'pho bzhin/ /de tshe bsod nams blangs par ni/ /mi rigs zhes mongs?
37b3(mdo 'grel): par byang sems dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i phyir/ /dper na bde dang sdug bsngal bzhin/ /'bar sogs nang du mched pa nyid/ /tshangs pa'i 'jig rten sogs 'gro bar/ /bstan pa'i lugs ngan gsum las mthong/ /de phyir spang par rig ? /mer mchongs la sogs tshangs pa yi/ /'jig rten
37b4(mdo 'grel): sogs 'thob rgyu ma yin/ /srog la gnod par byed pa'i phyir/ /phye ma leb sogs mthong ba bzhin/ /gza' dang btung bsbangs ba yis/ /mtho ris mthob par mi 'dod de/ /bkres dang skom pa'i rgyu yin phyir/ /zas na zos pas gdungs pa bzhin/ /zas ma zos sogs bsod nams 'gyur/ /
37b5(mdo 'grel): spangs phyir sdig spangs bzhin zhe na/ /bden sogs spangs bas gtan tshigs 'di/ /ma nges pa nyid yin par 'gyur/ /zas spangs bsod nams mi 'gyur te/ /bya ba de la sdig med phyir/ /dge ba yid la byed pa yi/ /yid la byed pa spangs pa bzhin/ /mdza' gsum dag pa'i sha gang
37b6(mdo 'grel): dag? zhes kyang sdig tu mi 'gyur te/ /dangs ma sogs su 'gyur pa'i phyir/ /slong mo'i zas la sdig med bzhin/ /gang yang shin zos pa yis/ /sdig pa'i rgyur na mi 'gyur te/ /bkres pa bzlog pa'i bya yin phyir/ /ma blangs byin pa'i zas skom bzhin/ /shin ma zab yin phyir/ /
37b7(mdo 'grel): mi bzhen lus la rtogs/ /sa bon dang ni brten byed pa/ /mi gtsang ? mi gtsang srin ma bu bzhin/ /sdu ba sags las byung ba'i phyir/ /nya sha sogs ni rmad ce na/ /mar dang ' sogs rgyu yin pas/ /'di ni ma nges pa nyid yin/ /sha za srog gcod nyid yin te/ /
38a1(mdo 'grel): de yi rgyu mtshan phyir zhe na/ /pags sogs thogs pas gtan tshigs ni/ /ma nges pa nyid yin par 'gyur/ /'phrel dang srang la g.yo byed dang/ /nye bar 'dod pa mi dge mnyam/ /'tshe byed nor ni rnyed pa de'i/ /gang yang sdig pa dag las ni/ /skyon ni gnyis kyi lhag pa ru//
38a2(mdo 'grel): nyo ba po la 'byung bar 'dod/ /de bzhin bud med bdag po gzhan/ /'dod pa'i kha zas sbyin byed dang/ /skal par ldan pa'i pung? med dang/ /gang dag chos de ston ba dang/ /tshul khrims med la dmod ba dang/ /skyon tshogs 'joms phyir ti ti ri/ /dgra gsos las kyang nges par ni/ /chos
38a3(mdo 'grel): ma yin par thob par 'gyur/ /kun dga' ra ba khron pa rdzed?/ /der ni lus can shi gyur na/ /byed pa'i skye mched yin pa'i phyir/ /de la skyon 'di yod par 'gyur/ /gsang bya yod pas gsod yod kyis/ /gang phyir med na ma yin no/ /des na gsang bya gsod pa gnyis/ /sdig pa
38a4(mdo 'grel): mnyam par thob par 'gyur/ /mthong dang thos dang bsnams pa dang/ /reg dang dran pa nyid dang ni/ /sha las byas na'ang chos min 'brel/ /'di lta bur ni 'gyur ba yin/ /gsal bar byed pa'i nyi ma dang/ /skye ba'i rgyu yi bdag dang/ /skyo bar byed pa'i mi bdag rnams/ /de rnams sdig
38a5(mdo 'grel): ba'i byed bo nyid/ /gos byed ba'i ltar byas na/ /zas kyi bya ba'ang mi rigs te/ /gang phyir skyon ni gnyis 'byung ba/ /ma zos pa la ma yin te/ /zos las srog chags skye 'gyur zhing/ /de dag thur du 'byung bar 'gyur/ /skyes pa nyams gyur ma gros na/ /ma skyes skye bar mi 'gyur
38a6(mdo 'grel): ro/ /gal te gzhan gyi rgyu mchan gyi/ /skyon de khyod ni mi 'dod na/ /gzhan gyis bsad par gyur ba yi/ /sdig pa spyod la gal 'ong/ /gang phyir mi sdig gnang mi sbyin/ /des na sdig de yod ma yin/ /de phyir sha sogs rjes gnang ba/ /skyon med par ni gzung bar bya/ /sha zab ni skyon
38a7(mdo 'grel): bcas min/ /de tshe sreg chags gnod min phyir/ /mu tig rma bya'i sgra sogs dang/ /'bras dang chu yi dgos pa bzhin/ /'dod chags kun rtog las byung phyir/ /sha zos de yi rgyu ma yin/ /de ma zos la'ang de 'byung ste/ /rtswa zan pa lang la sogs bzhin/ /sems med
38b1(mdo 'grel): yi brtan ba la'ang/ /sems ni yod par rtogs byed pa'i/ /nyes bstan gsum la mthong pas na/ /gsum po 'di ni sbang pa'i rigs/ /ljon shing sems pa bcas pa min/ /skye gnas bzhir ni ma bsdus phyir/ /dkyil du bcad kyang bzod pa'i phyir/ /pag du ma bzhin du bems po yin/ /gal te
38b2(mdo 'grel): sogs chags rkang brgya ltar/ /reg na 'khum bar 'gyur bas na/ /sa ma ga dang thal sbyar ni/ /sems dang bcas par 'dod ce na/ /me yis reg pa'i skra sogs dang/ /skra la mtshal phyes blugs pa yi/ /khyad par de dag nyid kyis kyang/ /'di ni ma nges pa nyid yin/ /gso ba
38b3(mdo 'grel): yod pas shing rnams ni/ /sems dang bcas par mi 'grub ste/ /chad la sogs pa nyams par dag /ldog pa yod par the tshom 'gyur/ /'thun pa las skyes 'phel 'gyur dang/ /sdang sems dus ldan skye ba'i phyir/ /de bzhin gnyid log smyo ba'i phyir/ /sems yod rta soD
38b4(mdo 'grel): bzhin du 'dod/ /lhog pa byu ru baiDUrya/ /rin chen gser gyi myug sogs kyis/ /shing rnams sems dang bcas par ni/ /'di ltar ma nges pa nyid yin/ /'di dag la ni sems med phyir/ /sdang sems zhes bya'ang ma grub nyid/ /gtan tshigs don yang mi 'grub ste/ /
38b5(mdo 'grel): ldog pa sogs kyi ma nges nyid/ /sems can rnams kyi las dbang gis/ /rtsa bas 'byung ba dus su skye/ /dmyal ba dang ni mtho ris kyi/ /mtshon dang dpag bsam shing bzhin no/ /lam gsum ji bzhin chos ldan yin/ /tshangs pas bstan phyir sman dbyar bzhin/ /'das
38b6(mdo 'grel): dang ma 'ongs mkhyen pa po/ /des bstan bsgrub bya yin zhe na/ /tshangs smras zhes bya'i gtan tshigs dag /skyed byed sogs kyis smras pa ni/ /nyes par brtags par bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /des na khyod gyis 'di ma nges/ /'ga' zhig don bzhin ma mthong yis/ /kun tu don
38b7(mdo 'grel): bzhin ma yin te/ /gnag rdzi smyon pa'i tshig rnams ni/ /kun du ji bzhin don min bzhin/ /'das dang ma 'ongs shes pa nyid?/ /yi dags la sogs la yang yod/ /de yis smras pa rtsa? thams? cad min/ /ngo phyir gtan tshigs dpyad bya yin/ /chos sogs 'do? la?
39a1(mdo 'grel): gang yod pa/ /de nyid gzhan la'ang yod ces pa/ /res 'ga' srin bu'i yi ge'i tshul/ /legs bshad 'ga' zhig mthong ba yin/ /ji ltar mi gtsang phung po'i nang/ /rin chen 'ga' zhig mthong gyur pa/ /rab tu skye dang de yi mthu/ /shes dang ldan pas de shes 'gyur/ /
39a2(mdo 'grel): legs bshad 'ga' zhig gsum pa la/ /rab tu mthong ba'ang de dang 'dra/ /khyim srang mi gtsang phung po las/ /rin chen 'byung pa ma yin no/ /skyon med rjes su dpag pa yis/ /rigs sam mi rigs ma dpyad par/ /blo ni gzhan gyis bskyed pa'i phyir/ /lung gzhan dag la the tshom
39a3(mdo 'grel): ba/ /ji ltar rlung? chen brgal 'dod pa/ /gzings dag yongs su 'dzin pa ltar/ /de bzhin btang bya yin na yang/ /rjes su dpag pa gzung bar rigs/ /sgra tsam rjes su 'brang byed cing/ /song ba'i rjes su 'gro byed pa'i/ /dmus long bzhin du dkyil 'khor 'dir/ /byis pa 'khor bar 'khor
39a4(mdo 'grel): ba yin/ /rten pa med pa'i dmus long dag /nyam nga'i lam du 'gro byed ltar/ /sgra tsam gtso bor byed pa rnams/ /ltung par dka' ba ma yin no/ /kun mkhyen zhes bya'i sgra 'di yang/ /yul 'ga' zhig la ji bzhin yin/ /seng ge'i sgra yang pa la bden/ /kha cig nye bar
39a5(mdo 'grel): btags pa nyid/ /chos dang sprul pa'i sku dag ni/ /nga la mi nyid du ma grub/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'ang ma grub ste/ /des nam mkhas pa nyid yin/ /gal te ji ltar khyod bcom ldan/ /thams cad mkhyen pa min par 'dod/ /bde byed khyab 'jug sogs dag gis/ /shes
39a6(mdo 'grel): ba de ltar min zhe na/ /ji ltar de dag gis shes ltar/ /thams cad mkhyen pa de bden na/ /rab rib can gyis mthong ba ltar/ /dri med mig gis mi mthong bzhin/ /yang na 'di ltar thams cad mkhyen/ /cho ga shes nyid du 'dod na ni/ /gang phyir 'dze ni mi sogs kyis//
39a7(mdo 'grel): gtan tshigs 'di ni ma nges nyid/ /cung zhig shes kyi kun mi shes/ /zhe na thub pas gang ma mkhyen/ /mtho ris byad grol pa ma zhe na/ /bstan pa 'di las bstan pa nyid/ /bstan du zin rkyang mi rigs zhes/ /gal te khyod kyis blo 'byung na/ /mi shes pa nyid yin pas na//
39b1(mdo 'grel): de yig na yang smras zin to/ /bstan bcos blo sgra'i phyogs byas kyang/ /gtan la dbab bar 'dra ba yin/ /dbyed pa can sogs ma nges nyid/ /byas pa'i phyir na skyon dang ldan/ /gsum po sun 'byin par 'dra bas/ /gcer bur rgyu ltar dag 'dod paS/ /bsgrub bya'i rjes su 'gro med phyir/ /dper
39b2(mdo 'grel): na med pa nyid yin no/ /dbu ma'i snying po las dpyod pa'i de kho na nyid gtan la dbab pa la 'jug pa ste le'u dgu pa'o// //gcer bur rgyu bas thub pa la/ /kun ma bstan pas kun mkhyen min/ /zhes smras khyu mchog sogs ma nges/ /brjod du med par brjod pa'i
39b3(mdo 'grel): phyir/ /'khor pa'i thog ma mi rig cing/ /rgyu yang rab tu ma shes la/ /de phyir ma rig rig med phyir/ /de bzhin nam mkha' i ro bzhin no/ /gal te thub pa'i mthus nus na/ /sems can thams cad mya ngan 'da' / /mu stegs rnams kyi zhag bdun na/ /nor dang brag dog dag gi phyir/ /mdzes
39b4(mdo 'grel): ma bdag gis bsad do zhes/ /rang nyid kyis ni bstan pa yin/ /ji ltar thag pa char gyur nas/ /shing gshong sal lhung ba ni/ /rgyal bcas skye bo'i 'khor mthong nas/ /de dag ngo mtshar che bar gyur/ /mngon du bstan par bya ba'i phyir/ /skyob pas gzhan du de ma bsgyur/ /
39b5(mdo 'grel): sa la can gro bzhugs pa ni/ /sems can don gyi bya ba mdzad/ /gang phyir bdud las rgyal zin pas/ /bdud kyi las ni don med/ /nyan thos tshogs bcas dpa' bo ni/ /der ni bsod snyoms chad gyur pas/ /sems ni zhum par ma mthong tshe/ /mang po byang chub tu des
39b6(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ /glang chen dul bar bya phyir dang/ /'gro ba rnams ni 'dul ba'i phyir/ /bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa yin/ /thub pa bcom ldan mi mkhyen min/ /ltas byin gyis ni skyogs 'phangs pa/ /de yang 'gro la phan phyir te/ /gzhan gyi gnod las grol ba yi//
39b7(mdo 'grel): tsha ba'i bdag nyid bstan pa yin/ /skyes bu sngas brgyab brten pa'i rdo/ /chen po 'phangs par gyur pa ni/ /gnod sbyin kim pas de ma thob nas/ /rang gi lus la bzed pa yin/ /lha dang lha min rnams dang ni/ /stong phrag dag ni brgya snyed kyis/ /dad pa'i dbang po sogs
40a1(mdo 'grel): thob nas/ /srid pa las ni grol bar gyur/ /ltas byin khyim na gnas na ni/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i stobs ldan zhing/ /'khor dang stobs ni thob gyur nas/ /bstan pa 'di ni nyams par byed/ /blo ngan 'di ni rab byung na/ /nga la ci yang byed mi nus/ /de ltar ston pas gzigs nas ni/ /
40a2(mdo 'grel): rab tu byung bas ma bzlog go /cho 'phrul dag ni mthong 'gyur zhing/ /chos ni thos par gyur nas 'di/ /bsod nams bsog par gzigs gyur nas/ /rgyu skar bzang por bzhag pa yin/ /lhag spyod shi bar gyur pa yang/ /dbu ma'i snying po las thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du grub par
40a3(mdo 'grel): bstan pa ste le'u bcu pa'o// //tha snyad la yang rmongs gyur pa/ /lta ba'i phreng 'khrugs 'gro rnams las/ /gnyis med de nyid nam mkha' 'dra/ /skal ldan sems can bkri phyir dang/ /'jig rten gnyis la phan gdags phyir/ /gang gi 'jig rten kun rdzob ni/ /'jig rten
40a4(mdo 'grel): 'das kyang ston mdzed pa/ /'jig rten rig pa de la 'dud/ /de ltar 'di ni dbu ma yi/ /snying po mdor bsdus byas pa yin/ /blo ldan mdo sde du ma yi/ /gzugs brnyan blta ba'i me long yin/ /dbu ma'i snying po las bstod pa dang mtshan bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu
40a5(mdo 'grel): gcig pa'o// //dbu ma'i snying po tshig le'ur byas pa slob dpon chan po b+ha byas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //ra sa 'phrul snang gi gtsug lag khang gi gzhir/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM ka ra sh+rI ? na'i zhal snga nas/ lo ts+tsha ba
40a6(mdo 'grel): dge slong tshul khrims rgyal byas bsgyur cing? zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //*/ /dbu? ma'i 'grel pa rtog gi? 'bar ba slob dpon b+ha ? brjod? pa bzhugs so// //rgya gar skad du/ ma d+hya ma ka h+ri da ya brat+ti ti ra kA dzwA la?/ bod skad du/ dbu ma'i snying
40a7(mdo 'grel): po'i 'grel pa rtog ge 'bar ba bam po dang po/ /thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bden rang gi lha yid du 'ong ba la dang por phyag 'tshal ba nye bar bstan pa'i bstan bcos ngag ni skyes bu dpa' bo'i rkyen dang/ /bar chad med pa dang/ 'bras bu dang ldan par 'gyur bas/ de'i
40b1(mdo 'grel): phyir bstan bcos byed pas bstan bcos kyi dang por/ /gang gis de nyid rab brtag min/ /rnam shes bya min gzhi ma yin/ /mtshon min brtag min rig bya min/ /skye 'jig med cing bde ba dang/ /rnam brtag ma yin snang ba med/ /mtshan ma med cing gsal byed med/ /gnyis min gnyis med
40b2(mdo 'grel): ma yin dang/ /zhi dang blo 'jug rnam spangs pa/ /yi ge med pa yi ge yis/ /thugs rje nyid kyis bstan mdzad pa/ /ston pa ma nor nyid gsung pa/ /de la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes ston pa la/ de nyid khyad bar thun mong ma yin pa/ bdag gis khyad par can ston par mdzad pa nyid
40b3(mdo 'grel): kyis mngon par bstod do/ /de la gang gis zhes bya ba'i sgra ni spyi yin yang/ /de nyid phyin ci ma log bar ston par mdzad pa nyid kyis na 'dis ni bcom ldan 'das/ po na dang sbyar bar bya'o/ /de nyid ces bya ba ni khyad par dag bstan du zin kyang/ khyad par gyi gzhi'i ming ma bstan na/
40b4(mdo 'grel): de mi rtogs pas de'i phyir de nyid ces smos te/ 'jig rten pa dang/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos po de dag gi de nyid de/ de bzhin nyid dang/ /chos kyi dbyings dang/ stong pa nyid ces bya ba dag gi rnam grangs so/ /rab brtag min zhes bya ba ni spyi dang ldan pa lkog tu gyur pa'i
40b5(mdo 'grel): don snang ba la rjes su dpog pa'i shes pas rab tu brtag par bya ba ma yin pa 'am/ rtog pa dang dpyod pa rtsing ba dang/ zhib pa'i rnam pas rjes su 'jug pa yang rung ba'i spyod yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /rnam shes bya min zhes bya ba ni shes bya rnam pa lnga la 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa lngas
40b6(mdo 'grel): rnam par shes par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir ram/ byis pa dang mu stegs byed dang/ slob pa dang/ mi slob pa dang/ rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rtogs par mi nus pa'i phyir ro/ /gzhi ma yin zhes bya ba ni ji ltar kun gzhi rnam bar shes pa la rtog pa'i sa bon thams cad kyi gzhi
40b7(mdo 'grel): yod ba dang/ skyes bu la bdag grol nga? rnams kyi gzhi yod pa ltar/ /'di la gang gi gzhi dang kun tu sbyar ba yang yod pa ma yin pa'am sa yul gang na yang 'di'i gzhi dang kun tu sbyar ba 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin pa'o/ /mtshon min zhes bya ba 'di rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid kyis
41a1(mdo 'grel): mtshon par bya ba ma yin pa 'am/ 'dis dngos po gang yang mtshon par byed pa ma yin pa'o/ /brtag min zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad rang gi ngo bor yongs su ma grub pa'i phyir 'di dang de'o zhes brtag par mi nus pa'i phyir ro/ /rig bya min zhes bya ba ni rang byung gi
41a2(mdo 'grel): ye shes skad cig gcig gis chos thams cad phyin ci ma log par rnam pa thams cad mngon par rtog pas rig pa med pa'i tshul gyis rig par bya ba'o/ /skye 'jig med cing zhes bya ba ni skye ba ni 'byung ba yin la/ 'jig pa ni rgyun chad pa'am zhig pa ste/ 'di la de gnyis
41a3(mdo 'grel): yod pa ma yin pa'o/ /bde ba zhes bya ba ni skye ba la sogs pa'i gnod pa ma lus pa dang bral ba'i phyir ro/ /rnam brtag ma yin zhes bya ba ni gzung ba dang/ 'dzin pa dang/ bdag gi dngos po dang/ gzhan gyi dngos po dang/ dngos po dang dngos po med par rnam pa brtag pa
41a4(mdo 'grel): ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /snang ba med ces bya ba ni rang dang gzhan du snang ba'i tshul du snang ba med pa'i phyir ro/ /mtshan ma med cing zhes bya ba ni gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i mtshan ma dang bral ba'i phyir ro/ /gsal byed med ces bya ba ni skye ba dang/ gnas pa dang/ 'jig
41a5(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ gzhan du 'gyur ba nyid ces bya ba'i gsal byed dag dang/ bral ba'i phyir ro gnyis min gnyis med ma yin zhes bya ba ni dmigs pa gnyis dang/ dmigs su med pa gnyis dang/ dmigs pa dang dmigs pa med pa mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /zhi zhes bya
41a6(mdo 'grel): ba ni ye shes zhi bas rtogs par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ram/ rab tu zhi ba bla na med pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro/ /blo 'jug rnam spangs pa zhes bya ba ni don dam pa rtogs pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i shes rab 'jug pa med pa'i tshul du 'jug pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir/ /mtshan
41a7(mdo 'grel): ma dang bcas pa dang dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i blo'i 'jug pa rnam par spangs pa'o/ /yi ge med pa zhes bya ba ni blo'i yul ma yin pa'i phyir/ /tshig gi yul yan ma yin pas de'i phyir yi ge med pa ni brjod du med pa'o/ /yi ge yis zhes bya ba ni yi ge dag gis
41b1(mdo 'grel): sgro btags de'o/ /thugs rje nyid kyis zhes bya ba ni rtsad pa'i phyir ma yin par ro/ /bstan mdzad pa zhes bya ba ni rab tu bstan par gyur pa'o/ /ston pa zhes bya ba ni lha dang mi rnams la phyin ci ma log par ston pa'o/ /ma nor nyid gsung ba zhes bya ba ni don yang dag pa ji lta ba nyid
41b2(mdo 'grel): gsung ba'o/ /de la zhes bya ba ni ston pa la'o/ /gus par zhes bya ba ni bsam pa thag pa nas so/ /phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba ni phyag 'tshal bar gyur cig ces bya ba'o/ /de ltar na des ni bcom ldan 'das kyi rang dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa bstan te/ rang gi
41b3(mdo 'grel): de nyid thugs su chud nas gzhan dag la ston par mdzad pa'i phyir ro/ /'o na gang gi phyir dang 'brel pa gang gis bstan bcos 'di rtsom par byed ce na de'i phyir/ gzhan don bsgrub phyir brtul zhugs kyis/ /byang chub chen por blos byas rnams/ /de nyid bdud rtsir bzung ba'i
41b4(mdo 'grel): phyir/ /nus pa cung zhig brjod par bya/ zhes smras te/ gzhan don bsgrub phyir zhes bya ba ni gzhan dag gi don bya ba'i phyir ro/ /brtul zhugs kyis zhes bya ba ni/ gang dag gi brtul zhugs drag po blangs pas so/ /byang chub chen po zhes bya ba ni de byang chub kyang yin la /chen
41b5(mdo 'grel): po yang yin pas byang chub chen po ste/ theg pa thams cad theg pa gcig gi rjes su 'jug pa'i phyir dang rtogs par bya ba mdza' yas pa'i phyir ro/ /der blo byas rnams zhes bya ba ni mi phyed pa'i bsam pa yang dag par bskyed pa rnams so/ /de rnams de nyid bdud rtsi la gzung pa'i
41b6(mdo 'grel): phyir bstan bcos 'di rtsom par byed de/ de ltar na de ni dgos pa yin no/ /nus pa cung zhig brjod par bya zhes bya ba ni 'brel pa yin te/ ji ltar zhe na/ gang gi phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi theg pa chen po'i phyir de nyid bdud rtsi'i yi ge dpag tu med pa dang/ don shin tu rgya chen po
41b7(mdo 'grel): bka' stsal pa de'i rjes su slob dpon gyis kyang de dbu ma'i bstan bcos rgya cher bstan gyi/ bdag gis ni blo zhen pa rnams drang ba'i phyir ci nus pas cung zad tsam zhig brjod pa'i phyir ro/ /bstan bcos mdza' dag gi don gyi sgo nas yongs su rdzogs pa dang 'dra bar blos yang dag
42a1(mdo 'grel): mthong da na/ spyi sdom byed pa ni/ byang chub sems ni mi gtong dang/ /thub pa'i brtul zhugs yang dag brten/ /de nyid shes pa 'tshol ba ni/ /don kun sgrub pa'i spyod pa yin/ zhes bya ba ste/ byang chub chen por smon lam btab pa rnamS kyis dang por byang chub yid la byed pa
42a2(mdo 'grel): dang mi 'bral bar bya'o/ /de nas phyi rol pa'i thub pa'i chos dang mthun par theg pa chen po las gsungs pa'i thub pa'i brtul zhugs la yang dag par brten par bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu phyogs su ltung ba'i blo med pas gzhung lugs thams cad rnam par brtags nas rigs pa dang lung
42a3(mdo 'grel): dang mi 'gal ba'i de nyid shes par bya ba'i phyir ro/ 'bar par bya ste/ de ltar sbyor pa gsum po de dag ni rang dang gzhan gyi don thams cad bsgrub pa'i spyod pa yin te/ bstan bcos 'di la mdor bstan pa ni de yin no/ /de la re zhig byang chub kyi sems mi gtong ba je brjod par bya ste/ byang
42a4(mdo 'grel): chub kyi sems zhes bya ba de ji lta bu zhe na/ byams pa dang ni snying rje dang/ shes pa chen pos brgyan pa yi/ /sangs rgyas sa bon byang chub sems/ /de phyir mkhas pa de mi btang zhes bya ba ste/ /byams pa chen po zhes bya ba ni sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang sgrol ba dang/
42a5(mdo 'grel): mngon par byang chub par bya ba dang/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba' i sems bskyed pa bzhi dang ldan pa'o/ /snying rje chen po zhes bya ba ni sems can thams cad kyi don bya ba dang/ ngan 'gro las yongs su bskyab pa dang/ theg pa dman pa las bslang ba dang/ yang dag pa'i lam du
42a6(mdo 'grel): dgod pa'i sems bskyed pa bzhi dang ldan pa'o/ /shes pa chen po zhes bya ba ni rnam pa gnyis te/ thabs kyi shes pa dang/ shes rab kyi shes pa'o/ /de la thabs kyi shes pa ni 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bskyed cing/ sems can
42a7(mdo 'grel): thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba dang/ sdig pa 'chags? pa dang/ bsod nams kyi rjes su yi rang ba la sogs ba dang/ tshogs gsum yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /shes rab kyi shes pa ni
42b1(mdo 'grel): chos thams cad dmigs su med pa dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang/ skye ba med pa dang/ dngos po med pa dang/ yongs su ma grub pas so sor rtogs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi shes pa skad cig gcig dang ldan pa bskyed pa'o/ /de dag gis brgyan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
42b2(mdo 'grel): sa bon ni byang chub kyi sems yin te/ byang chub ni chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du yongs su mkhyen pa'o/ /byang chub kyi sems ni byang chub kyi phyir sems dpa' 'o/ /gang gi phyir de sangs rgyas kyi sa bon yin pa de'i phyir mkhas pa sems can la blta bas bsam pa dang/
42b3(mdo 'grel): lhag pa'i bsam pa dang mos pa dang mos pa rgya chen po de mi btang bar bya ba'i rigs so/ /byang chub tu sems bskyed pas ci zhig bya bar rigs zhe na/ de'i phyir blo ldan snying stobs che ba dang/ /gzhan gyi sdug bsngal mi bzod cing/ /yang dag brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang/ /mthu dang ldan
42b4(mdo 'grel): zhing mkhas pas ni/ /shes rab snang ba med pa yi/ /'jig rten kun la blta byas nas/ /'khor ba mi gtsang sa 'og nas/ /bdag nyid rgal bas bsgral bar rigs/ zhes bya ba smras te blo dang ldan pa chos thams cad rab tu rnam par 'byed pa'i mtshan nyid kyi shes rab dri ma med pa dang ldan pa
42b5(mdo 'grel): dang/ snying stobs che ba bdud dang nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi mi byed cing brtan pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang/ gzhan gyi sdug bsngal mi brjod pa sems can thams cad bdag nyid dang 'dra bar las blangs nas de dag sdug bsngal bas bdag nyid sdug bsngal ba dang/ yang dag par
42b6(mdo 'grel): brtson 'grus brtsams pa dge ba'i chos kyi spyod pa dag la brtson 'grus brtan pa brtsams pa dang/ mthu dang ldan pa bdag dang gzhan gyi don byed par nus pa dang/ mkhas pa bshes gnyen can gyi ni shes rab kyi snang ba med pa blo'i gsal ba dang bral ba'i 'jig rten ma lus
42b7(mdo 'grel): pa kun la blta ba yang dang yang du brtag pa byas nas 'khor ba mi gtsang ba'i sa 'og nas/ bdag nyid brgal bas 'jig rten yang bsgral bar rigs so/ /zhes bya bar sbyar ro/ /byams pa chen po'i bshad pa sems can thams cad bsgral ba'i sems bskyed pa zhes bya ba dang
43a1(mdo 'grel): po bshad zin to/ /sems can dgrol ba'i sems bskyed pa zhes bya ba gnyis pa'i dbang du byas nas/ gang zhig shes rab mtshon rnon gyis/ /'chad ba kun bcad grol gyur pa/ /snying rje'i bdag nyid ldan pa yis/ /gang phyir mgon med sdug bsngal ba/ /'khor ba'i btson
43a2(mdo 'grel): ra? mi bzad par/ /'dod chags la sogs sgrog gis bcings/ /bag med pa yi chad 'thungs nas/ /gti mug gnyid kyis log pa dang/ /rnam par rtog pa'i chom rkun gyis/ /deg tshogs ma lus rkus pa dag/ gal te grol bar mi byed na/ /mthu ldan mthu ni ci? la phan/ zhes bya ba
43a3(mdo 'grel): smras te/ gang zhig shes rab kyi mtshon nyon mongs bam lus pa gcod pa'i bdag nyid kyi ral gri shin tu rnam bos? phreng? pa'i kun tu sbyor ba'? 'ching ba kun ma lus par bcad cing bdag nyid grol bar gyur ba snying rje'i bdag nyid dang ldan pa yis gzhan dag kyang grol bar byed pa
